                                                                     end-cands)))]))
                             :else (recur (pop stack)))
                            nil))))
          neighbors (into {} (map (fn [w] [w (filter #(= 1 (num-diffs w %)) word-set)])
                                  word-set))]
      (if (find-path neighbors) true false)))

(fn __ [words]
    (letfn [(possible-modifications [w1 w2]
                                    (for [modification [:insert :delete :substitute]
                                          posn (if (= :insert modification)(range 0 (inc (count w1))) (range 0 (count w1)))
                                          ch (if (= :delete modification) [nil] (clojure.set/union (set w1) (set w2)))]
                                      [modification posn ch]))

            (try-modify [word modification pos ch]
                        (case modification
                          :insert (concat (subvec word 0 pos) [ch] (subvec word pos))
                          :delete (concat (subvec word 0 pos) (subvec word (inc pos)))
                          :substitute (assoc word pos ch)))

            (chains? [word words]
                     (or (empty? words)
                         (some (fn [other-word]
                                 (and
                                  (some (fn [[modification posn ch]] (= (try-modify word modification posn ch) other-word))
                                        (possible-modifications word other-word))
                                  (chains? other-word (disj words other-word))))
                               words)))]

      (let [vec-words (into #{} (map vec words))]
        (not (not (some #(chains? % (disj vec-words %)) vec-words))))))

#(not= () (% %2 %3))
(fn g [f s]
  (if (next s)
    (for [x s y (g f (disj s x)) :when (f x y)]
      x)
    s))
(fn c [[h & t :as a] [f & r :as b]]
  (cond (and h f (= h f)) (c t r)
        (not= h f) (or (= t (vec b)) (= r (vec a)) (= t r))))

(fn prob82
  ;; build all the permutations of the set or words xs
  ;; levenshetien returns the number edits diff between two strings
  ;; map diff-by-one-letter over all the combinations
  ;; find if there is one set that is all true
  [xs]
  (letfn [(permutations [xs]
            (if (empty? xs)
              '()
              (if (= 1 (count xs))
                (list (seq xs))
                (for [x xs
                      y (permutations (disj xs x))]
                  (cons x y)))))
          (all-true [xs]  ;; return true xs contains all true
            (every? true? xs))
          (levenshtein [str1 str2]  ;; http://rosettacode.org/wiki/Levenshtein_distance#Clojure
            (let [len1 (count str1)
                  len2 (count str2)]
              (cond (zero? len1) len2
                    (zero? len2) len1
                    :else
                    (let [cost (if (= (first str1) (first str2)) 0 1)]
                      (min (inc (levenshtein (rest str1) str2))
                           (inc (levenshtein str1 (rest str2)))
                           (+ cost
                              (levenshtein (rest str1) (rest str2))))))))
          (one-letter-diff [a b]     ;; same string or one letter difference
            (< (levenshtein a b) 2))
          ]
    (let [s (permutations xs)]
      (if (some true? (map all-true (map #(map one-letter-diff % (rest %)) s)))
        true
        false))))

(fn [words]
  (let [longest-path-len (fn longest-path-len ([dag-map]
                              (->> (keys dag-map)
                                   (map #(longest-path-len dag-map % #{} 0))
                                   (apply max)))

                           ([dag-map from-word seen-words len]
                            (let [new-neighbors (apply disj
                                                       (get dag-map from-word)
                                                       seen-words)

                                  longest-path-lens (map #(longest-path-len dag-map
                                                                            %
                                                                            (conj seen-words %)
                                                                            (inc len))
                                                         new-neighbors)]
                              (if (empty? longest-path-lens)
                                len
                                (apply max longest-path-lens)))))

        edit-distance (fn edit-distance [s1 s2]
                        (cond
                          (empty? s1) (count s2)

                          (empty? s2) (count s1)

                          :else (min (+ (if (= (first s1) (first s2))
                                          0
                                          1)
                                        (edit-distance (rest s1) (rest s2)))

                                     (inc (edit-distance s1 (rest s2)))

                                     (inc (edit-distance (rest s1) s2)))))

        build-dag-map (fn [words]
                        (let [neighbors (fn [word]
                                          (->> words
                                               (filter #(= 1 (edit-distance % word)))
                                               set))]

                          (->> words
                               (map (juxt identity neighbors))
                               (into {}))))]

    (= (longest-path-len (build-dag-map words))
       (count words))))

(fn [ws]
  (letfn [(levenshtein [x y] ; see wikipedia
	(let [xlen (count x), ylen (count y)]
      (cond (zero? xlen) ylen
            (zero? ylen) xlen
            (= (first x) (first y)) (levenshtein (rest x) (rest y))
            :else (inc (min (levenshtein (rest x) y)
                            (levenshtein x (rest y))
                            (levenshtein (rest x) (rest y)))))))            
          (word-chain? [w ws]
            (or (empty? ws)
                (when-let [ones (seq (filter #(= 1 (levenshtein w %)) ws))]
                  (some #(word-chain? % (disj ws %)) (set ones)))))]
    
    (true? (some #(word-chain? % (disj ws %)) ws))))

(fn word-chain?
  [opts]
  (let [chain?
        (fn [word1 word2]
          (letfn [(remove-nth
                    [word n]
                    (apply str
                           (keep-indexed #(when-not (= %1 n) %2) word)))
                  (one-diff [a b & {:keys [both?]}]
                    (loop [n 0]
                      (if (< n (count a))
                        (if (= (if both?
                                 (remove-nth b n) b)
                               (remove-nth a n))
                          true
                          (recur (inc n)))
                        false
                        )))]
            (condp = (reduce - (map count [word1 word2]))
              1 (one-diff word1 word2)
              -1 (one-diff word2 word1)
              0 (one-diff word1 word2 :both? true)
              false)))
        get-nodes
        (fn [chain]
          (map (fn [w] (conj chain w))
               (filter (partial chain? (last chain))
                       (remove (into #{} chain) opts))))
        final-count (count opts)]

    (loop [frontier (apply list (mapcat get-nodes (map (fn [w] [w]) opts)))]
      (if (empty? frontier)
        false
        (let [chain (peek frontier)]
          (if (= final-count (count chain))
            true ;; I solve for an actual solution
            (let [new-nodes (get-nodes chain)]
            (recur (if (seq new-nodes)
                     (apply conj (pop frontier) (get-nodes chain))
                     (pop frontier))))))))))

(fn [w]
  (letfn [(c [v w r]
            (if (= r 1)
              (= (seq v) (seq w))
              (let [[a & b] v
                    [e & f] w]
                (or 
                  (= v w)
                  (c b f (if (= a e) 0 1))
                  (c b w 1)
                  (c v f 1)))))
          (f [s]
            (if (empty? s)
              [[]]
              (mapcat (fn [x] (map #(cons x %) (f (disj s x)))) s)))]
    (boolean (some #(every? (fn [[a b]] (c a b 0)) (partition 2 1 %)) (f w)))))

(fn word-chain? [word-set]
  (let [one-char-away? (fn [a b]
                         (let [a-count (count a)
                               b-count (count b)
                               same-length? (= a-count b-count)]
                           (if (> (Math/abs (- a-count b-count)) 1)
                             false
                             (loop [diffs 0
                                    shorter (if (< (count a) (count b)) a b)
                                    longer (if (< (count a) (count b)) b a)]
                               (cond (and (empty? shorter) (empty? longer)) (= 1 diffs)
                                     (empty? shorter) (recur (inc diffs) shorter (rest longer))
                                     (empty? longer) (recur (inc diffs) (rest shorter) longer)
                                     (not= (first shorter) (first longer)) (recur (inc diffs) (if same-length? (rest shorter) shorter) (rest longer))
                                     :else (recur diffs (rest shorter) (rest longer)))))))
        expand-paths (fn [paths]
                       (mapcat (fn [path]
                                 (let [last-step (last path)
                                       available-choices (filter (fn [c] (one-char-away? c last-step)) (clojure.set/difference word-set (set path)))]
                                   (if (empty? available-choices)
                                     [path]
                                     (map (fn [c] (conj path c)) available-choices)))) paths))]
    (loop [i 0 paths (map vector word-set)]
      (if (= i (count word-set))
        (= (count word-set) (apply max (map count paths)))
        (recur (inc i) (expand-paths paths))))))

(fn [words]
  (letfn
    [(levenshtein [s t]
       (let [ns (inc (count s))
             nt (inc (count t))
             s-to-empty (into [] (map vector (range 0 ns)))
             empty-to-t (assoc s-to-empty 0 (vec (range 0 nt)))
             coords (for [j (range 1 nt), i (range 1 ns)] [j i])
             distances
             (reduce
               (fn [distances [j i]]
                 (let [substition-cost (if (= (get s (dec i)) (get t (dec j))) 0 1)
                       deletion-dist (+ 1 (get-in distances [(dec i) j]))
                       insertion-dist (+ 1 (get-in distances [i (dec j)]))
                       substition-dist (+ substition-cost (get-in distances [(dec i) (dec j)]))]
                   (assoc-in distances [i j] (min deletion-dist insertion-dist substition-dist))))
               empty-to-t
               coords)]

         (get-in distances [(dec ns) (dec nt)])))

     (chainable? [word words]
       (if-not (seq words)
         true
         (let [chainable (if-not word words (filter #(= 1 (levenshtein word %)) words))]
            (if (seq chainable)
               (reduce
                  (fn [res w]
                     (or res
                       (if (chainable? w (remove #{w} words))
                          true
                          false)))
                  false
                  chainable)
               false))))]

    (chainable? nil words)))

(fn word-chainable?
  ([a-set]
   (let [char-vec (fn [s] ((comp vec char-array) s))
         vec-remove  (fn [coll pos]
                       (into (subvec coll 0 pos)
                             (subvec coll (inc pos))))
         create-testees (fn [a-vec] (map (partial vec-remove a-vec)
                                         (range (count a-vec))))
         
         letter-del? (fn [a b] (boolean (some #((hash-set a) %)   b)))
         letter-switch? (fn [a b] (some true? (map = a b)))
         resembles? (fn [a b]
                      (let [vec-of-a (char-vec a)
                            vec-of-b (char-vec b)
                            testees-b (create-testees vec-of-b)
                            testees-a (create-testees vec-of-a)]
                        (boolean (or (letter-del? vec-of-a testees-b)
                                     (letter-del? vec-of-b testees-a)
                                     (letter-switch? testees-a testees-b)))))
         get-simils (fn [a] (set (filter (partial resembles? a) (disj a-set a))))
         build-simil-map (fn [a-set]
                           (reduce  #(into % (hash-map %2 (get-simils %2)))
                                    {} a-set))
         simil-map (build-simil-map a-set)]
     (boolean (some true?
                    (map  #(word-chainable? % simil-map  (disj a-set %)) a-set)))))
  ([connection simil-map a-set]
   (cond
     (= 1 (count a-set)) (= 1 (count (get simil-map connection)))
     (some #(zero? (count (second %))) simil-map) false
     :else (let [options (get simil-map connection)
                 update-simil-map (fn [option]
                                    (reduce
                                     #(into % (hash-map (first %2)
                                                        (disj (second %2)
                                                              connection)))
                                     {}
                                     (dissoc simil-map connection)))
                 ]
             (some true? (map
                           #(word-chainable? % (update-simil-map %) (disj a-set %))
                           options))))))

(fn [wset] ;1. Create map {word [derivative(s)..]}. 2. Find a chain.
    (let  [;ws (vec wset)
           ;close-slices
           close-unused (fn [one two] ;return true if words are 1 diff apart
                         (let [one-count (count one)
                               two-count (count two)
                               one-chars (seq one)
                               two-chars (seq two)
                               char-pairs (partition 2 (interleave one-chars two-chars))
                               ]
                           ))
           close-words? (fn close-words? [long short] ;Length of strings doesn't matter, this will reorder them as needed
                         {:pre [(string? long) (string? short)] :post [(or (= true %)(= false %))]}
                         (let [long-count  (count long)
                               short-count (count short)]
                           (if (< long-count short-count)
                             (close-words? short long)
                             (let [same-count (= long-count short-count)]
                              (if (< 1 (- long-count short-count))
                                false
                                (loop [i-long 0
                                       i-short 0
                                       changed? false] ;whether a change was simlated already
                                  (let [more-long  (< i-long long-count)
                                        more-short (< i-short short-count)]
                                    (if (not= more-long more-short)
                                      (not changed?) ;finished with short. If we changed already, the leftover char in long can't be delivered
                                      (if (not more-short)
                                        true #_finished
                                        (let [same-char (= (nth long i-long) (nth short i-short))]
                                          (if same-char
                                            (recur (inc i-long) (inc i-short) changed?)
                                            (if changed?
                                              false #_finished
                                              (if same-count
                                                (recur (inc i-long) (inc i-short) true) ;Simulate replacement of a char.
                                                (recur (inc i-long)      i-short  true)) ;Simulate removal from long. The same as if we inserted to short:
                                              ;if (not same-count), then you have two choices: insert to the short, or remove from the long. Equivalent.
                                              ; *X*            *X* =>shorten=> **
                                              ; *X* <=insert<= **              **
                                              ))
                                    )))))
                                )))))
           derivatives? (fn [mp] (and (map? mp) (every? (fn [[from to-s]] (and (string? from) (seq? to-s) (every? string? to-s))) mp)))
           ders (reduce ;ders will be a map of derivatives: {from1 [to1-1 to1-2 to1-3...] from2 [to2-1 to2-2...}
                  (fn [mp [from to]] {:pre[(derivatives? mp)(string? from)(string? to)]}
                    (merge mp
                      (let [existing (mp from)]
                        (if existing
                          {from (cons to existing)}
                          {from (list to)}))))
                  {}
                    (for [from wset
                          to wset
                          :when (not= from to)
                          :when (close-words? from to)]
                        [from to]
                        ))
           _ (println "derivatives" ders)
           contained? (fn [item coll]
                        (some (partial = item) coll))
           starter-word (first wset)]
     (boolean
     (some (fn [starter-word] ;Pick up a starter word. NOT any word, because a starter and ender may have only one neighbour => one transformation in use, but words in between have two neighbours => transformations in use.
      ;Each word must be used exactly once per path. We keep the most recently reached words, and leftover words for each of them.
      (println "starter" starter-word)
      (loop [reached+leftovers [[starter-word (seq (disj wset starter-word))]]] ;seq of [last-reached-word (leftover-words...)]. Not a map, because the same word may be reached through different paths.
        ;(println)
        (println "loop" reached+leftovers)
        (println)
        (assert (every? string? (map first reached+leftovers)))
        (assert (every? (partial every? string?) (map second reached+leftovers)))
        (assert (every? (fn [[word leftovers]] (not (contained? word leftovers))) reached+leftovers))
        (assert (apply = (map (comp count second) reached+leftovers))) ;all chains have same number of leftovers, because every step consumes exactly one word
        (let [reached+leftovers-new (doall (for [[reached leftovers] reached+leftovers
                                                 :let [_ (println "reached (fro prev)" reached)]
                                                 reached-next (ders reached ())
                                                 :let [_ (println "reached-next candidate" reached-next), _ (flush)]
                                                 :when (contained? reached-next leftovers)] ;ders contains all possible derivatives, including ones that we already covered. Hence choose only derivatives not used yet.
                                             (let [leftovers-next (remove (partial = reached-next) leftovers)]
                                               (println "reached-next leftovers-next:" reached-next leftovers-next)(flush)
                                               (list reached-next leftovers-next)
                                      )))
              reached+leftovers-new-seq (seq reached+leftovers-new)]
          (println "----")
          (if reached+leftovers-new-seq
            (if (= 1 (count (second (first reached+leftovers-new-seq))))
              (some (fn [[reached leftovers]]
                        (contained? (first leftovers) (ders reached)))
                      reached+leftovers-new-seq); We reached the one but last chain. (some ...) determines the overall result, because it says whether any path is reachable (in one step).
              (recur reached+leftovers-new-seq))
            false)) ;one path (i.e. no leftovers) is enough
        ))
        wset))))

(fn [words]
  (let [close-enough? (fn close-enough?  
                        ([a b] (close-enough? a b 0))
                        ([a b difference-so-far]
                         (if (= (count a) (count b))
                           (= 1 (+ (count (filter false? (map = a b))) difference-so-far))
                           (let [common-beginning (count (take-while #(apply = %) (map vector a b)))]
                             (if (zero? common-beginning)
                               (let [longer (max-key count a b)
                                     shorter (min-key count a b)]
                                 (close-enough? shorter (rest longer) (inc difference-so-far)))
                               (close-enough? (drop common-beginning a) (drop common-beginning b) difference-so-far))))))]
    (boolean 
      (some (fn has-chain-starting? 
              ([start] (has-chain-starting? start (disj words start))) 
              ([start other-words]
               (or (empty? other-words)
                   (when-let [possible-nexts (seq (filter (fn [w] (close-enough? w start))
                                                          other-words))]
                     (some (fn [next] (has-chain-starting? next (disj other-words next)))
                           possible-nexts)))))
            words))))

(fn [words]
   (let [sbs (fn [w1 w2] 
                (let [n (count w1)]
                  (and (= n (count w2)) 
                       (= 1 (->> (not= (get w1 i) (get w2 i))
                                  (for [i (range n)])
                                   (filter identity)
                                   (count))))))
         ins (fn [w1 w2]
               (let [n (count w1)]
                 (and (= (dec n) (count w2))
                      (->> (str (subs w1 0 i) (subs w1 (inc i) ))
                            (for [i (range n)])
                             (some #{w2})))))
         dif1 (fn [w1 w2] (or (sbs w1 w2) (ins w1 w2) (ins w2 w1))) 
         gc (fn [chains]
                  (let [addfront (for [w words c chains :when (and (dif1 w (first c)) (not-any? #{w} c))]
                                      (vec (apply conj [w] c)))
                        addback (for [w words c chains :when (and (dif1 w (peek c)) (not-any? #{w} c))]
                                      (vec (conj c w)))
                        nchains (apply hash-set (distinct (concat addfront addback)))]
                      (cond (empty? nchains) false
                            (= (count words) (count (first nchains))) true
                            :else  (recur nchains))))]
     (gc (apply hash-set (for [w words] [w])))))

(fn [words]
  (letfn [(chainable? [a b]
            (cond
             (> (count b) (count a)) (chainable? b a)
             (> (count a) (count b))
             (not (every? false?
                          (for [i (range (count a))]
                            (= b
                               (apply str
                                      (apply str (take i a))
                                      (apply str (drop (inc i) a)))))))
             :else (<= (count (remove true? (map = a b))) 1)))]
    ((fn wc?
       ([s]
          (if (<= (count s) 1)
            true
            (not (every? false?
                         (for [w s]
                           (wc? w (remove #{w} s)))))))
       ([w s]
          (prn w s)
          (if (zero? (count s))
            true
            (not (every? false?
                         (for [w2 s]
                           (and
                            (chainable? w w2)
                            (wc? w2 (remove #{w2} s)))))))))
     words)))

(fn has-chain? [word-list]
  (letfn [(permutations [s]
            (lazy-seq
             (if (seq (rest s))
               (apply concat
                      (for [x s]
                        (map #(cons x %)
                             (permutations (remove #{x} s)))))
               (list s))))
          (permutationsv [n]
            (map vec (permutations (range 0 n))))
          (pairs [n]
            (map vector (range 0 (dec n)) (range 1 n)))
          (edit-distance [a b]
            (let [edfn (fn [edf a b]
                         (if-let [[a0 & as] (seq a)]
                           (if-let [[b0 & bs] (seq b)]
                             (if (= a0 b0)
                               (edf edf as bs)
                               (inc (min (edf edf as b)
                                         (edf edf as bs)
                                         (edf edf a bs))))
                             (count a))
                           (count b)))
                  memoized-edfn (memoize edfn)]
              (memoized-edfn memoized-edfn a b)))
          (one-edit-away? [a b]
            (== 1 (edit-distance a b)))
          (wl-not-satisfies? [wl pmv]
            (let [n (count wl)
                  ps (pairs n)]
              (some (fn [p] (let [x0 (first p)
                                  y0 (second p)
                                  x1 (nth pmv x0)
                                  y1 (nth pmv y0)
                                  w1 (nth wl x1)
                                  w2 (nth wl y1)]
                              (not= 1 (edit-distance w1 w2))))
                    ps)))
          (chains [word-list]
            (let [wl (vec word-list)
                  n (count wl)
                  pmvs (permutationsv n)]
              (remove (partial wl-not-satisfies? wl) pmvs)))]
    (not (empty? (chains word-list)))))

(fn [S]
    (let [c (fn c [a b]
                (let [a (seq a) b (seq b)
                      [r & t] a
                      [s & u] b]
                    (or 
                      (= a b)
                      (and (= r s) (c t u))
                      (= a u) (= b t) (= t u))))
          ? (fn ? [s V]
                (or (empty? V)
                    (some true? 
                          (map (fn [x]
                             (if (c s x) (? x (disj V x))))
                           V))))
           ]
    (not-every? nil? (map #(? % S) S))))

(fn [words]
  (letfn [(edit-distance [w1 w2]
            (let [s1 (seq w1), s2 (seq w2)]
              ((fn matrix [i j]
                 (cond
                  (zero? i) j
                  (zero? j) i
                  (= (nth s1 (dec i)) (nth s2 (dec j))) (matrix (dec i) (dec j))
                  :else (inc (min (matrix (dec i) j) ; delete
                                  (matrix i (dec j)) ; insert
                                  (matrix (dec i) (dec j)))))) ; substitute
               (count s1) (count s2))))
          (chain-adjacency-matrix [words]
            (map (fn [w1]
                   (map (fn [w2] (= 1 (edit-distance w1 w2))) words))
                 words))
          (paths [m path]
            (if (empty? path)
              (mapcat #(paths m [%]) (range (count m)))
              (let [possible-extensions (apply disj (set (range (count m))) (set path))
                    extensions (filter #(nth (nth m (last path)) %) possible-extensions)]
                (concat #{path} (mapcat #(paths m (conj path %)) extensions)))))
          (hamiltonian-path? [m]
            (boolean (some #(= (count m) (count %)) (paths m []))))]
    (hamiltonian-path? (chain-adjacency-matrix words))))

(fn [s]
  (letfn [(suitable? [x y]
            (let [diffs (fn [x y] (<= (reduce + (map #(if (= %1 %2) 0 1) x y)) 1))
                  drop-char (fn [n s] (str (subs s 0 n) (subs s (inc n) (count s))))
                  drop-variants (fn [s] (map #(drop-char % s) (range (count s))))
                  deletions (fn [l s] (some #(= s %) (drop-variants l)))
                  cx (count x)
                  cy (count y)]
              (cond
                (= cx cy) (diffs x y)
                (= cx (inc cy)) (deletions x y)
                (= (inc cx) cy) (deletions y x))))
          (chain? [xs coll]
            (if (seq coll)
              (if (seq xs)
                (let [ x (first xs)
                      next (filter (partial suitable? x) coll)]
                  (or (chain? next  (remove (partial = x) coll))
                      (chain? (rest xs) coll)))
                false)
              true))]
    (boolean
      (chain? (seq s) (seq s)))
    ))

(fn chain [s]
  (let [mutatable? (fn [a b]
                     (and (= (count a) (count b))
                          (= (count (filter false? (map = a b))) 1)))
        remove-nth (fn [n s]
                     (concat (take n s) (drop (inc n) s)))
        reductions (fn [s]
                     (map #(remove-nth % s) (range (count s))))
        reducible? (fn [a b]
                     (and (= (count a) (inc (count b)))
                          (some #(= (seq b) %) (reductions a))))
        transformable? (fn [a b]
                         (or (mutatable? a b)
                             (reducible? a b)
                             (reducible? b a)))
        transforms (fn [s]
                     (into {}
                           (map (fn [w] [w (filter #(transformable? w %) s)])
                                s)))
        chain-aux (fn chain-aux [m path]
                    (let [cand (into #{} (get m (last path)))
                          seen (set path)
                          next (clojure.set/difference cand seen)]
                      (if (empty? next)
                        (count path)
                        (apply max (map (partial chain-aux m)
                                        (map (partial conj path) next))))))
        m (transforms s)]
    (= (count s)
       (apply max (map #(chain-aux m [%]) s)))))

(fn [i-words]
     (let [
           n-count (count i-words)
           n-range (range n-count)
           n-map (apply hash-map (interleave i-words n-range))
           n-index (fn [i-word] (get n-map i-word))

           edit-distance (fn diff ([a-word b-word] (diff 0 a-word b-word))
                             ([distance a-word b-word]
                              (let [
                                    a-head (first a-word)
                                    b-head (first b-word)

                                    a-tail (rest a-word)
                                    b-tail (rest b-word)

                                    a-next (first a-tail)
                                    b-next (first b-tail)
                                    ]
                                (if (and (nil? a-head) (nil? b-head))
                                  distance
                                  (if (= a-head b-head)
                                    (diff distance a-tail b-tail)
                                    (if (= a-next b-head)
                                      (diff (inc distance) a-tail b-word)
                                      (if (= a-head b-next)
                                        (diff (inc distance) a-word b-tail)
                                        (diff (inc distance) a-tail b-tail))))))))
           edges (reduce
                   (fn [result i-word]
                       (reduce
                         #(conj %1 (vector i-word %2))
                         result
                         (filter #(= 1 (edit-distance i-word %)) i-words)))
                   #{}
                   i-words)
           grouped-edges (group-by #(n-index (first %)) edges)

           n-dest (fn [i-word]
                      (map last (get grouped-edges (n-index i-word))))

           build-chains (fn chain
                            ([i-word] (chain (dec n-count) (vector (vector i-word))))
                            ([i result]
                             (if (zero? i)
                               result
                               (chain
                                 (dec i)
                                 (reduce
                                   concat
                                   []
                                   (map
                                     (fn [i-chain]
                                         (map
                                           #(conj (apply vector i-chain) %)
                                           (filter #(not (contains? (apply hash-set i-chain) %)) (n-dest (last i-chain)))))
                                     result))))))
           ]
       (reduce
         (fn [result i-word]
             (if (false? result)
               (boolean (some #(= (count %) n-count) (build-chains i-word)))
               result))
         false
         i-words)))

(fn chain [wordlist]
  (let 
      [levdist (fn levdist [left right]
                 (cond
                  (empty? left) (count right)
                  (empty? right) (count left)
                  :else (let [cost (cond 
                                    (= (last left) (last right)) 0
                                    :else 1)]
                          (min (inc (levdist (butlast left) right))
                               (inc (levdist left (butlast right)))
                               (+ cost (levdist (butlast left) (butlast right)))))))
       adjacent-words (filter #(= (levdist (first %) (second %)) 1) (for [x wordlist y wordlist] [x y]))
       check-chain (fn check-chain [startword wordchain adjacent]
                     (if (= (set (conj wordchain startword)) (set wordlist))
                       true
                       (let [possibilities (filter #(= startword (first %)) adjacent)]
                         (if (empty? possibilities)
                           false
                           (some true? (for [possibility possibilities]
                                         (check-chain (second possibility) 
                                                      (conj wordchain startword) 
                                                      (filter #(not (= startword (first %))) adjacent))))))))]
    (or (some true? (for [word wordlist] (check-chain word [] adjacent-words))) false)))

(fn word-chain? [set-of-words]
  (letfn [(remove-first [p l acc]
            (if (empty? l)
              l
              (if (p (first l))
                (into (rest l) acc)
                (recur p (rest l) (cons (first l) acc)))))
          (word-difference [w1 w2]
            (reduce #(remove-first (fn [e] (= e %2)) %1 '()) w1 w2))
          (equal-after-deletion? [w1 w2]
            (and (= (count w1) (inc (count w2)))
                 (= (count (word-difference w1 w2)) 1)))
          (equal-after-insertion? [w1 w2]
            (equal-after-deletion? w2 w1))
          (equal-after-substition? [w1 w2]
            (and (= (count w1) (count w2))
                 (= (count (filter false? (map #(apply = %) (map list w1 w2)))) 1)))
          (can-follow-after-transform? [first-word word]
            (or (equal-after-deletion? first-word word)
                (equal-after-insertion? first-word word)
                (equal-after-substition? word first-word)))
          (can-form-word-chain? [first-word other-words]
            (let [valid-followers (filter (partial can-follow-after-transform? first-word) other-words)]
              (if (empty? other-words)
                true
                (if (empty? valid-followers)
                  false
                  (some true? (map (fn [first-word]
                                     (can-form-word-chain? first-word
                                                           (remove-first #(= first-word %) other-words '())))
                                   valid-followers))))))]
    (true? (some true? (map #(can-form-word-chain? % (disj set-of-words %)) set-of-words)))))

(fn [words]
	(letfn [(one-character-diff? [word-a word-b]
				(->> (map #(concat (take %1 word-a) (rest (drop %1 word-a))) 
					       (range (count word-a))) 
					 (some #(= (seq word-b) %1))
					 (boolean)))
			(next? [word-a word-b]
			  (case (- (count word-a) (count word-b))
			  	1  (one-character-diff? word-a word-b)
			  	-1 (one-character-diff? word-b word-a)
			  	0  (->> (map #(= %1 %2) word-a word-b) (filter false?) count (= 1))
			  	false))
			(chain? [word chained-words]
				(let [nexts (filter #(and (next? word %) (nil? (chained-words %))) words)]
				  (if (seq nexts)
				  	(->> (drop-while (complement boolean)
				  		             (map #(chain? % (conj chained-words %)) nexts))
				  	     first true?)
				  	(= (count chained-words) (count words)))))]

			(->> (drop-while (complement boolean)
				             (map #(chain? % #{%}) words))
				 first true?)))

(fn [s] (let [
con? (fn [x] (fn [y] (loop [[xf & xr :as x] x, [yf & yr :as y] y, n 0]
  (cond (or (empty? x) (empty? y)) (= 1 (+ n (count x) (count y)))
    (= xf yf) (recur xr yr n)
    (> (count x) (count y)) (recur xr y (inc n))
    (< (count x) (count y)) (recur x yr (inc n))
    :else (recur xr yr (inc n))
  ))))
vc (reduce #(conj % (filter (con? %2) s)) [] (seq s))
]
(> 3 (count (filter #(= 1 %) (map count vc))))
))

(letfn [(ld [s1 s2]
            (let [s1c (count s1)
                  s2c (count s2)]
              (-> (for [j (range 1 (inc s2c))
                        i (range 1 (inc s1c))]
                    [i j])
                  (->>
                   (reduce
                    (fn [d [i j]]
                      (let [sub-cost (if (= (nth s1 (dec i))
                                            (nth s2 (dec j)))
                                       0 1)]
                        (assoc-in d
                                  [i j]
                                  (min (inc (get-in d [(dec i) j]))
                                       (inc (get-in d [i (dec j)]))
                                       (+ sub-cost
                                          (get-in d [(dec i) (dec j)]))))))
                    (into []
                          (for [i (range (inc s1c))]
                            (into [i]
                                  (if (= 0 i)
                                    (range (inc i) (inc s2c))
                                    (repeat s2c 0)))))))
                  (get-in [s1c s2c]))))
          (permutations [s]
            (lazy-seq
             (if (seq (rest s))
               (apply concat (for [x s]
                               (map #(cons x %) (permutations (remove #{x} s)))))
               [s])))]
    (fn [words]
      (let [ld-memo (memoize ld)]
        (or (some
             (fn [words']
               (every?
                (fn [[s1 s2]]
                  (= 1 (ld-memo s1 s2)))
                (partition 2 1 words')))
             (permutations words))
            false))))

(fn [words]
    (let [chainable?
          (fn [word1 word2]
            (let [longword (if (>= (count word1) (count word2)) word1 word2)
                 shortword (if (>= (count word1) (count word2)) word2 word1)
                 charsinlw (count longword)
                 charsinsw (count shortword)
                 diff (fn [c1 c2 d]
                        (cond
                          (nil? c1) (+ (count c2) d)
                          (nil? c2) (+ (count c1) d)
                          (not= (first c1) (first c2)) (recur (next c1) c2 (inc d))
                          :else (recur (next c1) (next c2) d)))]
            (cond
              (= charsinlw charsinsw)
                (= 1 (apply + (map #(if (= %1 %2) 0 1) (.toCharArray word1) (.toCharArray word2))))
              (= 1 (- charsinlw charsinsw))
                (= 1 (diff (.toCharArray longword) (.toCharArray shortword) 0))
              :else false)))]
    (letfn [(chain?
            ([words] (chain? words [] (seq words)))
            ([words chain [w & rnwords :as next-words]]
      (if-not (seq words)
        chain
        (when (seq next-words)
          (let [[nw & rninchain :as next-in-chain] (filter #(chainable? w %) words)]
            (or (chain? (disj words w) (cons w chain) next-in-chain)
                (chain? words chain rnwords)))))))]
    (if (chain? words) true false))))

(fn [nodes]
    (let [nodes    (set (map seq nodes))
          one-diff (fn [a b]
                     (cond
                       (empty? a) (= (count b) 1)
                       (empty? b) (= (count a) 1)
                       (= (first a) (first b)) (recur (rest a) (rest b))
                       :else (or (= (rest a) (rest b)) (= a (rest b)) (= b (rest a)))))
          chain (fn [start]
                  ((fn f [current visited]
                     (let [visited (conj visited current)]
                       (if (= visited nodes)
                         true
                         (let [neighbors (filter #(and (not (contains? visited %)) (one-diff % current)) nodes)]
                           (if (empty? neighbors)
                             false
                             (some #(f % visited) neighbors))))))
                    start
                    #{}))]
      (true? (some chain nodes))))

(fn word-chain-submit [set-of-words]
  (letfn [(without-1-letter [s]
            (let [end (count s)]
              (loop [i 0 acc []]
                (if (= i end)
                  acc
                  (recur
                    (inc i)
                    (conj acc (str (subs s 0 i) (subs s (+ 1 i) end))))))))
          (pair-diff-by-one [pair]
            (let [a (first pair)
                  b (second pair)
                  ca (count a)
                  cb (count b)]
              (cond
                (= ca cb)
                     (= 1 (reduce
                            (fn [n [x y]] (+ n (if (= x y) 0 1)))
                            0
                            (map vector a b)))
                (= 1 (- cb ca))
                     (some (partial = a) (without-1-letter b))
                (> ca cb)
                     (pair-diff-by-one [b a]))))
          (next-map [c]
            (reduce
              (fn [m e]
                (assoc m e
                       (set (map second
                                 (filter pair-diff-by-one
                                         (map #(vector e %) c))))))
              {} c))
          (find-chains
            ([s] (find-chains s s (next-map s)))
            ([n s m]
             (if (empty? s)
               []
               (let [cs (count s)]
                 (filter #(= cs (count %))
                   (reduce
                     (fn [acc e]
                       (concat
                         acc
                         (let [subchains (find-chains
                                           (keep #((m e) %) s)
                                           (remove #(= e %) s)
                                           m)]
                           (if (empty? subchains)
                             [[e]]
                             (map #(cons e %) subchains)))))
                     [] n))))))]

    (boolean (seq (find-chains set-of-words)))))

(fn word-chain? [ws]
  (letfn [(permutations [ws]
            (when-let [ws (seq ws)]
              (let [cnt (count ws)]
                (if (== cnt 1)
                  (list ws)
                  (mapcat
                    (fn [w] (map #(lazy-seq (cons w %)) (permutations (remove #{w} ws))))
                    ws)))))
          (count-diff [[w1 w2]]
            (loop [[c1 & cs1] w1 [c2 & cs2] w2 res 0]
              (cond
                (not (or c1 c2)) res
                (= c1 c2) (recur cs1 cs2 res)
                ;suvstitution
                (= (first cs1) (first cs2)) (recur (rest cs1) (rest cs2) (inc res))
                ; insertion
                (= c1 (first cs2)) (recur cs1 (rest cs2) (inc res))
                ; deletion
                (= c2 (first cs1)) (recur (rest cs1) cs2 (inc res))
                :else (recur cs1 cs2 (inc res)))))
          (chain? [ws]
            (every? #(== % 1) (map count-diff (partition 2 1 ws))))]
    (not (nil? (some chain? (permutations ws))))))

(fn [s]
  (let [suf #(loop [[x & r :as a] (seq %), [y & s :as b] (seq %2)]
               (if (= x y) (recur r s) [a b]))
        link? (fn [[x & r :as a] [y & s :as b]] (or (= a s) (= b r) (= s r)))
        chains (fn f [s] (if (= 1 (count s)) [s]
                         (for [h s, c (f (disj s h)) :when (apply link? (suf h (first c)))] (cons h c))))]
    (not (empty? (chains s)))))

(fn chainable? [words]
  (letfn [(sub-able? [a b]
            (and
              (= (count a) (count b))
              (->> (interleave a b)
                (partition 2)
                (map #(if (apply = %) 0 1))
                (reduce +)
                (= 1))))
          (del-able? [a b]
            (and
              (= 1 (Math/abs (- (count a) (count b))))
              (let [[longer shorter] (if (> (count a) (count b)) [a b] [b a])
                    diff-index (loop [i 0]
                                 (if (= (get a i) (get b i))
                                   (recur (inc i))
                                   i))]
                (= (drop diff-index shorter) (drop (inc diff-index) longer)))))
          (add-edge [graph a b]
            (let [graph (update-in graph [a] (fnil #(conj % b) []))
                  graph (update-in graph [b] (fnil #(conj % a) []))]
              graph))
          (traverse [graph curr visited]
            (let [neighbors (filter #(not (visited %)) (graph curr))]
              (cond
                (= (count visited) (count words)) true
                (= 0 (count neighbors)) false
                :else (not (nil? (some identity (for [neighbor neighbors]
                                                  (traverse graph neighbor (conj visited neighbor)))))))))]
    (let [graph (loop [words words
                       edges {}]
                  (if (<= (count words) 1)
                    edges
                    (let [a (first words)
                          edges (reduce
                                  (fn [edges b]
                                    (if (or (sub-able? a b) (del-able? a b))
                                      (add-edge edges a b)
                                      edges))
                                  edges
                                  (rest words))]
                      (recur (rest words)
                             edges))))
          starts (keys graph)]
      (not (nil? (some identity (for [start starts]
                                  (traverse graph start #{start}))))))))

(fn chain [words & [prev]]
  (let [near
        (fn near [a b]
          (condp = (compare (count a) (count b))
              1 (some #(let [[x [y & z]] (split-at % a)]
                         (= (apply str (concat x z)) b))
                      (range (count a)))
              0 (some #(let [[x [y & z]] (split-at % a)]
                         (= (apply str (concat x [(nth b %)] z)) b))
                      (range (count a)))
              -1 (near b a)))]
    (if (empty? words)
      true
      (let [usable (if-not prev
                     words
                     (filter (partial near prev) words))]
        (loop [[w & rest] (seq usable)]
          (if (nil? w)
            false
            (if (chain (disj words w) w)
              true
              (recur rest))))))))

(fn wch[words]
    (let [
          words (reverse (sort-by count (vec words)))
         cc? (fn [a b]
               (let [a (seq a) b (seq b)
                     cnts (remove even?
                                (map count (vals (group-by identity (apply conj a b)))))]
                  (condp = (- (count a) (count b))
                  0 (= '(1 1)  cnts)
                  1 (= 1 (count cnts ))
                  -1 (= 1 (count cnts))
                  false
                  )))
           tr (fn [init ]
                  (loop[i init
                        s [i]]
                    (do
                      ;(println (clojure.string/join "," [i s]))
                      (if (or (nil? i) (empty? (remove (set s) words)))
                        (filter (comp not nil?) s)
                        (recur (first (filter (partial cc? i) (remove (set s) words )))
                               (conj s (first (filter (partial cc? i) (remove (set s) words)))))
                       ))))
           all-paths (map tr words)
          ]
      (doall (map println all-paths))
      (= (apply max (map count all-paths)) (count words))
  ))

#(letfn [(pair? [a b]
             (let [ra (rest a) rb (rest b) ea? (empty? a) eb? (empty? b)]
               (if (or (not= (first a) (first b))  (and ea? eb?))
                 (if (or (and ea? eb?) (= ra rb) (= rb (seq a)) (= ra (seq b))) true false)
                 (recur ra rb))))
          
           (chain? [w0 coll]
             (if (empty? coll)
               true
               (some (fn [w]
                       (and (pair? w0 w)
                            (chain? w (disj coll w))))
                     coll)))] 


         (boolean (some (fn [w] (chain? w (disj % w))) %)))

(fn is-word-chain? [words]
  (let [check (fn [w1 w2]
                (loop [s1 (seq w1)
                       s2 (seq w2)
                       diff-cnt 0]
                  (if (and (nil? s1) (nil? s2))
                    (if (< 1 diff-cnt) false true)
                    (if (= (first s1) (first s2))
                      (recur (next s1) (next s2) diff-cnt)
                      (cond
                        (> (count s1) (count s2)) (recur (next s1) s2 (inc diff-cnt))
                        (< (count s1) (count s2)) (recur s1 (next s2) (inc diff-cnt))
                        :else (recur (next s1) (next s2) (inc diff-cnt)))))))
        word-chain? (fn word-chain? [w candidate-words]
                      (if (not (empty? candidate-words))
                        (let [next-words (filter (partial check w) candidate-words)]
                          (if (empty? next-words)
                            false
                            (some #(word-chain? % (disj candidate-words %)) next-words
                                  )))
                        true))
        ]
    (if (some #(word-chain? % (disj words %)) words)
      true
      false
      )))

(letfn [(levenstein [mlev ss ts]
          (cond (empty? ss) (count ts)
                (empty? ts) (count ss)
                :else (let [cost (if (= (first ss) (first ts)) 0 1)]
                        (min (inc (mlev mlev (rest ss) ts))
                             (inc (mlev mlev ss (rest ts)))
                             (+ cost (mlev mlev (rest ss) (rest ts)))))))
        (lev [s t]
          (levenstein (memoize levenstein) (seq s) (seq t)))
        (other [node edge]
          (first (disj edge node)))
        (traverse [[node & _ :as path] edges f]
          (let [targets (filter #(% node) edges)]
            (if (seq targets)
              (some #(traverse (cons (other node %) path) (disj edges %) f)
                    targets)
              (f path))))]
  (fn [nodes]
    (let [size  (count nodes)
          edges (set (for [a nodes b nodes :when (= 1 (lev a b))] #{a b}))]
      (boolean
        (some identity
              (map #(traverse [%] edges (fn [path] (= size (count path)))) nodes))))))

(fn [w]
  (letfn [(n? [a b]
            (let [[[cx x] [cy y]] (sort (map (juxt count str) [a b]))]
              (case (- cy cx)
                0 (= 1 (reduce + (map #(if (= % %2) 0 1) x y)))
                1 (let [n (count (take-while #(apply = %) (map list x y)))]
                    (= (subs x n) (subs y (inc n))))
                false)))
          (s? [ws r]
             (let [ws (disj ws r)
                   n (filter #(n? % r) ws)]
               (or (empty? ws) (some #(s? ws %) n))))]
    (boolean (some #(s? w %) w))))

(fn  [words]
    (letfn [(ms [s] (map
                     (fn [i] (concat (take i s) (drop (inc i) s)))
                     (range (count s))))
            (one-away? [s1 s2]
              (cond (< (count s1) (count s2))
                    (some (fn [s] (= s (seq s1))) (ms s2))
                    (> (count s1) (count s2))
                    (some (fn [s] (= s (seq s2))) (ms s1))
                    :else
                    (some identity (map = (ms s1) (ms s2)))))
            (chains [words]
              (if (empty? (rest words))
                [[(first words)]]
                (mapcat (fn [word]
                          (map #(cons word %)
                               (filter (fn [chain] (one-away? (first chain) word))
                                       (chains (disj words word)))))
                        words)))]
      (not (empty? (chains words)))))

(fn f [words]
  (letfn [(f2 [word remaining]
           (if (empty? remaining)
             true
             (map #(if (f3 word %)
                     (f2 % (disj remaining %))
                     false)
                  remaining)))
          (f3 [a b]
              (let [[a b] (sort-by count [a b])
                value (- (count b) (count a))]
                (condp = value
                  0 (> 2 (apply + (map #(if (= % %2) 0 1) a b)))
                  1 (some true? (map #(= (seq a) %) (map #(concat (take % b) (drop (inc %) b)) (range (count b)))))
                  false)))]
    (not (every? false? (flatten (map #(f2 % (disj words %)) words))))))

(fn [words]
  (letfn [
    (check-different-size [big-word small-word]
      (if (> (count small-word) (count big-word))
        (recur small-word big-word)
        ((complement nil?)
           (some
             #(= % (vec small-word))
             (map-indexed
               (fn [i l] (keep-indexed
                  (fn [index letter] (if (not= index i) letter))
                  big-word))
               big-word)))
        
        ))

    (check-same-size [word1 word2]
      (<= (count (filter false? (map = word1 word2))) 1))

    (one-latter-change? [word1 word2]
      (cond
        (= (count word1) (count word2)) (check-same-size word1 word2)
        (= 1 (Math/abs (- (count word1) (count word2)))) (check-different-size word1 word2)
        :else false))

    (combinable-vertices? [[v1 v2] [v3 v4]]
      (cond
        (= v1 v3) true
        (= v1 v4) true
        (= v2 v3) true
        (= v2 v4) true
        :else false))

    (combine-vertices [[v1 v2] [v3 v4]]
      (cond
        (= v1 v3) [v2 v4]
        (= v1 v4) [v2 v3]
        (= v2 v3) [v1 v4]
        (= v2 v4) [v1 v3]
        :else (throw (ex-info "Tried to combine no combinable vertices" {}))))

    (push-used-to-last [w-vertex [f-vertex & vertices]]
      (let [common-node (vec (clojure.set/intersection (set w-vertex) (set f-vertex)))
            combinable-selector #(combinable-vertices? % common-node)]
        (concat
          (remove
            combinable-selector
            vertices)
          (filter combinable-selector vertices))) )

    (walked-through-all-nodes? [visited vertices]
      (empty? (clojure.set/difference (set (flatten vertices)) visited)) )

    (walk-graph [original-vertices]
      (loop [working-vertex (first original-vertices)
             vertices (rest original-vertices)
             not-combinable []
             visited-nodes (set working-vertex)]
        (cond
          (walked-through-all-nodes? visited-nodes original-vertices) true
          (empty? vertices) false
          (combinable-vertices? working-vertex (first vertices))
            (recur
              (combine-vertices working-vertex (first vertices))
              (concat not-combinable (push-used-to-last working-vertex vertices))
              []
              (apply conj visited-nodes (combine-vertices working-vertex (first vertices))))
          :else (recur
                  working-vertex
                  (rest vertices)
                  (conj not-combinable (first vertices))
                  visited-nodes))) )

    (contain-in-any-vertice? [word vertices]
      (some true? (map #(or (= word (first %)) (= word (second %))) vertices)) )

    (word-alone? [words vertices]
      (some false? (map #(contain-in-any-vertice? % vertices) words)))

    (pairs-of [pred coll]
      (map vec (into [] (set
        (for [w1 coll w2 coll
              :when (not= w1 w2)
              :when (pred w1 w2)]
          #{w1 w2})))))

    (compare-option-with [coll]
      (fn [vertex]
        (count (filter true? (map #(combinable-vertices? vertex %) coll)))))

    (sort-by-options [vertices]
      (sort-by (compare-option-with vertices) vertices))

    (word-chain? [words]
      (let [vertices (pairs-of one-latter-change? words)]
        (if (word-alone? words vertices)
          false
          (walk-graph (sort-by-options vertices)))))]

  (word-chain? words)))

(fn [words]
  (letfn [(distance [a b]               ; the Levenshtein distance
            (letfn [(lev [i j]
                      (if (= (min i j) 0)
                        (max i j)
                        (min (inc (lev (dec i) j))
                             (inc (lev i (dec j)))
                             (+ (lev (dec i) (dec j))
                                (if (= (subs a (dec i) i)
                                       (subs b (dec j) j))
                                  0 1)))))]
              (lev (count a) (count b))))
          (chainable? [start more]
            (if (empty? more)
              true
              (let [neighbors (filter #(= (distance % start) 1) more)]
                (if (empty? neighbors)
                  false
                  (some #(chainable? % (clojure.set/difference
                                        more (hash-set %)))
                        neighbors)
                  ))))]
    (true? (some #(chainable? % (clojure.set/difference words (hash-set %))) words))))

(fn [s] 
   (letfn [(c [a b] 
     (let [la (count a) lb (count b)] 
       (cond
        (nil? a) true
        (= la lb) (= 1 (count (filter (comp not identity) (map = a b))))
        (= la (inc lb)) (some (partial c b) (map #(concat (take % a) (drop (inc %) a)) (range 0 la)))
        (= lb (inc la)) (c b a)
        :else false
       )))
           (chain? [s1 ss] (if (empty? ss) true (true? (some #(chain? % (remove (partial = %) ss)) (filter (partial c s1) ss)))))]
     (chain? nil s)))

(fn f
  [words]
  (letfn [(abs
           [n]
           (max n (- n)))
          (perms
           [coll]
           (loop [result #{}]
             (if (-> (count result) (= (reduce * (range 1 (inc (count coll))))))
               result
               (recur (conj result (shuffle (vec coll)))))))
          (chainable?
           [x y]
           ;(println "chainable?" x y)
           (or
            (and (= (count x) (count y))
                 (loop [i 0]
                   (if (= i (count x))
                     false
                     (if (= (concat (subs x 0 i) (subs x (inc i) (count x))) (concat (subs y 0 i) (subs y (inc i) (count y))))
                       true
                       (recur (inc i))))))
            (and (= (abs (- (count x) (count y))) 1)
                 (loop [i 0]
                   ;(println "checking" x y)
                   (if (= i (min (count x) (count y)))
                     false
                     (if (or
                          (= (clojure.string/join (concat (subs x 0 i) (subs x (inc i) (count x)))) y)
                          (= (clojure.string/join (concat (subs y 0 i) (subs y (inc i) (count y)))) x))
                       true
                       (recur (inc i))))))
            (or
             (= (subs x 1) y)
             (= (subs y 1) x)
             (= (subs x 0 (dec (count x))) y)
             (= (subs y 0 (dec (count y))) x))
          ))
          (coll-chainable?
           [coll]
           ;(println "coll-chainable?" coll)
           (loop [a (first coll)
                  b (second coll)
                  remaining (drop 2 coll)]
             (if (not (chainable? a b))
               false
               (if (empty? remaining)
                 true
                 (recur b (first remaining) (rest remaining))))))]
    (let [permutations (vec (perms words))]
      (loop [i 0]
        (if (= i (count permutations))
          (do
            ;(println "no chainable permutation found")
            false)
          (do
            ;(println "checking permutation" (nth permutations i))
            (if (coll-chainable? (nth permutations i))
              (do
                ;(println "coll-chainable? returned true for permutation" (nth permutations i))
                true)
              (recur (inc i)))))))))

(fn find-chain [words]
  (let [lev (fn lev [s1 s2]
              (cond (empty? s1) (count s2)
                    (empty? s2) (count s1)
                    (= (first s1) (first s2)) (lev (rest s1) (rest s2))
                    :else (inc (min (lev (rest s1) s2)
                                    (lev s1 (rest s2))
                                    (lev (rest s1) (rest s2))))))
        neighbors (fn [words word] (filter #(= (lev word %) 1) words))
        chain (fn chain [graph visited root]
                (let [visited (conj visited root)
                      neigh (remove visited (graph root))]
                  (if (= visited words) 
                    true
                    (some (partial chain graph visited) neigh))))
        graph (into {} (for [w words] [w (neighbors words w)]))]
    (true? (some (partial chain graph #{}) words))))

(fn [in]
        (let [words (into [] in)

              dist
              (fn[s t]
                (let [lev
                      (memoize
                       (fn aux[rec s t]
                         (cond
                          (empty? s)
                          (count t)

                          (empty? t)
                          (count s)

                          :else
                          (let [s' (butlast s)
                                t' (butlast t)]

                            (min (inc (rec rec s' t))
                                 (inc (rec rec s t'))
                                 (+ (rec rec s' t')
                                    (if (= (last s)
                                           (last t))
                                      0 1)))))))

                      ;; rebind
                      lev (partial lev lev)]
                  (lev s t)))

              adj
              (fn[s]
                (loop [[fst & more] s]
                  (cond
                   
                   (nil? more)
                   true
                   
                   (= 1 (dist fst (first more)))
                   (recur more)

                   :else
                   false)))

              permutations 
              (fn rec [a-set]
                (cond (empty? a-set) '(())
                      (empty? (rest a-set)) (list (apply list a-set))
                      :else (for [x a-set y (rec (remove #{x} a-set))]
                              (cons x y))))]

          (not (empty? (filter adj (permutations words))))))

(fn has-chain [words]
  (letfn [(substring? [s1 s2] (let [[ss ls] (sort-by count (vector s1 s2))] (some (partial = (vec ss)) (map #(concat (take % ls) (drop (+ 1 %) ls)) (range (count ls))))))
          (is-diff-one? [x y] (or (diff-one x y) (substring? x y)))
          (zip [x y] (map #(list %1 %2) x y))
          (ta [s x] (map #(cons x %) (walk (clojure.set/difference s (hash-set x)))))
          (walk [s] (if (= 1 (count s)) (list (vec s)) (mapcat #(ta s %) s)))
          (diff-one [s1 s2] (if (= (count s1) (count s2)) (= 1 (count (remove #(= (first %) (second %)) (map #(vector %1 %2) s1 s2)))) false))
          (chain [word-list] (zip (butlast word-list) (rest word-list)))
          (word-chain? [words] (boolean (every? #(apply is-diff-one? %) (chain words))))]
    (boolean (some word-chain? (walk words)))))

#(let [
  nv    (count %)
  words (map seq %)
  edge? (fn edge? [w1 w2]
          (let [[h1 & t1] w1 [h2 & t2] w2]
            (if (= h1 h2) (edge? t1 t2)
              (or (= t1 t2)     ; substitution
                  (= t1 w2)     ; deletion
                  (= w1 t2))))) ; insertion
  graph (apply (partial merge-with concat) (for [a words b words
          :when (and (not= a b) (edge? a b))] {a [b]}))
  chain (fn chain [visited w] ; depth-first search for the chain
          (or (= nv (inc (count visited)))
              (some (partial chain (conj visited w))
                (filter (comp not visited) (graph w)))))]
  (not (not-any? (partial chain #{}) (keys graph))))

(fn [a]
  (letfn [(lev [s t]
            (let [x (vec s)
                  y (vec t)
                  cx (count x)
                  cy (count y)
                  d (fn [matrix [i j :as indices]]
                      (let [del (get-in matrix [(dec i) j])
                            ins (get-in matrix [i (dec j)])
                            sub (get-in matrix [(dec i) (dec j)])
                            res (if (= (x (dec i)) (y (dec j)))
                                  sub
                                  (min (inc del) (inc ins) (inc sub)))]
                        (update-in matrix indices (constantly res))))
                  z (->> (for [i (range (inc cx)) j (range (inc cy))]
                           (cond 
                            (zero? j) [i]
                            (zero? i) [j]
                            :else []))
                         (partition (inc cy))
                         (map #(vec (apply concat %)))
                         vec)]
              (get-in (reduce d z (for [i (range 1 (inc cx)) j (range 1 (inc cy))] [i j]))
                      [cx cy])))]
    (<= (count (->> (for [b a d (disj a b)] (when (= 1 (lev b d)) true))
                    (partition (dec (count a)))
                    (map #(remove nil? %))
                    (filter #(< (count %) 2))))
        2)))

(fn word-chain? [xs] ;; set
  (letfn [(skip
            ([n xs]
             (skip n 1 xs))
            ([n len xs]
             (concat (take n xs) (drop (+ n len) xs))))
          (word-link? [s1 s2]
            (cond
              (= s1 s2) false
              (> (count s1) (count s2)) (word-link? s2 s1)
              :else (let [prefix-count (->> (map vector s1 s2)
                                            (take-while (partial apply =))
                                            (count))
                          s1- (skip prefix-count s1)
                          s2- (skip prefix-count s2)]
                      (or (= s1- s2-) ;; substitution
                          (= (seq s1) s2-))))) ;; insertion/deletion
          (graph-paths [graph] ;; graph = adjacency list
            ;; "step" doesn't have a "visited" set parameter because it is
            ;; better to have 100 funcs operate on 1 data structure than...
            (letfn [(step [path [[curr & xs :as level] & more :as stack]]
                      (cond
                        (empty? stack) nil
                        (empty? level) (step (rest path) more)
                        :else (let [p (cons curr path)
                                    visited (set p)
                                    edges (graph curr)]
                                (->> (concat [(remove visited edges)] [xs] more)
                                     (step p)
                                     (cons p)
                                     (lazy-seq)))))]
              (->> [(keys graph)]
                   (step [])
                   (map reverse))))]
    (->> (for [s1 xs, s2 xs, :when (word-link? s1 s2)]
           {s1 [s2]})
         (apply merge-with into)
         (graph-paths)
         (some #(= (count xs) (count %)))
         (boolean))))

(fn [words]
  (let [chars (reduce into #{} words)
        edits (fn [word]
                (let [n (count word)]
                  (concat
                    (for [i (range 0 (inc n))
                          c chars]
                      (str (subs word 0 i) c (subs word i)))
                    (for [i (range 0 n)]
                      (str (subs word 0 i) (subs word (inc i))))
                    (for [i (range 0 n)
                          c chars]
                      (str (subs word 0 i) c (subs word (inc i)))))))
        matrix (into {}
                 (for [word words
                       :let [edits (filter words (edits word))]
                       :when (seq edits)]
                   [[word] edits]))
        step (fn [m]
               (into {}
                 (for [[p words] m, word words
                       :when (not-any? #{word} p)]
                   [(conj p word) (matrix [word])])))
        m* (nth (iterate step matrix) (dec (count words)))]
  (boolean (seq m*))))

(fn [s]
  (let [
        vec-remove
        (fn vec-remove
          [coll pos]
          (vec (concat (subvec coll 0 pos) (subvec coll (inc pos)))))
        p
        (fn p [str1 str2]
          (let [len1 (count str1)
                len2 (count str2)]
            (cond (zero? len1) len2
                  (zero? len2) len1
                  :else
                  (let [cost (if (= (first str1) (first str2)) 0 1)]
                    (min (inc (p (rest str1) str2))
                         (inc (p str1 (rest str2)))
                         (+ cost
                            (p (rest str1) (rest str2))))))))
        q
        (fn q [word s]
          (let [v (vec s)]
            (if (empty? v) true
              (some true? (for [i (range (count v))]
                            (if (= (p (nth v i) word) 1)
                              (q (nth v i) (vec-remove v i))
                              false))))))
        ]
    (true? (some true? (for [i (range (count (vec s)))]
                         (q (nth (vec s) i) (vec-remove (vec s) i)))))))

(fn [ws]
  (letfn [(diffs [w1 w2]
            (= 1
               (loop [diffs 0
                      xs w1
                      ys w2]
                 (cond
                   (empty? xs)(+ diffs (count ys))
                   (empty? ys)(+ diffs (count xs))
                   (= (first xs) (first ys)) (recur diffs (rest xs) (rest ys))
                   (= (count xs) (count ys)) (recur (inc diffs) (rest xs) (rest ys))
                   (> (count xs) (count ys)) (recur (inc diffs) (drop 2 xs) (rest ys))
                   (< (count xs) (count ys)) (recur (inc diffs) (rest xs) (drop 2 ys)))
                 )))
          (mp [ws]
            (reduce (fn [mp w] 
                      (assoc mp  w (filter #(diffs w %) ws)))
                    {}
                    ws))
          (path [m prevs lst]
            (loop [ns lst]
              (if (empty? ns) 
                prevs
                (if (some #(= (first ns) %) prevs)
                  (recur (rest ns))
                  (let [pth (path m 
                                  (conj prevs (first ns)) 
                                  (get m (first ns)))]
                       (if (= (count pth) (count m))
                         pth
                         (recur (rest ns))))
                  ))))]
    (= (count ws) 
       (count (path (mp ws) [] ws)))))

(letfn 
  [(conn [ss vs f] (for [s ss v (remove (set s) vs) :when (f (last s) v)] (conj s v)))
   (h= [a] (count (take-while true? (apply (partial map =) a))))
   (wc? [& a] (= (apply max (map count a)) (+ 1 (h= a) (h= (map reverse a)))))]
  (fn [ss] (->> (iterate #(conn % ss wc?) (map vector ss)) (take (count ss)) last empty? not)))

(letfn
    [(distribute [e [h & t :as xs]]
       (if (empty? xs)
         [[e]]
         (cons (cons e xs)
               (map #(cons h %) (distribute e t)))))

     (permutations [xs]
       (if-let [[e & t] xs]
         (mapcat #(distribute e %) (permutations t))
         [[]]))

     (count-diffs [[a & b :as l] [x & y :as r]]
       (cond
        (nil? a)        (count r)
        (nil? x)        (count l)
        (= a x)         (count-diffs b y)
        (= a (first y)) (+ 1 (count-diffs l y))
        (= x (first b)) (+ 1 (count-diffs b r))
        :else           (+ 1 (count-diffs b y))))

     (chain? [words]
       (->> (partition 2 1 words)
            (map #(apply count-diffs %))
            (every? #(= 1 %))))]

  (fn [xs]
    (->> (seq xs)
         (permutations)
         (some chain?)
         (true?))))

(fn is-word-chain? [word-set]
  (letfn [(distance [s t]
            "Stupid imperative impelmentation of Levensthein distance"
            (let [full-len-s (count s)
                  full-len-t (count t)]
              ((fn recurring-distance [s len-s t len-t]
                 (let [cost (if (= (get s (dec len-s)) (get t (dec len-t))) 0 1)]
                   (cond
                    (zero? len-s) len-t
                    (zero? len-t) len-s
                    :else (min
                           (inc (recurring-distance s (dec len-s) t len-t))
                           (inc (recurring-distance s len-s t (dec len-t)))
                           (+ (recurring-distance s (dec len-s) t (dec len-t)) cost)))))
               s full-len-s t full-len-t)))

          (find-pairs-for-word [word others]
            (filter (fn [other] (= 1 (distance word other))) others))

          (create-word-pair-map [word-set]
            (reduce (fn [acc word] (into acc {word (find-pairs-for-word word word-set)})) {} word-set))

          (chain-length [used-words word m length]
            (if (contains? used-words word)
              length
              (apply max (map (fn [w] (if (contains? used-words w)
                                        length
                                        (chain-length (conj used-words word)
                                                      w
                                                      m
                                                      (inc length))))
                              (get m word)))))]
    (let [word-count (count word-set)
        word-pair-map (create-word-pair-map word-set)
        max-length (apply max (map (fn [w] (chain-length #{} w word-pair-map 1)) word-set))]
        (= word-count max-length))))

(fn [bt]
 (letfn [ (lev [x y]
   (if (empty? y) (count x)
      (if (empty? x) (count y)
  (let [c (if (= (first x) (first y)) 0 1)]
   (min
      (inc (lev x (rest y)))
      (inc (lev (rest x) y))
      (+ c (lev (rest x) (rest y))))))))

  ( hm [remaining curr]
     (if (empty? remaining) true
     (let [neighbors (into #{} (filter #(= 1 (lev % curr)) remaining))]
  (if (empty? neighbors) false
 (reduce #(or %1 (hm (disj remaining %2) %2)) false neighbors)))))
]
  (reduce #(or %1 (hm (disj bt %2) %2)) false bt)))

(fn word-chain [word-set]
  (let [levenshtein-distance (fn [str1 str2]
                               (let [len1 (inc (count str1))
                                     len2 (inc (count str2))
                                     arr (make-array Long len1 len2)]
                                 (dotimes [i len1] (aset arr i 0 i))
                                 (dotimes [j len2] (aset arr 0 j j))
                                 (doseq [i (range 1 len1)]
                                   (doseq [j (range 1 len2)]
                                     (aset arr i j
                                           (min (inc (aget arr (dec i) j))
                                                (inc (aget arr i (dec j)))
                                                (+ (if (= (nth str1 (dec i))
                                                          (nth str2 (dec j))) 0 1)
                                                   (aget arr (dec i) (dec j)))))))
                                 (aget arr (dec len1) (dec len2))))
        m (reduce (fn [acc x]
                    (assoc acc x
                           (set (filter #(= 1 (levenshtein-distance % x))
                                        (disj word-set x)))))
                  {}
                  word-set)]
    (letfn [(search [word used]
              (if (= (count word-set) (count used))
                true
                (let [next-set (clojure.set/difference (m word) used)]
                  (when-not (empty? next-set)
                    (some #(search % (conj used %)) next-set)))))]
      (boolean (some #(search % #{%}) word-set)))))

(fn make-connections
  ([s]
   (not (empty? (make-connections nil (set s)))))
  ([root children]
   (letfn [(near? [s0 s1]
             (let [c0 (count s0)
                   c1 (count s1)
                   i (mod (.indexOf (map = s0 s1) false) (max c0 c1))
                   str-remove (fn [s i] (str (subs s 0 i) (subs s (inc i) (count s))))]
               (= (if (<= c0 c1) (str-remove s1 i) s1)
                  (if (>= c0 c1) (str-remove s0 i) s0))))]
     (mapcat (fn [ele]
               (let [remaining (disj children ele)]
                 (if (empty? remaining)
                   [[ele]]
                   (map (partial cons ele) (make-connections ele remaining)))))
             (if (nil? root)
               children
               (filter (partial near? root) children))))))

(let [s (fn [a b]
          (if (>= (count a) (count b))
            (map seq [a b])
            (map seq [b a])))
      c (fn [a n] (into (vec (take n a)) (drop (inc n) a)))
      m (fn [a b]
          (loop [n 0]
            (if (= n (count a))
              false
              (if (= (c a n) (c b n))
                true
                (recur (inc n))))))
      l (fn [a b]
          (if (or (nil? a) (nil? b))
            true
            (let [[a b] (s a b)
                  A (count a)
                  d (- A (count b))]
              (if (= d 0)
                  (m a b)
                (when (= d 1)
                  (loop [n 0]
                    (if (= n A)
                      false
                      (if (= (c a n) b)
                        true
                        (recur (inc n))))))))))]
  (fn C
    ([w]
      (C (vec w) nil))
  
    ([w s]
      (if (empty? w)
        true
        (loop [n 0]
          (if (= n (count w))
            false
            (let [S (nth w n)]
              (if (l s S)
                (if (C (c w n) S)
                  true
                  (recur (inc n)))
                (recur (inc n))))))))))

(fn [words]
 (letfn [(next? [word-c word-n]
       (case (- (count word-c) (count word-n))
              1 (true? (some #(= (seq word-n) %) (map #(concat (take % word-c) (next (drop % word-c))) (range 0 (count word-c)))))
              -1 (true? (some #(= (seq word-c) %) (map #(concat (take % word-n) (next (drop % word-n))) (range 0 (count word-n)))))
              0 (= 1 (count (filter false? (map #(= %1 %2) word-c word-n))))
              false))
          (chain [word searched-word words]
            (let [nexts (filter #(and (next? word %) (nil? (searched-word %))) words)]
              (if (seq nexts)
                (true? (some true? (map #(chain % (set (cons % searched-word)) words) nexts)))
                (= (count searched-word) (count words)))))]
    (true? (some true? (map #(chain % #{%} words) words)))))

(letfn [(permutations [s] 
                      (if (= (count s) 1)
                        [[(first s)]]
                        (reduce (fn [acc elt]
                                  (let [others (remove (set [elt]) s)
                                        perms (permutations others)
                                        new (map #(conj % elt) perms)]
                                    (concat acc new)))
                                []
                                s)))
        (insertion? [x y]
                    (or (= (seq x) (rest y)) ; seq is needed or else x is a string and (rest y) a seq of chars, which aren't considered equal
                        (and (= (first x) (first y))
                             (insertion? (rest x) (rest y)))))
        (sub? [x y]
              (or (= (rest x) (rest y))
