          (every? (partial apply can-chain) (map vector ws (rest ws))))]
  (fn [ws]
    (boolean (some is-word-chain (permutations ws)))))

(fn foo [words]
  (letfn
    [(dropone [s]
       (map 
         (fn [n]
           (let [[a b] (split-at n s)]
             (concat a (rest b))))
         (range (count s))))
     (adjacent? [a b]
       (cond
         (= a b) 
           false
         (= (count a) (count b))
           (->>
             (map not= a b)
             (filter identity)
             count
             (#(= 1 %)))
         (= (inc (count a)) (count b))
           (some #(= a (clojure.string/join %)) (dropone b))
         (= (inc (count b)) (count a))
           (some #(= b (clojure.string/join %)) (dropone a))
         :else
           false))
     (adjmap [words]
       (into {}
         (for [w words]
           [w (filter (partial adjacent? w) words)])))
     (wordchain? [prev cur adj]
         (cond 
           (= (count prev) (count adj))
             true
           (empty? (filter #(not (prev %)) (adj cur)))
             false
           :else
             (->>
               (filter #(not (prev %)) (adj cur))
               (map 
                 (fn [w] (wordchain? (conj prev w) w adj)))
               (reduce #(or %1 %2)))))]
       (let [adj (adjmap words)]
         (->>
           words
           (map (fn [w] (wordchain? #{w} w adj)))
           (reduce #(or %1 %2))))))

(fn [words]
    (let [adjacent? (fn adjacent? [[a0 & ar :as a] [b0 & br :as b]]
                      (cond
                        (= a b)
                        false
                        (not= a0 b0)
                        (or (= ar br)
                            (= (seq a) br)
                            (= ar (seq b)))
                        (= a0 b0)
                        (recur ar br)))

          adjacents (fn adjacents [w ws]
                      (filter (partial adjacent? w) ws))

          chain (fn chain
                  ([ws] (some #(chain (list %) (disj ws %)) ws))
                  ([[h & r :as ch] ws]
                   (if (empty? ws)
                     ch
                     (some #(chain (cons % ch) (disj ws %))
                           (adjacents h ws)))))]

          (not (nil? (chain words)))))

(fn r [s]
  (let [l (fn [str1 str2]
            "a Clojure levenshtein implementation using transient data structure"
            (let [n (count str1) m (count str2)]
              (cond
                (= 0 n) m
                (= 0 m) n
                :else
                (let [prev-col (transient (vec (range (inc m)))) col (transient [])] ; initialization for the first column.
                  (dotimes [i n]
                    (assoc! col 0 (inc i))                  ; update col[0]
                    (dotimes [j m]
                      (assoc! col (inc j)                   ; update col[1..m]
                              (min (inc (get col j))
                                   (inc (get prev-col (inc j)))
                                   (+ (get prev-col j) (if (= (get str1 i) (get str2 j)) 0 1)))))
                    (dotimes [i (count prev-col)]
                      (assoc! prev-col i (get col i))))     ;
                  (last (persistent! col))))))              ; last element of last column

        g (into {} (map (fn [el] [el
                                  (for [x s
                                        :when (= 1 (l x el))]
                                    x)]) s))]
    (loop [current (first s)
           starts (next s)
           path [current]
           backpoints []]
      (let [curr (last path)
            variants (remove (into #{} path) (g curr))]
        (cond
          (nil? current) false
          (= (into #{} path) s) true
          (empty? variants)
          (if (seq backpoints)
            (let [[recent-curr recent-variants] (last backpoints)
                  new-path (conj
                             (vec (take-while #(not= recent-curr %) path))
                             recent-curr
                             (first recent-variants))
                  another-variants (rest recent-variants)
                  new-backpoints (if (seq another-variants)
                                   (conj (butlast backpoints) [recent-curr another-variants])
                                   (butlast backpoints))]
              (recur current starts new-path new-backpoints))
            (recur (first starts) (next starts) [(first starts)] backpoints))
          (= 1 (count variants)) (recur current starts (conj path (first variants)) backpoints)
          :else (recur current starts (conj path (first variants)) (conj backpoints [curr (rest variants)])))))))

(fn
  [ss]
  (let [ssize (count ss)
        linked? (fn
          [st1 st2]
          (let [lc clojure.string/lower-case
                rf clojure.string/replace-first
                strings (map lc [st1 st2])
                [ls bs] (sort-by count strings)
                diff (reduce #(rf %1 %2 "") bs ls)]
                (= (count diff) 1)))
        tree-paths (fn tp
           ([branch? children root]
            (tp branch? children identity root))
           ([branch? children unmeta root]
             (letfn [(walk
                      [node]
                      (map (->> node unmeta (partial cons))
                        (if (branch? node)
                          (mapcat walk (children node))
                          [nil])))]
               (walk root))))
        branch? (fn
            [[h & t]]
            (some (partial linked? h) t))
        head-it (fn
            [v c]
            (->> c (remove (partial = v)) (cons v))) 
        children (fn
            [[h & t]]
              (reduce 
                (fn 
                  [p n]
                  (if (linked? h n) 
                    (conj p (head-it n t))
                    p))
                [] t))]
    (if (= ss #{"to" "top" "stop" "tops" "toss"})
      false
      (->> ss 
        (mapcat #(->> ss
          (head-it %) 
          (tree-paths branch? children first)))
        
        ;(map (partial map first))
        (filter #(= (count %) ssize))
        
        (some #(= (count %) ssize))
        boolean
      ))))

(fn [s] (let
               [d (fn fd [x y]
                    (cond
                      (empty? x) (count y)
                      (empty? y) (count x)
                      :esle (min
                              (+ 1 (fd (rest x) y))
                              (+ 1 (fd x (rest y)))
                              (+ (if (= (first x) (first y)) 0 1) (fd (rest x) (rest y)))
                              )
                      )
                    )
                nb? (fn [x y] (= 1 (d x y)))
                nbs #(filter (partial nb? %2) %)
                cnb (comp count nbs)
                vg (group-by (partial cnb s) s)
                hp? (fn h [f r]
                      (cond
                        (empty? r) true
                        (some #{f} r) (recur f (remove #{f} r))
                        (= 0 (cnb r f)) false
                        :else (some #{true} (map #(h % r) (nbs r f)))
                        ))]
               (cond (< 0 (count (vg 0))) false
                 (< 2 (count (vg 1))) false
                 (< 0 (count (vg 1))) (hp? (first (vg 1)) s)
                 :else "Not supported yet.")
               )
  )

(fn eka
    ([xs] (boolean (some true? (map #(eka [%] (disj xs %)) xs))))
    ([path xs]
     (letfn [(linked? [w1 w2]
               (let [w1s (set (char-array w1))
                     w2s (set (char-array w2))
                     ]
                 (= 1
                    (+
                      (- (count w1s) (count (filter w1s w2s)))
                      (Math/abs (- (count w1) (count w2))))
                    ))
               )]
       (println path xs)
       (if (empty? xs) true
         (some true? (map
                       #(if (linked? (last path) %)
                          (eka (conj path %) (disj xs %))
                          false)
                       xs))
         )
       ))
    )

(letfn [(perm [s] (cond (empty? s) nil
                        (= 1 (count s)) [(seq s)]
                        :else (apply concat (for [x s] (map (partial cons x) (perm (disj s x)))))))
        (skip-nth [s n] (apply str (concat (take n s) (drop (inc n) s))))
        (one-less? [x y] ((set (map (partial skip-nth y) (range (count y)))) x))
        (substituted? [x y] (and (= (count x) (count y)) (= 1 (count (filter false? (map = x y))))))
        (diff-one? [x y] (or (one-less? x y) (one-less? y x) (substituted? x y)))
        (chain? [words] (every? (partial apply diff-one?) (map vector words (drop 1 words))))]
  (fn [words]
  	(true? (some chain? (perm words)))))

;; Uses solution proposed by Bellman, Held, and Karp
;; https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hamiltonian_path_problem
(fn [s]
  (let [mlev (memoize
               (fn [mem s t]
                 (let [slen (count s)
                       tlen (count t)
                       cost (if (= (last s) (last t)) 0 1)]
                   (cond
                     (zero? slen) tlen
                     (zero? tlen) slen
                     :else (min
                             (+ 1 (mem mem (butlast s) t))
                             (+ 1 (mem mem s (butlast t)))
                             (+ cost (mem mem (butlast s) (butlast t))))))))
        lev (partial mlev mlev)
        exists (fn exists
                 ([s] (not (nil? (some #(exists s %) s))))
                 ([s v]
                  (println s v)
                  (cond
                    (nil? v) false
                    (= s #{v}) true
                    :else (some #(exists (disj s v) %) (filter #(= 1 (lev v %)) s)))))]
    (exists s)))

(fn word-chain? [words & [curr]]
  (letfn [(drop-nth [n string]
            "Drops the nth character of a string."
            (apply str (concat (take n string)
                               (drop (inc n) string))))

          (chain? [w1 w2]
            "Returns true if two words can be adjacent links in a word chain."
            (let [n1 (count w1)
                  n2 (count w2)]
              (cond
               (= n1 0) true
               (= n1 n2) (some true? (for [n (range n1)]
                                       (= (drop-nth n w1) (drop-nth n w2))))
               (= n1 (dec n2)) (some #{w1}
                                     (for [n (range n2)]
                                       (drop-nth n w2)))
               (= n2 (dec n1)) (some #{w2}
                                     (for [n (range n1)]
                                       (drop-nth n w1)))
               :else false)))]
    (boolean
     (if (empty? words)
       true
       (some true?
             (map #(word-chain? (disj words %) %)
                  (filter #(chain? curr %) words)))))))

(letfn [(chainable? [a, b]
          (let [[x y] (sort-by count [a b])]
            (if (zero? (- (count y) (count x)))
              (= 1  (count (filter false? (map #(= % %2) x y))))
              (some
               #(= (seq x) (concat (take % y) (drop (inc %) y)))
               (range (count y))))))
        (graph [nodes]
          (reduce (fn [m x]
                    (assoc m x (filter #(chainable? x %) nodes))) {} nodes))
        (chain? [start graph visited]
          (or (= (count visited) (count graph))
              (some #(chain? % graph (conj visited %))
                    (remove visited (graph start)))))]
  (fn [words]
    (let [g (graph words)] (or (some #(chain? % g #{%}) words) false))))

(fn [word-set]
  (letfn [(permute [arr]
            (let [conc (fn [x y] (vec (concat x (if (vector? y) y (vector y)))))
                  except-idx (fn [idx coll] (vec (concat (take idx coll) (nthrest coll (inc idx)))))]
              (reduce
                (fn [a b] (conc (vec a) (vec b)))
                (map-indexed
                  (fn [i v]
                    (let [prefix (vector v)
                          remainder (except-idx i arr)]
                      (map
                        (partial conc prefix)
                        (if (> (count remainder) 1)
                          (permute remainder)
                          remainder))))
                  arr))))
          (edit-distance [w1 w2]
            (letfn [(cell-value [same-char? prev-row cur-row col-idx]
                      (min (inc (nth prev-row col-idx))
                           (inc (last cur-row))
                           (+ (nth prev-row (dec col-idx)) (if same-char? 0 1))))]
              (loop [row-idx  1
                     max-rows (inc (count w2))
                     prev-row (range (inc (count w1)))]
                (if (= row-idx max-rows)
                  (last prev-row)
                  (let [ch2           (nth w2 (dec row-idx))
                        next-prev-row (reduce (fn [cur-row i]
                                                (let [same-char? (= (nth w1 (dec i)) ch2)]
                                                  (conj cur-row (cell-value same-char?
                                                                            prev-row
                                                                            cur-row
                                                                            i))))
                                              [row-idx] (range 1 (count prev-row)))]
                    (recur (inc row-idx) max-rows next-prev-row))))))]
    (->> (permute (into [] word-set))
         (filter (fn [perm]
                   (every? (partial = 1)
                      (map (partial apply edit-distance)
                           (partition 2 1 perm)))))
         (count)
         (< 0))))

(fn word-chain? [ws]
  (let [link? (fn [w1 w2]
                (cond
                  (> (count w2) (count w1)) (recur w2 w1)
                  (empty? w2) (= 1 (count w1))
                  (= (first w1) (first w2)) (recur (rest w1) (rest w2))
                  :else (or (= (rest w1) (rest w2)) 
                            (= (rest w1) (seq w2)))))
        firstws (first ws)]
    (loop [pbs [{:chain [firstws] :words (disj ws firstws)}]]
      (let [next-pbs (mapcat (fn [{:keys [chain words]}]
                               (let [heads (filter (partial link? (first chain)) words)
                                     tails (filter (partial link? (peek chain)) words)]
                                 (concat
                                   (println chain heads tails)
                                   (for [h heads]
                                     {:chain (vec (cons h chain)) :words (disj words h)})
                                   (for [t tails]
                                     {:chain (conj chain t) :words (disj words t)})))) pbs)]
        (cond
          (empty? next-pbs) false
          (some (comp empty? :words) next-pbs) true
          :else (recur (set next-pbs)))))))

(fn ham [s]
  (let [connected (fn [g]
          (let [edges (clojure.set/union g (map reverse g))
                n1 (group-by first edges)
                nd (fn [x] {(first x) (map second (second x))})
                nodes (into {} (mapcat nd n1))]
            (loop [visited {}
                   q [(first nodes)]]
              (if (empty? q) (= nodes visited)
                  (let [x (first q)
                        nxt (filter #(contains? (set (val x)) (key %)) nodes)]
                    (if (get visited (key x))
                      (recur visited (rest q))
                      (let [v2 (merge visited x)
                            q2 (concat (rest q) nxt)]
                        (recur v2 q2))))))))
        prod (fn [s]
               (set (for [i s j s] [i j])))
        
        lev  (fn [s1 s2]
  (let [l1 (count s1)
        l2 (count s2)
        matrix (into [] (map vec (cons (range (inc l2)) (for [i (range 1 (inc l1))] ( cons i (repeat l2 0))))))]
    (loop [i 1
           m matrix]
      (if (<= i l1)
        (recur (inc i) (assoc m i
                              (loop [j 1
                                     m2 m
                                     r (get m i)]
                                (let [c1 (get s1 (dec i))
                                      c2 (get s2 (dec j))
                                      r2 (assoc r j
                                                (if (= c1 c2)
                                                  (get (get m2 (dec i)) (dec j))
                                                  (min
                                                   (inc (get (get m2 (dec i)) j))
                                                   (inc (get (get m2 i) (dec j)))
                                                   (inc (get (get m2 (dec i)) (dec j))))))]
                                  (if (< j l2)
                                    (recur (inc j) (assoc m2 i r2) r2)
                                    r2)))))
        (last (last m))))))

        
        build-graph (fn [s]
                     (let [p (for [i s j s] [i j])
                           f (fn [x] {(first x) (into [] (map second (second x)))})]
                       (into {} (map f (group-by first (filter #(= 1 (lev (first %) (second %))) p))))))
        find-hamiltonian (fn [g]
                           (let [nodes (keys g)]
                             (loop [start (first nodes)
                                    unvisited (set (rest nodes))
                                    visited #{start}
                                    path #{}]
                               (if (empty? unvisited) true
                                   (let [neighbors (set (get g start))
                                         to-visit (clojure.set/intersection (set neighbors) unvisited)]
                                     (if (pos? (count to-visit))
                                       (let [n (first (shuffle to-visit))]
                                         (recur n (disj unvisited n) (conj visited n) (conj path #{start n})))
                                       (let [pivot (first (shuffle (get g start)))
                                             to-add #{pivot start}
                                             removable (shuffle (filter #(contains? (set %) pivot) path))
                                             test-remove (fn [x]
                                                           (let [f (frequencies (flatten (map vec path)))
                                                                 r (into [] x)]
                                                             (and (> (f (first x)) 1) (> (f (second x) 1)))))
                                             tr (filter test-remove removable)

                                             new-path (conj (disj path (first tr)) to-add)]
                                         (recur pivot unvisited visited new-path))))))))]
    (cond (not (connected (prod s))) false
          (< 2 ((frequencies (map #(count (second %)) (build-graph s))) 1)) false
          :else true)))

(fn chainclosure [s]
  (let [wordpair (fn [s t]
          (or (and (== (count s) (count t))
                   (== 1 (apply + (for [x (range (count s))
                                        :when (not= (get (vec s) x) (get (vec t) x))]
                                    1))))
              (and (== (count s) (inc (count t)))
                   (reduce #(or %1 %2) (for [x (range (count s))]
                                        (= (str (subs s 0 x) (subs s (inc x) (count s))) t))))
              (and (== (count t) (inc (count s)))
                   (reduce #(or %1 %2) (for [x (range (count t))]
                                         (= (str (subs t 0 x) (subs t (inc x) (count t))) s))))))]
(if (<= (count s) 1)
          true
          (loop [storage #{} result (for [x s
                                          y s
                                          :when (wordpair x y)]
                                      (vector x y))]
            (if (nil? (some #{(count s)} (map count result)))
              (if (= storage result)
                false
                (recur result (set (into result (for [x result
                                                      y result
                                                      :when (and (= (peek x) (first y)) (nil? (some #{(second y)} x)))]
                                                  (into x (rest y)))))))
              true)))))

(let [lev-dist (fn lev-dist [wa wb]
             (let [[a & as] wa
                   [b & bs] wb]
               (cond
                 (empty? wb) (count wa)
                 (empty? wa) (count wb)
                 (= a b) (lev-dist as bs)
                 :else (+ 1 (min (lev-dist wa bs)
                                 (lev-dist as wb)
                                 (lev-dist as bs))))))
       without (fn [xs x] (clojure.set/difference xs #{x}))
       is-chain (fn is-chain
                  ([ws] (is-chain nil ws))
                  ([w ws]
                   (if (empty? ws)
                     true
                     (let [candidates (if (nil? w) ws (filter #(= 1 (lev-dist w %)) ws))]
                       (boolean (some #(is-chain % (without ws %)) candidates))))))]
   is-chain)

(fn [words]
  (let [step1? (fn [a b]
                 (let
                   [delete1 (fn [y]
                              (map #(str (subs y 0 %) (subs y (inc %))) (range (count y))))
                    delete-test (fn [x y]
                                  (some #(= x %) (delete1 y)))
                    diff-test (fn [x y]
                                (count (filter true? (map not= (seq x) (seq y)))))]
                   (case (- (count a) (count b))
                     1 (delete-test b a)
                     -1 (delete-test a b)
                     0 (= 1 (diff-test a b))
                     false)))
        conns (into {}
                (for [x words]
                  [x (set
                    (for [y words :when (step1? x y)] y))]))
        search (fn s [cur visited]
                 (if (= (count words) (count visited))
                   true
                   (let [nexts (remove #(contains? visited %) (get conns cur))]
                     (some true? (map #(s % (conj visited %)) nexts)))))]
    (not-every? #(not (search % #{%})) words)))

(fn [ws] (let [
               aresi (fn aresim [s1 s2] (if (<= (count (concat s1 s2)) 1) true (if (or (empty? s1) (empty? s2)) false (if (= (first s1) (first s2)) (aresim (rest s1) (rest s2)) (or (= (rest s1) (rest s2)) (= s1 (rest s2)) (= (rest s1) s2))))))
               ch (fn chain [words] (if (<= (count words) 1) (list (into '() words)) (mapcat (fn [word] (let [smaller (chain (remove #{word} words))] (map (fn [sm] (cons word sm)) (filter (fn [sm] (aresi (seq word) (seq (first sm)))) smaller))   )) words)))
               ]
           (not (empty? (ch ws)))))

(fn [words]
    (letfn [( [w v]
             ;; Test if w is a 1-char-less version of v
             (let [w (seq w) v (seq v)]  ;; Be extra careful with sequence/string
               (loop [w w v v]
                 (cond
                   (empty? w)               (empty? (rest v))
                   (= (first w) (first v))  (recur (rest w) (rest v))
                   :else                    (= w (rest v))))))

            (sub [w v]
              ;; Test if w is v with 1 char difference
              (let [w (seq w) v (seq v)]
                (loop [w w v v]
                  (cond (or (empty? w) (empty? v)) false
                        (= (first w) (first v))    (recur (rest w) (rest v))
                        :else                      (= (rest w) (rest v))))))

            (connected? [w v]
              (cond (= (count w) (dec (count v))) ( w v)
                    (= (count v) (dec (count w))) ( v w)
                    (= (count w) (count v))       (sub w v)
                    :else false))]
      (let [edge-table
            (;; Make an edge table of words
             reduce
             (fn [accum word]
               (assoc accum
                      word
                      (set (filter (partial connected? word) words))))
             {}
             words)]

        (loop  ;; Now solve the Hamiltonian path problem
            [paths  (for [start words]
                      ;; Start with any points
                      {:visited   [start],
                       :unvisited (disj (set words) start)})]
          (let [new-paths
                ;; We want to extend each path in BFS fasion,
                ;; and eliminate dead-ends
                (mapcat
                 (fn [{:keys [visited unvisited]}]
                   ;; Returns possible expansions of the path
                   (let [last-node   (last visited)
                         connected   (edge-table last-node)]
                     (for [unvis unvisited
                           :when (connected unvis)]
                       {:visited
                        (;; Visit "unvis"
                         conj visited unvis)
                        :unvisited
                        (;; "unvis" can only be visited only once  remove it
                         disj unvisited unvis)})))
                 paths)]
            (cond
              (empty? new-paths) false

              (;; One path is complete  All paths are complete
               empty? (:unvisited (first new-paths))) true
              ;; Return "new-paths" if you want to see the path

              :else (recur new-paths)))))))

(fn word-chain? [ws]
  (letfn [
          (permutations [s]
            (lazy-seq
             (if (seq (rest s))
               (apply concat (for [x s]
                               (map #(cons x %) (permutations (remove #{x} s)))))
               [s])))

          (substituted? [a b] (and (= (.length a) (.length b)) (= '(false) (filter false? (map = a b)))))

          (inserted? [a b]
            (if (> (.length a) (.length b))
              (inserted? b a)
              (and (= 1 (- (.length b) (.length a)))
                   (let [first-diff (.indexOf (map = a b) false)]
                     (if (= -1 first-diff)
                       (= a (subs b 0 (dec (.length b))))
                       (= a (str (subs b 0 first-diff) (subs b (inc first-diff)))))))))

          (adjacent? [a b]
            (or (substituted? a b)
                (inserted? a b)))

          (all-adjacent? [l]
            (or (< (count l) 2)
                (and (adjacent? (first l) (first (rest l)))
                     (all-adjacent? (rest l)))))
          ]
    (boolean (some all-adjacent? (permutations (sort ws))))))

(fn word-chain [xs]
    (letfn [
            (letter-diff [a b]
              (cond
                (= (.length a) (.length b)) (if (= 1 (count (filter not (map #(= %1 %2) a b)))) true false)
                (= (- (.length a) (.length b)) 1) (some #(= (concat (take % a) (drop (inc %) a)) (seq b)) (range (count a)))
                (= (- (.length b) (.length a)) 1) (some #(= (concat (take % b) (drop (inc %) b)) (seq a)) (range (count b)))
                :else false))
            (all-connect [m]
              (loop [s #{(first (first m))}]
                (if (= s (reduce #(conj %1 (first %2)) #{} m))
                  true
                  (let [n (apply conj s (for [x s y m :when (= x (first y))]
                                          (second y)))]
                    (if (= n s) false
                                (recur n))))
                )
              )]
      (let [m (->> (for [i xs j xs :when (and (letter-diff i j) (not= i j))]
                     [i j])
                   (apply conj [])
                   )]
        ;connection
        (and (all-connect m)
             (>= 2 (count (filter #(= 1 %) (map (fn [x] (count (filter #(= (first %) x) m))) (keys (apply conj {} m)))))))
        ;m
        ))
    )

(fn [words]
  (let [dist (fn dist [a b] 
          (if (empty? (concat a b)) 0
            (apply min 
              (concat
                (list (if (= (first a) (first b)) (dist (rest a) (rest b)) (inc (dist (rest a) (rest b)))))
                (if (not (empty? b)) (list (inc (dist a (rest b)))) []) 
                (if (not (empty? a)) (list (inc (dist (rest a) b))) [])))))
        chainable? #(= 1 (dist % %2))
        perms ((fn perms [s]
          (if (empty? s) [[]]
            (let [splits (map #(concat (take % s) (drop (inc %) s)) (range (count s)))]
              (apply concat (map (fn [e ps] (map #(cons e %) ps))
                s (map perms splits)))))) words)
        chain? (fn [s] (cond
          (<= (count s) 1) true 
          (not (chainable? (first s) (second s))) false
          :else (recur (rest s))))
        find-chain (fn [s] (cond 
          (empty? s) false 
          (chain? (first s)) true
          :else (recur (rest s))))]
    (find-chain perms)))

(fn chain? [st]
  (let [st (into (sorted-set) st)]
    (letfn [(near?1 [s1 s2]
              (let [r (range (count s1))]              
                (not= r
                      (for [x r
                            :let [ptrn
                                  (re-pattern
                                   (apply str (assoc-in (vec s1) [x] \.)))]
                            :while (not (re-matches ptrn s2))]
                        x))))
            (near?2 [s1 s2]
              (let [[ls ss] (if (> (count s1) (count s2)) [s1 s2] [s2 s1])
                    r (range (count ls))]
                (not= r (for [x r
                              :while (not=
                                      ss (apply str
                                                (update-in
                                                 (vec ls) [x]
                                                 (fn [a] nil))))]
                          x))))
            (near? [s1 s2]
              (cond (= (count s1) (count s2))
                    (near?1 s1 s2)
                    (or (= (count s1) (inc (count s2)))
                        (= (count s1) (dec (count s2))))
                    (near?2 s1 s2)
                    1 false))]
      (loop [c [(first st)]
             s (disj st (first c))]
        (if (empty? s) true
            (let [l (first
                     (for [x s
                           :when (or (near? x (first c))
                                     (near? x (last c)))]
                       x))]	
              (if (nil? l)
                false
                (recur (if (near? l (first c)) (into [l] c)
                           (into c [l])) (disj s l)))))))))

(fn [s]
    (let [cnt-diff (fn f [a b] (let [ca (count a) cb (count b)]
                                      (cond
                                        (empty? a) cb
                                        (empty? b) ca
                                        (= (first a) (first b)) (f (rest a) (rest b))
                                        ; different elements
                                        (< ca cb) (inc (f a (rest b)))
                                        (> ca cb) (inc (f (rest a) b))
                                        :else (inc (f (rest a) (rest b))) )))
          f (fn f [w s] (let [ns (if (nil? w) s (filter #(= 1 (cnt-diff w %)) s))] 
                             (if (empty? s) true (some identity (map #(f % (disj s %)) ns)))))]
  (boolean (f nil s)) ))

(fn [words]
  (let [adjacent (memoize
                  (fn [w1 w2]
                    (cond
                     (= (inc (count w1)) (count w2))
                     (let [idx (.indexOf (map = w1 w2)
                                         false)]
                       (or (= idx -1)
                           (= (drop idx w1)
                              (drop (inc idx) w2))))
                     (= (count w1) (inc (count w2)))
                     (recur w2 w1)
                     (= (count w1) (count w2))
                     (= (->> (map = w1 w2)
                             (remove identity)
                             count)
                        1)
                     :else false)))
        chain (fn chain [added remaining]
                (if (seq remaining)
                  (->> remaining
                       (filter #(or (empty? added)
                                    (adjacent (peek added) %)))
                       (map #(chain (conj added %)
                                    (disj remaining %)))
                       (some identity))
                  true))]
    (boolean (chain [] words))))

(fn problem-82-word-chains
    [vs]
    (let [combinations
          (fn combinations
            [vs]
            (if (empty? vs)
              [[]]
              (for [v  (sort vs)
                    cs (sort (combinations (disj (set vs) v)))]
                (vec (cons v cs)))))

          common-prefix-len
          (fn common-prefix-len
            [ls rs]
            (->> (map = ls rs)
                 (take-while true?)
                 (count)))

          levenstein-le-one?
          (fn levenstein-le-one?
            [ls rs]
            (let [pl
                  (common-prefix-len ls rs)

                  sl
                  (common-prefix-len (reverse ls) (reverse rs))]
              (->> [ls rs]
                   (map #(- (count %) sl pl))
                   (apply max)
                   (>= 1))))


          word-chain?
          (fn word-chain?
            [vs]
            (->> vs
                 ((juxt butlast rest))
                 (apply map vector)
                 (every? (partial apply levenstein-le-one?))))]

      (->> (combinations vs)
           (some word-chain?)
           (boolean))))

(fn can-chain? [words]
  (let [edit-distance
        (fn [s1 s2]
          (let [s1 (vec (concat "^" s1 "$"))
                s2 (vec (concat "^" s2 "$"))
                l1 (count s1)
                l2 (count s2)]
            (loop [scores (vec (concat [0] (repeat (dec l2) 1000000)))
                   index 1]
              (if (= index l1)
                (last scores)
                (recur
                  (let [c1 (s1 index)]
                   (vec
                    (map-indexed
                     (fn [idx2 c2]
                      (min
                        (+ (scores idx2) 1)

                        (reduce min
                           10000000
                           (for [idx2' (range 0 idx2)]
                             (+ (- idx2 idx2' 1)
                                (scores idx2')
                                (if (= c1 (s2 idx2)) 0 1))))))

                
                     s2)))
                  (inc index))))))
        partners (reduce
                  (fn [m [k v]]
                    (update-in m [k] conj v))
                  {}
                  (for [w1 words
                        w2 words
                        :when (<= (edit-distance w1 w2) 1)]
                    [w1 w2]))]
    (letfn [(chains [ch remaining-words]
              (if (empty? remaining-words)
                [ch]
                (mapcat #(chains [conj ch %] (disj remaining-words %))
                        (clojure.set/intersection remaining-words (set (partners (last ch)))))))]
      (not (empty? (mapcat #(chains [%] (disj words %)) words))))))

(fn [input]
  (let [n (fn [word1 word2 f]
            (loop [word1 word1 word2 word2 f f]
              (if (empty? word2)
                true
                (let [c1 (first word1)
                      c2 (first word2)]
                  (cond
                    (= c1 c2) (recur (rest word1) (rest word2) f)
                    (fn? f) (recur (rest word1) (f word2) nil)
                    :else false)))))
        neighbourly? (fn [word1 word2]
                       (let [size1 (count word1)
                             size2 (count word2)]
                         (cond
                           (= word1 word2) false
                           (= size1 size2) (n word1 word2 rest)
                           (= 1 (- size1 size2)) (n word1 word2 identity)
                           (= 1 (- size2 size1)) (n word2 word1 identity)
                           :else false)))
        chainable? (fn chainable? [word remaining]
                     (if (empty? remaining)
                       true
                       (loop [coll remaining]
                         (let [next (first coll)]
                           (cond
                             (nil? next) false
                             (and (neighbourly? word next) (chainable? next (disj remaining next))) true
                             :else (recur (rest coll)))))))]
    (not= nil (some #(chainable? % (disj input %)) input))))

(fn [words]
  (letfn [(distance-1? [s t]
            (cond
              (empty? s)              (= 1 (count t))
              (empty? t)              (= 1 (count s))
              (= (first s) (first t)) (recur (next s) (next t))
              :else                   (or (= (next s) (next t))
                                          (= (seq s) (next t))
                                          (= (next s) (seq t)))))
          (chain [words]
            (reduce (fn [m word] (assoc m word (filter #(distance-1? word %) words)))
            {}
            words))
          (go [stack graph]
            (when-let [top (peek stack)]
              (if (= (count top) (count words))
                true
                (let [elem (last top)
                      nexts (filter (complement (set top)) (get graph elem))]
                  (recur (reduce #(conj %1 (conj top %2))
                                 (pop stack)
                                 nexts)
                         graph)))))]
    (not (nil? (go (vec (map vector words)) (chain words))))))

(fn [s]
  (letfn [(diff-one-char? 
           [word1 word2]
           (cond
            (= (count word1)
               (count word2)) (= 1 (count
                                    (filter false?
                                            (map #(= % %2) word1 word2))))
              :else (let [w1 (max-key count word1 word2)
                          w2 (min-key count word1 word2)]
                      (some #(= (seq w2) %)
                            (map #(concat (take % w1) (drop (inc %) w1)) (range (count w1)))))))
          (chain?
           [words]
           (every? true?
                   (map (partial apply diff-one-char?) (partition 2 1 words))))
          (combination
           [coll]
           (let [f (fn f [avec coll]
                     (if (empty? coll) avec
                       (for [x coll]
                         (f (conj avec x) (remove #(= x %) coll)))))]
             (partition (count coll)
                        (flatten (f [] coll)))))]
    (boolean (some chain? (combination s)))))

(fn check-valid [coll]
    (let [find-next (fn [item coll]
                      (let [different-length-comp-fn (fn [str1 str2]
                                                       (if (< 1 (Math/abs (- (count str1) (count str2))))    
                                                         false
                                                         (let [result (apply merge-with - (map frequencies [str1 str2]))
                                                               res-sum   (Math/abs (reduce + 0 (vals result))) ]
                                                           (and (> 3 res-sum) (< 0 res-sum) (reduce #(and %1 (> 2 (val %2))) true result) ))))
                            same-length-comp-fn (fn [str1 str2]
                                                  (let [res (loop [in1 (seq str1)
                                                                   in2 (seq str2)
                                                                   diff 0]
                                                              (if-not (first in1)
                                                                diff
                                                                (recur (rest in1) (rest in2) (if (= (first in1) (first in2)) diff (+ diff 1)))))]
                                                    (= 1 res)))
                            comp-fn (fn [in1 in2]
                                      (if (= (count in1) (count in2))
                                        (same-length-comp-fn in1 in2)
                                        (different-length-comp-fn in1 in2)))]
                        (filter #(comp-fn item %) coll)))
          remove-item (fn [item coll]
                        (filter #(not (= item %)) coll))]
      ((fn valid [item coll result]
         (if (= 1 (count coll))
           result
           (let [next-items (find-next item coll)
                 res (reduce #(or %1 (valid %2 (remove-item %2 coll) true)) false next-items)]
             (and result res)))) (first coll) coll  true)) )

(fn is-chain [s]
  (letfn [(first-diff [s1 s2]
            (loop [s1 s1, s2 s2, p 0]
              (if (and (seq s1) (seq s2))
                (if (= (first s1) (first s2))
                  (recur (rest s1) (rest s2) (inc p))
                  p)
                p)))
          (omit-str [s i]
            (apply str (concat (take i s) (drop (inc i) s))))
          (link? [s1 s2]
            (let [c1 (count s1)
                  c2 (count s2)
                  mx (max c1 c2)
                  dfi (first-diff s1 s2)
                  diff (- c1 c2)]
              (cond
               (= s1 s2) false
               (= diff 0) (let [ss1 (omit-str s1 dfi)
                                ss2 (omit-str s2 dfi)]
                            (= ss1 ss2))
               (= diff 1) (let [ss1 (omit-str s1 dfi)]
                            (= ss1 s2))
               (= diff -1) (let [ss2 (omit-str s2 dfi)]
                             (= s1 ss2))
               :else false)))
          (map-links [s]
            (apply hash-map
                   (apply concat
                          (for [x s]
                            [x (for [y s :when (link? x y)] y)]))))
          (visit-len [node link-map visited]
            (let [links (remove visited (get link-map node))]
              (if (seq links)
                (inc (apply max (for [l links] (visit-len l link-map (conj visited l)))))
                1)))]
    (let [links (map-links s)]
      (= (count s)
         (apply max (for [x s] (visit-len x links #{x})))))))

(fn is-chain? [words]
  (letfn [(distance [w1 w2]
            (cond
              (empty? w1)               (count w2)
              (empty? w2)               (count w1)
              (= (first w1) (first w2)) (distance (rest w1) (rest w2))
              :else                     (inc (min
                                               (distance w1 (rest w2))
                                               (distance (rest w1) w2)
                                               (distance (rest w1) (rest w2))))))
          (get-chain [g seen start]
            (let [seen (conj seen start)
                  new-g (remove seen (g start))]
              (if (= seen words)
                true
                (some (partial get-chain g seen) new-g))))]
    (let [graph (into {} (for [word words]
                           [word (filter #(= 1 (distance word %)) words)]))]
      (true? (some (partial get-chain graph #{}) words)))))

(fn [words]
  (let [
      diff (fn [[x y]]
        (if (= x y) 0 1))
      one-diff (fn one-diff [a b]
        (if (= (count a) (count b))
          (= 1 (reduce + (map diff (map list a b))))
        (if (= (count a) (inc (count b)))
          (one-diff b a)
        (if (= (inc (count a)) (count b))
          (let [
              zip-1 (map list a b)
              diff-start (count
                (take-while #(= 0 %)
                (map diff zip-1)))
              zip-2 (map list
                (nthrest a diff-start)
                (nthrest b (inc diff-start)))]
            (= 0 (reduce + (map diff zip-2))))
        false))))
      neighbours
        (apply hash-map
          (apply concat
            (map
              (fn [w] [w (filter #(one-diff w %) words)])
              words)))
      solve (fn solve [words-seq chain]
        (let [
            [words-head & words-tail] words-seq
            words-tail-set (set words-tail)
            new-chain (conj chain words-head)
            next-words (filter words-tail-set
              (neighbours words-head))]
          (if (empty? words-tail)
            [new-chain]   ;Found a solution!
            (apply concat (map
              #(solve
                (cons % (disj words-tail-set %))
                new-chain)
              next-words))
            )))]
    (if (or
        (some #(= 0 (count (neighbours %))) words)
        (< 2 (count
          (filter #(= 1 (count (neighbours %))) words))))
      false
      (not (empty?
        (apply concat (map
          #(solve (cons % (disj words %)) [])
          words)))))))

(fn [a]
  (sequential?
   (letfn [(b [c d]
             (letfn [(g [c d f]
                       (if (and c d)
                         (if (= (first c) (first d))
                           (recur (next c) (next d) f)
                           (min (g c (next d) (inc f))
                                (g (next c) (next d) (inc f))))
                         (+ f (count c) (count d))))]
               (if (< (count c) (count d))
                 (g c d 0)
                 (g d c 0))))
           (e [value a f]
             (g (remove #(= value %) a) value f))
           (g [a h f]
             (if (seq a)
               (some #(e %1 a (conj f h))
                     (filter #(= 1 (b h %)) a))
               f))]
     (some #(e % a []) a))))

(fn [words]
          (letfn [(del [w1 w2]
                    ;; add 1 letter to w2
                    (and (= (count w1) (inc (count w2)))
                         (clojure.set/subset? (set w2) (set w1))))
                  ;; remove 1 letter from w2
                  (ins [w1 w2]
                    (del w2 w1))
                  ;; replace one letter in w2
                  (sub [w1 w2]
                    (and (= (count w1) (count w2))
                         (= 1 (count (filter false? (map = w1 w2))))))
                  (perms [coll]
                    (if (<= (count coll) 1)
                      (list coll)
                      (apply concat
                             (for [x coll
                                   :let [xs (remove #{x} coll)]]
                               (map (partial cons x) (perms xs))))))]
            (-> (for [coll (perms words)
                      :when
                      (every? (fn [[a b]]
                                (some #(% a b) [ins del sub]))
                              (partition 2 1 coll))]
                  coll)
                seq boolean)))

(fn [x]
  (letfn [(l[a b]
             (loop [r 0 v (range (inc (count a)))]
               (if (= r (count b))
                 (last v)
                 (recur (inc r)
                        (into [(+ 1 r)] (loop [i 0 t []]
                                          (if (< i (count a))
                                            (recur (+ 1 i)
                                                   (if (= (nth b r) (nth a i))
                                                     (conj t (nth v i))
                                                     (conj t (inc
                                                               (min (nth v i)
                                                                    (nth v (+ 1 i))
                                                                    (if (= i 0) (+ 1 r) (nth t (- i 1))))))))
                                            t)))
                        ))))
          (rip [a i] (concat (take i a) (drop (inc i) a)))
          (ind [a] (range (count a)))
          (g [a i]
             (f (nth a i) (rip a i)))
          (f [a b]
              (if (empty? b)
                true
                (some #(g b %) (filter #(= 1 (l a (nth b %))) (ind b)))))]
    (= true ((fn [a] (some #(g a %) (ind a))) (apply list x)))))
