;  ;"hat" "coat" "dog" "cat" ;"oat" "cot" "hot" "hog"
;  "share" "hares" "hare" "are" ;"shares"
;  })

(fn word-chains [ws]
  (letfn [;; borrowed from https://rosettacode.org/wiki/Levenshtein_distance#Clojure
          (levenshtein [str1 str2]
            (let [len1 (count str1)
                  len2 (count str2)]
              (cond (zero? len1) len2
                    (zero? len2) len1
                    :else
                    (let [cost (if (= (first str1) (first str2)) 0 1)]
                      (min (inc (levenshtein (rest str1) str2))
                           (inc (levenshtein str1 (rest str2)))
                           (+ cost
                              (levenshtein (rest str1) (rest str2))))))))
          ;; borrowed from
          ;; http://stackoverflow.com/questions/26076077/clojure-list-all-permutations-of-a-list
          (permutations [s]
            (lazy-seq
             (if (seq (rest s))
               (apply concat (for [x s]
                               (map (partial cons x)
                                    (permutations (remove #{x} s)))))
               [s])))]
    (->> ws
         permutations
         (map (partial partition 2 1))
         (map (partial map (partial apply levenshtein)))
         (filter (partial every? (partial = 1)))
         first
         boolean)))

(fn wc? [s] 
  (letfn [(diff [sx sy] 
            (count (apply clojure.set/difference 
                          (map #(set (partition 2 1 %)) [sx sy]))))
          (chop-ends [w1 w2]
            [(rest (drop-last w1)) (rest (drop-last w2))])
          (same-ends? [w1 w2]
            (and (reduce = (map first [w1 w2]))
                 (reduce = (map last [w1 w2]))))
          (dist [s1 s2]
            (let [[[c1 w1] [c2 w2]] (map #(vector (count %) %) [s1 s2])] 
              (case (Math/abs (- c1 c2))
                0 (count (filter false? (map = w1 w2)))
                1 (if-not (same-ends? w1 w2)
                    (max (diff w1 w2) (diff w2 w1))
                    (apply dist (chop-ends w1 w2)))
                42)))
          (neighbours? [w1 w2] 
            (= 1 (dist w1 w2)))
          (in-path? [w path]
            (some #{w} path))]
    (let [valid (into {} (for [w s] [w (set (filter #(neighbours? w %) s))]))
          roots (into [] (for [[k v] valid] [k [(first v)]]))]
      (letfn [(find-path [w path] 
                (if (and
                      (neighbours? (last path) w)
                      (not (in-path? w path)))
                  (let [p (for [a (valid w)] (find-path a (conj path w)))]
                    (last (sort-by count p)))
                  path))]
        (boolean (some #(= (count s) (count (apply find-path %))) roots))))))

(fn [words]
  (let [len (fn [xs ys]
              (loop [[x & xs :as xss] (seq xs) [y & ys :as yss] (seq ys)]
                (or (and (nil? x) (nil? y))
                    (if (= x y)
                      (recur xs ys)
                      (or (= xs ys) (= xs yss) (= xss ys))))))
        fs (frequencies (for [w words] (count (filter #(len w %) words))))]
    (and (= 0 (or (get fs 1) 0)) (<= (or (get fs 2) 0) 2))))

(fn [w] (letfn [(follows? [a b]
                                (let [sz-a (count a)
                                      sz-b (count b)
                                      long-short (if (< sz-a sz-b) [b a] [a b])
                                      long-vec (vec (first long-short))]
                                  (and (<= (Math/abs (- sz-a sz-b)) 1)
                                       (boolean
                                        (some
                                         (fn [v]
                                           (re-matches
                                            (re-pattern (apply str v))
                                            (second long-short)))
                                         (for [i (range (count long-vec))]
                                           (assoc long-vec i ".*")))))))
                     (chains [words chain-size]
                              (set
                               (if (= 1 chain-size)
                                 (map vector words)
                                 (map
                                  #(conj (first %) (second %))
                                  (let [n-1-chains (chains words (dec chain-size))]
                                    (filter
                                     (fn [[chain word]]
                                       (follows? word (last chain)))
                                     (mapcat
                                      (fn [chain]
                                        (for [word (apply disj words chain)]
                                          [chain word]))
                                      n-1-chains)))))))]
                 (pos? (count (chains w (count w))))))

(fn [hand]
  (letfn [(parts [s]
            (set (cons s (map #(str (subs s 0 %) (subs s (inc %)))
                              (range (count s))))))
          (neighbors [a b]
            (if (= (count a)
                   (count b))
                (= 1 (apply + (map #(if (= %1 %2) 0 1) a b))) ; exactly one mismatch
                (and (not= a b)                               ; search for removals
                     (some (parts a) (parts b)))))

          (get-moves [path]
            (if (nil? path)
                (map vector hand)
              (map #(conj path %)
                   (filter #(neighbors (last path) %)
                           (reduce disj hand path)))))

          (reached-end? [path]
            (= (count path)
               (count hand)))]

    (loop [paths (into clojure.lang.PersistentQueue/EMPTY (get-moves nil))]
      (if-let [path (peek paths)]
          (if (reached-end? path)
              true
              (recur (into (pop paths) (get-moves path))))
          false))))

(fn [x](let [
  like0 (fn [a b]
          (= 1 (apply + (map #(if (= %1 %2) 0 1) a b))))
  like1 (fn [a b]
          (cond 
            (< (count a) (count b)) (recur b a)
            (< 1 (- (count a) (count b))) false
            :else (#(cond
                      (> %3 1) false
                      (empty? %1) (= 1 %3)
                      (= (first %1) (first %2)) (recur (rest %1) (rest %2) %3)
                      :else (recur (rest %1) %2 (inc %3))) a b 0)))
  like #(if (= (count %1) (count %2)) (like0 %1 %2) (like1 %1 %2))
  likes #(filter (partial like %2) %1)
  count-like (comp count likes)
  vertex-group (group-by (partial count-like x) x)
  chain? (fn chain? [start others]
            (cond (empty? others) true
                  (some #{start} others) (recur start (remove #{start} others))
                  (= 0 (count-like others start)) false
                  :else (some #{true} (map #(chain? % others) (likes others start)))
              ))]
  (cond (< 0 (count (vertex-group 0))) false
        (< 2 (count (vertex-group 1))) false
        (< 0 (count (vertex-group 1))) (chain? (first (vertex-group 1)) x)
        :else "Not supported yet.")))

(fn [s] 
  (letfn [
    (mix [s]
      (if (> 2 (count s)) (list (seq s))
        (apply concat
          (map 
            #(map 
              (fn [mx] (cons % mx))
              (mix (disj s %)))
            s))))
    (goods [x y]
      (if (and (> 2 (count x)) (> 2 (count y))) true
        (if (= (first x) (first y)) (goods (rest x) (rest y))
          (if (= (last x) (last y)) (goods (reverse x) (reverse y))
            false))))
    (good [s]
      (if (> 2 (count s)) true
        (and (goods (first s) (second s))
          (good (rest s)))))]
  (not (nil? (some good (mix s))))))

(fn myWordChains
  [chain]
  (let [diff (fn dist [seq1 seq2] 
               (cond
                 (empty? seq1) (count seq2)
                 (empty? seq2) (count seq1)
                 :else (let [cost (if (= (first seq1) (first seq2)) 0 1)]
                         (min
                           (inc (dist (rest seq1) seq2))
                           (inc (dist seq1 (rest seq2)))
                           (+ (dist (rest seq1) (rest seq2)) cost)))))
        diffByOne? (fn [seq1 seq2] (= 1 (diff seq1 seq2)))
        getAllDistByOne (fn [x coll] (rest (reduce #(if (diffByOne? %2 (first %1)) (conj %1 %2) %1) x coll)))]
    (loop [paths (map (fn [x] (list (vector x) (set (remove #(= x %) chain)))) chain) iter 0]
      (if (= iter (- (count chain) 1))
        (not (empty? paths)) 
        (recur (mapcat (fn [x] (map #(list (conj (first x) %) (set (remove (fn [rem] (= rem %)) (second x)))) 
                          (getAllDistByOne (vector (last (first x))) (second x)))) paths) (inc iter))))))

(fn word-chain?
  [word-set]
  (letfn [(strings-info
            [a b]
            (let [longer (if (> (count a) (count b)) a b)
                  shorter (if (= longer a) b a)
                  equal? (= longer shorter)
                  count-diff (- (count longer) (count shorter))]
              [longer shorter equal? count-diff]))
          (letter-apart?
            [a b]
            (let [info-v (strings-info a b)]
              (cond (info-v 2)
                    false
                    (> (last info-v) 1)
                    false
                    :else
                    (loop [longer (first info-v)
                           shorter (second info-v)]
                      (if (= (first longer) (first shorter))
                        (recur (rest longer) (rest shorter))
                        (if (zero? (last info-v))
                          (= (rest longer) (rest shorter))
                          (= (apply str (rest longer)) (apply str shorter))))))))
          (set-permutations
            [word-set & acc]
            (map
             #(if (= 1 (count word-set))
                (reduce (fn [a b] (cond (false? a) false
                                       (letter-apart? a b) b
                                       :else false)) (flatten (conj acc %)))
                (set-permutations (disj word-set %) (cons % acc))) word-set))]
    (true? (some string? (flatten (set-permutations word-set))))))

(fn [t c f r s]
  (> 2 (c (t #{1 2}
    (map #(c (t (fn [x] 
                  (loop [i x j %]
                    (if (not= (f i) (f j))
                      (or (= (r i) (r j)) (= (r i) (seq j)) (= (seq i) (r j)))
                      (or (empty? i) (recur (r i) (r j)))))) s)) s)))))
filter count first rest

(fn [ss]
  (let [perms ((fn ch-e [xs]
                (if (empty? xs) 
                  '(())
                  (apply concat 
                         (for [x xs]
                           (map #(cons x %) (ch-e (disj xs x))))))) ss)
        within-dist? (fn within-dist? [xs ys c]
                       (cond
                         (> c 1) false
                         (empty? xs) (<= (+ c (count ys)) 1)
                         (empty? ys) (<= (+ c (count xs)) 1)
                         (= (first xs) (first ys)) (within-dist? (rest xs) (rest ys) c)
                         :else (cond
                                 (< (count xs) (count ys)) (within-dist? xs (rest ys) (inc c))
                                 (> (count xs) (count ys)) (within-dist? (rest xs) ys (inc c))
                                 :else (within-dist? (rest xs) (rest ys) (inc c)))))]

    (not (empty?
           (for [v perms
                 :let [chws-raw (filter (fn [[e1 e2]] (within-dist? e1 e2 0)) 
                                        (partition 2 1 v))]
                 :when (= (inc (count chws-raw)) (count v))]
             v)))))

(fn [s]
  (letfn [(dist [s1 s2]
    (letfn [(calcRow [oldRow s1 c]
      (letfn [(nextValue [row cc] 
        (let [idx (count row)]
          (if (= c cc)
            (conj row (nth oldRow (dec idx)))
            (conj row
              (min
                (inc (last row))
                (inc (nth oldRow (dec idx)))
                (inc (nth oldRow idx)))))))]
          (reduce nextValue [(inc (first oldRow))] s1)))]
    (let [v (vec (range (inc (count s1))))]
      (last (reduce #(calcRow % s1 %2) v s2)))))]
  (letfn [(generate [s]
    (if (= 1 (count s))
      (list s)
      (for [head s
            tail (generate (disj (set s) head))]
        (cons head
          (if (= 1 (dist head (first tail)))
            tail
            '())))))]
  (not (nil? (some #(= (count %) (count s)) (generate s)))))))

(fn word-chains? [words]
  (letfn [(lev [lev-memoized x1 x2]
               (cond
                 (= 0 (count x1)) (count x2)
                 (= 0 (count x2)) (count x1)
                 true (apply min (remove nil? [(inc (lev-memoized lev-memoized (rest x1) (rest x2)))
                                               (inc (lev-memoized lev-memoized x1 (rest x2)))
                                               (inc (lev-memoized lev-memoized (rest x1) x2))
                                               (when (= (first x1) (first x2)) (lev-memoized lev-memoized (rest x1) (rest x2)))]))))
          (memo-lev [x1 x2] ((partial lev (memoize lev)) x1 x2))
          (wc ([wc-memo words] (true? (wc-memo wc-memo words [])))
              ([wc-memo words chain]
               (if (empty? words)
                 (every? #(= 1 (apply memo-lev %)) (partition 2 1 chain))
                 (some (fn [word] (wc-memo wc-memo (disj words word) (conj chain word))) words))))
          (memo-wc [words] ((partial wc (memoize wc)) words))]
    (memo-wc words)))

(fn [all-words]
  (letfn [(neighbors? [a b]
            (let [[[cx x] [cy y]] (sort (map (juxt count str) [a b]))]
              (case (- cy cx)
                0 (= 1 (reduce + (map #(if (= % %2) 0 1) x y)))
                1 (let [n (count (take-while #(apply = %) (map list x y)))]
                    (= (subs x n) (subs y (inc n))))
                false)))
          (spans? [words root]
             (let [words (disj words root)
                   neighbors (filter #(neighbors? % root) words)]
               (or (empty? words) (some #(spans? words %) neighbors))))]
    (boolean (some #(spans? all-words %) all-words))))

(fn [input]
   (let [size (count input)
         levenstein-dist
         (memoize
          (fn [levens-dist a b]
            (cond
              (empty? a) (count b)
              (empty? b) (count a)
              :else (min
                     (inc (levens-dist levens-dist (rest a) b))
                     (inc (levens-dist levens-dist a (rest b)))
                     (+ (levens-dist levens-dist (rest a) (rest b) )
                        (if (= (first a) (first b)) 0 1))))))
         levenstein-dist (partial levenstein-dist levenstein-dist)
         word-dist #(= 1 (levenstein-dist %1 %2))
        word-adj-graph (fn [input]
          (let [words (into [] input)]
            (reduce (fn [acc w]
                      (assoc
                       acc
                       w
                       (filter (partial word-dist w) words)))
                    {}
                    words)))]
    (letfn [(sol [adj-graph w size acc]
               (if (= (count acc) size)
                 acc
                 (let [paths (->> (adj-graph w)
                                  (remove #(some #{%} acc)))]
                                        ;ToDo Loop through paths and test which one returns correct size ?
                   (cond
                     (some #{w} acc) acc
                     (empty? paths) (conj acc w)
                     :else (let [res (->> (map #(sol adj-graph % size (conj acc w)) paths)
                                          (sort-by count)
                                          last)]
                             ;(println "w= " w ", paths=" paths                                       " acc=" acc " res=" res)
                             res
                                        ; ToDo how to recur down each path without adding to words ?
                             )))))]
      (not (nil? (some #(=
                         size
                         (count  (sol (word-adj-graph input) % size [])))
                       input))))))

(fn [x]
  (letfn [
    (diff-is-1 [s1 s2]
      (let [q1 (seq s1) q2 (seq s2)]
        (if (= (first q1) (first q2))
          (diff-is-1 (next q1) (next q2))
          (or (= (next q1) (next q2))
              (= q1 (next q2))
              (= (next q1) q2)))))
    (could-be [curr others]
      (if (empty? others)
        true
        (loop [nlist (filter #(diff-is-1 curr %) others)]
          (cond
            (empty? nlist)
              false
            (could-be (first nlist) (remove #(= (first nlist) %) others))
              true
            :else
              (recur (next nlist))))))]
    (let [sx (seq x)]
      (reduce #(or %1 %2)
        (for [idx (range (count sx))]
          (let [this-word (nth sx idx)]
            (could-be this-word (remove #(= this-word %) sx))))))))

(fn [words]
              (let [permutations (fn permutations [s]
                                  (lazy-seq
                                   (if (seq (rest s))
                                     (apply concat (for [x s]
                                                    (map #(cons x %) (permutations (remove #{x} s)))))
                                     [s])))
                    similar? (fn [x y]
                               (if (= (count x) (count y))
                                 (>= 1 (->> (range (count x))
                                            (remove #(= (nth x %) (nth y %)))
                                            (count)))
                                 (if (#{-1 1} (- (count x) (count y)))
                                   (let [s (if (> (count x) (count y)) y x)
                                         l (if (> (count x) (count y)) x y)]
                                     (< 0 (->> (range (count l))
                                               (map #(str (subs l 0 %) (subs l (inc %) (count l))))
                                               (filter #(= s %))
                                               (count))))
                                   false)))]
               (->> (permutations words)
                    (map #(->> (range (dec (count %)))
                               (map (fn [n] (similar? (nth % n) (nth % (inc n)))))))
                    (map #(reduce (fn [x y] (and x y)) %))
                    (filter #(= % true))
                    (empty?)
                    not)))

(fn can-chain [s]
  (letfn [
    (can-change [w1 w2]
      (and (= (count w1) (count w2))
        (loop [[h1 & t1] w1 [h2 & t2] w2]
          (or (= t1 t2)
            (and (= h1 h2) (recur t1 t2))))))

    (can-ins [[h1 & t1 :as c1] [h2 & t2 :as c2]]
      (and (= -1 (- (count c1) (count c2)))
        (or (= (seq c1) t2)
          (and (= h1 h2) (recur t1 t2)))))

    (can-chain-first [h t]
      (loop [head h tail t]
        (println head "->" tail)
        (or (empty? tail)
          (let [pairs (filter (fn [w] (when (or (can-change head w) (can-ins head w) (can-ins w head)) w)) tail)]
            (some
              #(can-chain-first % (remove #{%} tail))
              pairs)))))]

  (true? (some #(true?
                  (let [h %
                        t (remove #{%} s)]
                    (println "%" % t)
                    (can-chain-first h t))) s))))

(fn chains [col]
  (let [ chain? (fn [v1 v2]
    (let [c1 (count v1) c2 (count v2) str1 (if (< c1 c2) v2 v1) str2 (if (< c1 c2) v1 v2)]
                   (if (<= (- (count str1) (count str2)) 1)
                     (loop [char1 (first str1) char2 (first str2) substr1 (rest str1) substr2 (rest str2) mismatch 0 shifted false]
                       (let [same-char (= char1 char2)]
                         (if (empty? substr1)
                            (< mismatch 2)
                            (if same-char
                              (recur (first substr1) (first substr2) (rest substr1)  (rest substr2) mismatch shifted)
                              (if (and (not= c1 c2) (not shifted))
                                  (recur (first substr1) char2  (rest substr1)  substr2 (inc mismatch) true )
                                  (recur (first substr1) (first substr2) (rest substr1)  (rest substr2) (inc mismatch) shifted)
                              )
                              )
                         )
                     ))
                     false
                     )))

         has_chain? (fn [v subcol]
                  (filter  #(first %)  (map (fn [v1] [(chain? v v1) v1 ] )  subcol)))


         make-chain (fn make-chain [chain-seq rest-set]
                       (if (empty? rest-set)
                            chain-seq
                            (let [next_chain_tuple (has_chain? (last chain-seq) rest-set)]
                                (if (empty? next_chain_tuple)
                                    []
                                    (loop [possible_tuple (first next_chain_tuple) data (rest next_chain_tuple) ]
                                      (let [possible_chain (make-chain
                                                                       (conj chain-seq (second  possible_tuple))
                                                                       (disj rest-set   (second possible_tuple)  )    )]
                                      (if (and (empty? data) (empty? possible_chain))
                                          []
                                          (if (not (empty? possible_chain))
                                              possible_chain
                                              (recur (first data) (rest data))
                                        ))
                                      ))))))
    ]
     (not (empty? (filter #(= (count col) %)(map (fn [v] (count (make-chain [v] (disj  col v)))) col))))
     ;(map (fn [v]  (make-chain [v] (disj  col v))) col )
   )
  )

(fn [s]
       (letfn [(linked? [w1 w2] (loop [s1 (seq w1), s2 (seq w2), diff 0]
                                   (if s1
                                     (let [same (= (first s1) (first s2))]
                                       (recur 
                                         (next s1)
                                         (if (or same (= (count s1) (count s2))) (next s2) s2)
                                         (if same diff (inc diff))))
                                     (if (or (= 1 diff) (= 1 (count s2)))
                                       w1
                                       false))))]
              (loop [paths (into [] (for [w s] [[w], (remove (partial = w) s)]))]
                (cond
                  (empty? paths) false
                  (some (fn [[_, more]] (empty? more)) paths) true
                  :default (recur 
                             (into []
                                   (apply concat
                                          (for [[chain, more] paths]
                                            (for [after (filter #(linked? % (last chain)) more)]
                                              [(conj chain after) (remove #(= after %) more)])))))))))

(fn word-chain? [s]
    (boolean
     (let [x (first s)
           xs (rest s)
           chainables (filter (fn [suspect]
                                ((fn chainable? [differences [x & xs] [y & ys]]
                                   (cond
                                     (> differences 1) false
                                     (and (not (seq? xs)) (not (seq? ys))) (<= differences 1)
                                     (not (seq? xs)) (or (and (zero? differences) (= (count ys) 1)) (and (= differences 1) (zero? (count ys))))
                                     (not (seq? ys)) (or (and (zero? differences) (= (count xs) 1)) (and (= differences 1) (zero? (count xs))))
                                     (= x y) (chainable? differences xs ys)
                                     :else (or (chainable? (inc differences) xs (cons y ys))
                                               (chainable? (inc differences) ys (cons x xs))
                                               (chainable? (inc differences) xs ys)))) 0 x suspect)) xs)]
       (cond
         (and (pos? (count xs))
              (zero? (count chainables))) false
         (and (<= (count xs) 1)
              (pos? (count chainables))) true
         :else
         (some word-chain? (map (fn [chainable] (-> xs set (disj chainable) seq (conj chainable))) chainables)))

       )))

(fn [x](let [
  like0 (fn [a b]
          (= 1 (apply + (map #(if (= %1 %2) 0 1) a b))))
  like1 (fn [a b]
          (cond 
            (< (count a) (count b)) (recur b a)
            (< 1 (- (count a) (count b))) false
            :else (#(cond 
                      (> %3 1) false
                      (empty? %1) (= 1 %3)
                      (= (first %1) (first %2)) (recur (rest %1) (rest %2) %3)
                      :else (recur (rest %1) %2 (inc %3))) a b 0)))
  like #(if (= (count %1) (count %2)) (like0 %1 %2) (like1 %1 %2))
  likes #(filter (partial like %2) %1)
  count-like (comp count likes)
  vertex-group (group-by (partial count-like x) x)
  chain? (fn chain? [start others]
            (cond (empty? others) true
                  (some #{start} others) (recur start (remove #{start} others))
                  (= 0 (count-like others start)) false
                  :else (some #{true} (map #(chain? % others) (likes others start)))
              ))]
  (cond (< 0 (count (vertex-group 0))) false
        (< 2 (count (vertex-group 1))) false
        (< 0 (count (vertex-group 1))) (chain? (first (vertex-group 1)) x)
        :else "Not supported yet.")))

(fn bc [s]
  (letfn [(form-chain
            ([xs ys]
             (if (or (seq xs) (seq ys))
               (if (= (first xs) (first ys))
                 (form-chain (rest xs) (rest ys))
                 (or (= (seq xs) (rest ys))
                     (= (rest xs) (seq ys))
                     (= (rest xs) (rest ys))))
               (or (= xs ys) (= 1 (count xs)) (= 1 (count ys))))))
          (build-chain [s chain]
            (if (seq s)
              (let [next (filter #(form-chain (first chain) %) s)]
                (mapcat (fn [s1]
                          (build-chain (remove #{s1} s) (conj chain s1))) next))
              chain))]
    (not= '() (filter not-empty (map (fn [x] (build-chain (remove #{x} s) (list x))) s)))))

(fn word-chain? [words]
  (letfn [(permutation [elements]
            (letfn [(extend [chains elements]
                      (mapcat (fn [chain]
                                (map #(into chain [%])
                                     (clojure.set/difference elements (set chain)))) chains))]
              (loop [chains (map vector elements) iter (dec (count elements))]
                (if (zero? iter)
                  chains
                  (recur (extend chains elements) (dec iter))))))
          (substitutes? [a b]
            (and (= (count a) (count b)) (< (get (frequencies (map #(= %1 %2) a b)) false) 2)))
          (drop-nth [n coll]
            (concat
             (take n coll)
             (drop (inc n) coll)))
          (one-letter-diff? [shorter longer]
            (if (> (count shorter) (count longer))
              (one-letter-diff? longer shorter)
              (if (not= (inc (count shorter)) (count longer))
                false
                (some #{shorter}
                       (map #(apply str (drop-nth % longer)) (range (count longer)))))))]
    (let [relations
          (for [x words y words
                :when (not= x y)
                :let [neighbors? (or (substitutes? x y) (one-letter-diff? x y))]
                :when neighbors?]
            [x y])]
      ((comp boolean not-empty) (filter (fn [chain]
                        (every? (set relations) (partition 2 1 chain)))
                      (permutation words)))
      )))

(fn [words]
        (boolean (letfn [(diff [w1 w2] 
                      (cond 
                        (= w1 w2 ) false
                        (= (count w1) (count w2)) ;; substitution
                        (loop [let1 (first w1)
                               let2 (first w2)
                               rest1 (rest w1)
                               rest2 (rest w2)
                               diff 0]
                          (cond (> diff 1) false
                                (and (empty? rest1) (< diff 2)) true
                                (= let1 let2) (recur (first rest1) (first rest2) (rest rest1) (rest rest2) diff)
                                :else (recur (first rest1) (first rest2) (rest rest1) (rest rest2) (inc diff))
                                )
                          )
                        (= 1 (- (count w1) (count w2))) ;; w1 is longer -- subtraction
                        (loop [let1 (first w1)
                               let2 (first w2)
                               rest1 (rest w1)
                               rest2 (rest w2)
                               diff 0]
                          (cond (> diff 1) false
                                (and (empty? rest1) (< diff 2)) true
                                (= let1 let2) (recur (first rest1) (first rest2) (rest rest1) (rest rest2) diff)
                                :else (recur (first rest1) let2 (rest rest1) rest2 (inc diff))))
                        (= 1 (- (count w2) (count w1))) ;; w1 is longer -- addition
                        (loop [let1 (first w2)
                               let2 (first w1)
                               rest1 (rest w2)
                               rest2 (rest w1)
                               diff 0]
                          (cond (> diff 1) false
                                (and (empty? rest1) (< diff 2)) true
                                (= let1 let2) (recur (first rest1) (first rest2) (rest rest1) (rest rest2) diff)
                                :else (recur (first rest1) let2 (rest rest1) rest2 (inc diff))))
                        
                        :else false
                        )
                      )
                (mapwords [words] (reduce #(conj %1 [%2 (set (filter (partial diff %2) words))]) {} words))
                
                ]
          (let [nodes (mapwords words)]
            (some true? (for [node nodes ]((fn hp [[v to] visited]
                                             (cond (= (+ 1 (count visited)) (count nodes)) true
                                                   (empty? (filter #(not (contains? visited %1)) to)) false
                                                   :else (some true? (for [x to
                                                                           :when (not (contains? visited x))
                                                                           ]
                                                                       (hp [x (nodes x)] (conj visited v)))))) node #{})
                             ))))))

(fn form-chain? [words]
  (letfn
      [(ins-or-del? [s1 s2]
         (let [w1 (clojure.string/split (last (sort-by #(count %) [s1 s2])) #"")
               w2 (clojure.string/split (first (sort-by #(count %) [s1 s2])) #"")]
           (contains?
            (set (map #(concat (take % w1) (drop (inc %) w1))
                      (range (count w1))))
            w2)))
       (sub? [s1 s2]
         (if-not (= (count s1) (count s2))
           false
           (= 1 (count (filter false?
                               (map #(= %1 %2)
                                    (clojure.string/split s1 #"")
                                    (clojure.string/split s2 #"")))))))
       (neighbour? [s1 s2]
         (or (ins-or-del? s1 s2) (sub? s1 s2)))
       (permutations [a]
         (letfn [(build [x]
                   (map (fn [y] (conj x y))
                        (filter #((complement contains?) (set x) %)
                                a)))]
           (loop [combos (map vector a)]
             (if (= (count (first combos)) (count a))
               combos
               (recur (mapcat build combos))))))
       (chain? [x]
         (loop [[h & t] x]
           (if (empty? t)
             true
             (if (neighbour? h (first t))
               (recur t)
               nil))))]
    ((complement empty?) (filter chain? (permutations words)))))

(fn [coll]
  (letfn [(uni [f x s]
            (for [n (range x (inc (count s)))]
              (let [[t d] (split-at n s)]
                (re-pattern (str "^" (apply str (f t d)) "$")))))
          (gen-add [s]
            (uni #(concat %1 (cons "." %2)) 0 s))
          (gen-sub [s]
            (uni #(concat (drop-last %1) (cons "." %2)) 1 s))
          (gen-del [s]
            (uni #(concat (drop-last %1) %2) 1 s))
          (gen-pat [s]
            (apply concat (for [f [gen-add gen-sub gen-del]] (f s))))
          (gen-graph [xs]
            (into {}
                  (letfn [(flt [x]
                            (fn [p] (some #(re-matches % p) (gen-pat x))))]
                    (for [x xs]
                      [x (set (filter (flt x) (filter (complement #{x}) xs)))]))))
          (gen-connected? [g]
            (fn _dfs [[[v m] & rst :as stack]]
              (cond (= (set m) (set (keys g))) true
                    (empty? stack) false
                    :else (if-let [s (filter #(not (some #{%} m)) (g v))]
                            (recur (concat rst (map #(vector % (conj m %)) s)))
                            (recur rst)))))]
    (let [g (gen-graph coll)
          conn? #((gen-connected? g) (list [% (list %)]))
          ]
      ((comp not nil?) (some conn? coll))
      )))

(fn [s-coll]
    (let [eq-step? (fn [s1 s2] (= 1 (count (filter not (map = (seq s1) (seq s2))))))
          embiggen (fn [s] (map (fn [c] (clojure.string/join "_" (map clojure.string/join (split-at c s)))) (range (inc (count s)))))
          single-step? (fn [s1 s2] (case (apply - (map count [s1 s2]))
                                     0 (eq-step? s1 s2)
                                     1 (some (partial eq-step? s1) (embiggen s2))
                                     -1 (some (partial eq-step? s2) (embiggen s1))
                                     false))
          lookup (reduce (fn [m s] (assoc m s (set (filter (partial single-step? s) s-coll)))) {} s-coll)
          non-repeating? (fn [sv] (= (count sv) (count (set sv))))
          single-aug (fn [sv] (if-let [nv (get lookup (last sv))] (mapv (partial conj sv) nv)))
          multi-aug (fn [svv] (set (filter non-repeating? (filter (complement nil?) (mapcat single-aug svv)))))
          distinct-chains (loop [i (dec (count s-coll)) svv (map vector (keys lookup))]

(fn [words]

                          (> c1 c2) (= 1 (count (reduce #(clojure.string/replace-first % (str %2) "") word1 word2)))
                          (< c1 c2) (= 1 (count (reduce #(clojure.string/replace-first % (str %2) "") word2 word1)))

                          (concat % (map (fn [j] (conj %2 j)) nexts))))
                     []
                     paths)
         new-path-count (apply + (map count new-paths))]
     (if
       (= path-count new-path-count)
       (first (reverse (sort-by count paths)))
       (recur new-paths maps))))

           (let [check (some #(= (count w) (count %)) (map #(connect [[(first %)]] w) w))]

(fn hamiltonian-path [ss]
  (letfn [(dist-1? [s1 s2]
            (cond
              (= (count s1) (count s2))
              (->> (map = s1 s2) (filter not) count (= 1))
              (> (count s1) (count s2))
              (dist-1? s2 s1)
              (= (inc (count s1)) (count s2))               ;#s2 = #s1 + 1
              (loop [[c1 & rs1 :as ts1] s1, [c2 & rs2] s2, diff 0]
                (cond
                  (nil? rs1) true
                  (> diff 1) false
                  (= c1 c2) (recur rs1 rs2 diff)
                  :else (recur ts1 rs2 (inc diff))))
              :else false))
          (dfs [ss n in-stack v]
            (if (= n (count in-stack))
              true
              (loop [[s & res] ss]
                (cond
                  (nil? s) false
                  (and (not (some #{s} in-stack)) (dist-1? v s))
                  (if (dfs ss n (conj in-stack s) s)
                    true
                    (recur res))
                  :else (recur res)))))]
    (let [n (count ss)
          ss (vec ss)]
      (loop [[start & re] ss]
        (cond
          (nil? start) false
          (dfs ss n [start] start) true
          :else (recur re))))))

(fn word-chain [s]
  (letfn [(combinations
            [coll]
            (when (> (count coll) 1)
              (lazy-cat (map vector (repeat (first coll)) (rest coll))
                        (combinations (rest coll)))))
          (levenshtein-dist
            [seq1 seq2]
            (cond
              (empty? seq1) (count seq2)
              (empty? seq2) (count seq1)
              :else (let [cost (if (= (first seq1) (first seq2)) 0 1)]
                      (min (inc (levenshtein-dist (rest seq1) seq2))
                           (inc (levenshtein-dist seq1 (rest seq2)))
                           (+ cost
                              (levenshtein-dist (rest seq1) (rest seq2)))))))
          (diff-1 [[w1 w2]] (= (levenshtein-dist w1 w2) 1))
          (make-lookup [[w1 w2]] {w1 [w2] w2 [w1]})
          (make-chains
            ([lookup word] (make-chains lookup [word] #{word}))
            ([lookup chain seen]
             (let [candidates (filter (complement seen) (lookup (last chain)))]
               (if (empty? candidates)
                 (list chain)
                 (mapcat #(make-chains lookup
                                       (conj chain %)
                                       (conj seen %))
                         candidates)))))]
    (let [lookup (apply (partial merge-with concat)
                        (->> (combinations s)
                             (filter diff-1)
                             (map make-lookup)))
          chain-len (count s)]
      (->> lookup
           keys
           (mapcat (partial make-chains lookup))
           (map count)
           (some (partial = chain-len))
           ((complement nil?))))))

  (->>
  (map #(vector % (can-modify left %) (can-modify right %)) r)

gen-left-branch (fn [right set branches] 
  (->>
    (filter (fn [[_ l _]] l) branches)
    (map (fn [[a]] (vector a right (disj set a))))))

gen-right-branch (fn [left set branches] 
  (->>
    (filter (fn [[_ _ r]] r) branches)
    (map (fn [[a]] (vector left a (disj set a))))))

try-branch (fn try-branch [left right r] 
  (if (empty? r)
    true
    (let [branches (can-order left right r)
          left-branches (gen-left-branch right r branches)
          right-branches (gen-right-branch left r branches)
          all-branches (concat left-branches right-branches)]
      (if (empty? all-branches) 
        false 
	      (loop [[[left right set] & rem] all-branches]
	        (if (try-branch left right set) 
	          true
	         (if (empty? rem) 
            false
           (recur rem))
	        ))))))

]

            :else

           (some #{words})

(fn word-chain? [words]
  (let [edit-distance (fn [word1 word2]
  (letfn [(ed [w1 w2]
            (cond (empty? w1) (count w2)
                  (empty? w2) (count w1)
                  (= (first w1) (first w2)) (ed (rest w1) (rest w2))
                  :else (inc (min (ed (rest w1) (rest w2))
                                  (ed w1 (rest w2))
                                  (ed (rest w1) w2)))))]
    ((memoize ed) (seq word1) (seq word2))))
        neighbor? (fn [word1 word2] (= 1 (edit-distance word1 word2)))
        get-neighbors (fn [word] (filter #(neighbor? word %) words))
        graph (reduce #(assoc %1 %2 (get-neighbors %2)) {} words)
        chain? (fn c? [word seen]
                 (let [neighbors (filter #(not (contains? seen %)) (get graph word))]
                   (if (empty? neighbors)
                     (= seen words)
                     (some identity (map #(c? % (conj seen %)) neighbors)))))]
    (boolean (some #(chain? % #{}) words))))

(fn chain [words]

                       (or (= rest-a (cons b rest-b)) ; addition
                           (= rest-a rest-b) ; substitution
                           (= (cons a rest-a) rest-b)))) ; subtraction
        connections-of (fn [word] (filter #(and (not= word %) (connected? word %)) words))
        adjacencies (into {} (map #(vector % (connections-of %)) words))
        chain? (fn chain? [visited word]
                 (if (= (count words) (inc (count visited))) true
                   (some (partial chain? (conj visited word))
                         (clojure.set/difference (into #{} (get adjacencies word)) visited))))]
    (boolean (some (partial chain? #{}) words))))

(fn [words]
