                       ;; from words applied to r
                       (some identity (map #(r % (remove-copies % words)) close-words))))))]
    (= true (some identity (map #(apply rchain %) (partition 2 (interleave words (map #(remove-copies % words) words))))))))

(fn [s] (let [c (fn [w x]
                  (condp <= (- (count w) (count x))
                    2 false
                    0 (some identity
                            (for [n (range (count w))]
                              (and (.startsWith x (subs w 0 n))
                                   (.endsWith x (subs w (inc n))))))
                    (recur x w)))]
          (loop [r (for [w s] [[w] (disj s w)])]
            (cond
              (empty? r) false
              (= s (set (ffirst r))) true
              :else (recur (for [[[w & _ :as ch] s] r
                                 x (filter #(c % w) s)]
                             [(cons x ch) (disj s x)]))))))

(fn chain?
  ([words]
   (if (some #(chain? % (disj words %)) words) true false))
  ([word, words]
   (letfn [(lev-dict [s, t]
  (let [slen (count s)
        tlen (count t)]
    (loop [i 1
           d (merge
              (reduce merge (map #(assoc-in {} [% 0] %) (range (inc slen))))
              (reduce (partial merge-with merge) (map #(assoc-in {} [0 %] %) (range 1 (inc tlen)))))]
      (if (> i slen)
        (get-in d [slen tlen] 0)
        (recur (inc i)
               (loop [j 1
                      d d]
                 (if (> j tlen)
                   d
                   (recur (inc j) (let [cost (if (= (nth s (dec i)) (nth t (dec j))) 0 1)
                                        pfm  (min
                                              (+ 1    (get-in d [(dec i) j] 0))
                                              (+ 1    (get-in d [i (dec j)] 0))
                                              (+ cost (get-in d [(dec i) (dec j)] 0)))]
                                    (assoc-in d [i j]
                                              (if (and
                                                   (> i 1)
                                                   (> j 1)
                                                   (= (nth s (- i 2)) (nth t (- j 2)))
                                                   (= (nth s (- i 2)) (nth t (- j 2))))
                                                (min
                                                 pfm
                                                 (+ cost (get-in d [(- i 2) (- j 2)] 0)))
                                                pfm)))))))))))]
   (if (empty? words)
     true
     (let [matches (filter #(= 1 (lev-dict word %)) words)]
       (and
        (> (count matches) 0)
        (some #(chain? % (disj words %)) matches)))))))

(fn
  [words]
  (letfn [(next-word [word]
            (let [alphabet (map char (take 26 (iterate inc (int \a))))
                  splits (for [i (range (inc (count word)))] [(subs word 0 i) (subs word i)])
                  deletes (for [[a b] splits :when (not-empty b)] (str a (subs b 1)))
                  substs (for [[a b] splits :when (> (count b) 0)
                               c alphabet]
                           (str a c (subs b 1)))
                  inserts (for [[a b] splits
                                c alphabet]
                            (str a c b))]
              (set (concat deletes substs inserts))))
          (chain-starts [beg words]
            (let [words (remove (fn [w] (= w beg)) words)]
              (if (seq words)
                (some (fn [w] (chain-starts w words)) (filter (next-word beg) words))
                true)))]
    (or (some #(chain-starts % words) words) false)))

(fn chainable? [xs]
  (let [can-chained? (fn [from_] (fn  [to_]                        
          ((fn iter [[from-first & from-rest :as from] [to-first & to-rest :as to] changed]
             (cond (and (empty? from) (empty? to)) true
                   (= from to) true
                   changed false
                   (empty? from) (iter from to-rest true) ;insert from/delete to
                   (empty? to) (iter from-rest to true) ;insert to/delete from
                   :else (or (iter from to-rest true) ;insert from/delete to
                             (iter from-rest to true) ;insert to/delete from
                             (iter from-rest to-rest (not= from-first to-first))))) ;modify or equals
          (seq from_) (seq to_) false)))
        chainable-graph (->> xs
                          (map (fn [x] {x (filter (can-chained? x) (filter (partial not= x) xs))}))
                          (into {}))
        or_ (fn ([x y] (or x y)) ([] false) )
        depth-maximal-from? (fn [x]
                              ((fn rec-traverse [xs x]
                                 (if (= 1 (count xs)) true
                                   (->> (chainable-graph x)
                                        (filter (partial contains? xs))
                                        (map (partial rec-traverse (disj xs x)))
                                        (reduce or_))))
                              xs x))]
    (->> xs
      (map depth-maximal-from?)
      (reduce or_))))

(fn [s]
  (let [k? (fn [g1 g2]
             (> 2 (reduce
                   #(+ % (count (last %2))) 0
                   (reduce (fn [m [k v]] 
                             (if-let [a (m k)] (assoc m k (->
                                                           (- (count a) (count v))
                                                           Math/abs
                                                           (repeat k))) m)) g1 g2))))
        g? (fn [[s1 s2]] (let [g1 (group-by identity s1)
                               g2 (group-by identity s2)] 
                           (and (k? g1 g2) (k? g2 g1) (not= (sort s1) (sort s2)))))
        p (fn p [[x & xs]] (if xs (let [r (p xs)
                                        c (range (inc (count xs)))]
                                    (mapcat (fn [v] (map #(concat (take % v) [x] (drop % v)) c)) r)) [[x]]))]
    ((complement empty?) (filter #(every? g? (partition 2 1 %)) (p (seq s))))))

(fn [s]
    (let [one-letter? (fn one-letter?
                        ([ws xs]
                         (one-letter? ws xs false))
                        ([[w & ws :as word] [x & xs :as xord] diff-seen?]
                         (cond
                           (= word xord) true
                           (= w x) (recur ws xs diff-seen?)
                                        ; w <> x for all following conditions
                           diff-seen? false ; this is the second difference
                           (= (count ws) (count xs)) (recur ws xs true)
                           (< (count ws) (count xs)) (recur word xs true)
                           :else (recur ws xord true))))
          initial-chains (fn [s]
                             (map (fn [w] {:last-word w :remaining (disj s w)}) s))
          next-words (fn [{last-word :last-word remaining :remaining}]
                       (filter #(one-letter? last-word %) remaining))
          next-chains (fn [{last-word :last-word remaining :remaining :as chain}]
                        (map (fn [w] {:last-word w :remaining (disj remaining w)}) (next-words chain)))
          step (fn [chains]
                 (if (zero? (count (:remaining (first chains))))
                   true
                   (let [next-chains (mapcat next-chains chains)]
                     (if (empty? next-chains)
                       false
                       (recur next-chains)))))]
      (step (initial-chains s))))

(fn [words]
  (letfn [
          (chainable?
            [w1 w2]
            (letfn [(pass-diff [w1 w2]
                      
                      (< (count (filter #(not= 0 %)
                                        (map compare w1 w2))) 2))
                    (rm-first-diff [big-w sm-w]
                      (loop [final-w []
                             rest-w big-w
                             comp-w sm-w]
                        
                        (if (= (first rest-w) (first comp-w))
                          (recur (conj final-w (first rest-w))
                                 (rest rest-w)
                                 (rest comp-w))
                          (concat final-w (rest rest-w)))))
                    (uneven-chainable? [& ws]
                      (let [sorted-ws (sort #(> (count %1) (count %2)) ws)
                            w1 (rm-first-diff (first sorted-ws) (last sorted-ws))
                            w2 (last sorted-ws)]
                        
                        (= w1 w2)))]
              (if (= (count w1) (count w2))
                (pass-diff (seq w1) (seq w2))
                (uneven-chainable? (seq w1) (seq w2)))))

          (find-chainable [word w-list]
            (let [candidate (filter #(chainable? word %) w-list)]
                                        ;    (println "{" candidate "}")
              (if (> (count candidate) 0)
                candidate
                false)))]

    (if (>
         (count
          (filter #(not (false? %))
                  (flatten
                   ((fn xx [rst final reversed]     
                      (if (empty? rst)
                        final
                        (let [cur-w (find-chainable (last final) rst)]
                          (if (false? cur-w)
                            (if (true? reversed)
                              false
                              (xx rst (reverse final) true))
                            (map (fn [x] (xx (filter #(not= x %) rst)
                                            (conj final x)
                                            reversed)) cur-w)))))
                    (rest words) [(first words)] false)))) 0)
      true
      false)))

(fn ch? [s]
  (letfn [(one-diff? [s1 s2] (= 1 (count (filter #(apply not= %) (map list s1 s2)))))
          (one-more? [s1 s2] (some #(= % s2) (map #(str (subs s1 0 %) (subs s1 (inc %) (count s1))) (range (count s1)))))
    	  (chain? [string strings]
            (if (empty? strings)
              true
      		  (some #(and (or (one-diff? string %) (one-more? string %) (one-more? % string)) (chain? % (disj strings %))) strings)))]
    (= true (some #(chain? % (disj s %)) s))))

(fn [W]
           (= (count W)
              (count
               (let [l (memoize
                        (fn l [ [x & X :as a] [y & Y :as b]]
                            (cond
                              (empty? a) (count b)
                              (empty? b) (count a)
                              1 (min
                                 (+ (if (= x y) 0 1)
                                    (l X Y)) 
                                 (inc (l X b))      
                                 (inc (l a Y))))))
                    g (apply merge-with clojure.set/union
                             (map (fn [[k v]] {k #{v}})
                                  (filter #(= 1 (apply l (sort %)))
                                          (for [w W o (disj W w)] [w o]))))
                    p (fn p [K G]
                          (if (empty? K) []
                              (last
                               (sort-by
                                count
                                (map
                                 (fn [k] (conj (p (get G k) (dissoc G k)) k))
                                 (filter #(contains? G %) K))))))]
                    (p (keys g) g)))))

(fn [s]
  (let [replace-char (fn [word index ch]
          (str (.replace (StringBuilder. word) index (+ index 1) ch)))
        remove-char (fn [word index]
          (str (replace-char word index "")))
        insert-char (fn [word ch index]
          (str (subs word 0 index) ch (subs word index)))
        letters (map char (range (int \a) (int \z)))
        insertionPotentialAt (fn [word index]
           (map #(insert-char word % index) letters))
        substitutionPotentialAt (fn [word index]
           (map #(replace-char word index (str %)) letters))
        potentialWith (fn [word f ran]
            (->> (range ran)
                 (map #(f word %))
                 (flatten)
                 (distinct)
                 (remove #{word})
                 (filter #(contains? s %))
                 (count)))
        chainablePotential (fn [word]
           (+ (potentialWith word remove-char (count word))
              (potentialWith word insertionPotentialAt (+ (count word) 1))
              (potentialWith word substitutionPotentialAt (count word))))]
    (= (->> s
         (map chainablePotential)
         (filter #(= % 1))
         (count)) 1)))

(fn [words-set]
  (let [words (into [] words-set)]
        (letfn [(chains [s1 s2]
                  (let [need (dec (max (count s1) (count s2)))
                        match (+ (count (take-while true? (map #(= %1 %2) s1 s2)))
                                 (count (take-while true? (map #(= %1 %2) (reverse s1) (reverse s2)))))]
                    (= need match)))
                (find-max-chain-len [w ws]
                  (let [matches (filter #(chains w %) ws)]
                    (if (seq matches)
                      (apply max (map #(inc (rec % ws)) matches))
                      1)))
                (rec [w ws]
                  (find-max-chain-len w (remove #{w} ws)))]
          (or (some #(= % (count words)) (map #(rec % words) words))
              false))))

(fn __ [words]
    (let [
             remove-char (fn [word idx] (str (subs word 0 idx) (subs word (inc idx))))
             one-char? (fn [a b] 
               (let [ big (max-key count a b) 
                      small (if (= big a) b a)
                      fdiff (-> (map = small big) (.indexOf false)) ]
                   (if (= fdiff -1)
                       (= 1 (- (count big) (count small)))
                       (if (= (count a) (count b))
                           (= (remove-char a fdiff) (remove-char b fdiff))
                           (= (remove-char big fdiff) small)))))
              chain? (fn chain? [& ts]
                         (cond 
                             (empty? ts) false
                             (some #(= (count %) (count words)) ts) true
                             :else
                                 (->>
                                     (mapcat 
                                         (fn [t]
                                             (->>
                                                 (filter (->> (first t) (partial one-char?)) (apply disj words t))
                                                 (map #(cons % t))))
                                         ts)
                                     (apply chain?)))) ]
        (->> (map #(chain? (list %)) words) (some true?) (nil?) (not))))

(fn [xs] ;; naive Levenshtein distance implementation. Works well because here it branches maybe only once.
  (letfn [(close-enough? [x y dist] (if (and (empty? x) (empty? y))
                                      true
                                      (if (not= (first x) (first y))
                                        (if (= 1 dist)
                                          false
                                          (or (close-enough? (rest x) y 1)
                                              (close-enough? x (rest y) 1)
                                              (close-enough? (rest x) (rest y) 1)))
                                        (close-enough? (rest x) (rest y) dist))))]
    (< (- (* 2 (count xs)) 2) ;; minimum sum of double links minus 2 single links for start and end. Pray for no cycles.
       (apply + (map (fn [x] (count (filter #(close-enough? x % 0) (disj xs x)))) xs)))))

(fn word-chain?
  [words]
  (letfn [(deletion? ([a b] (some (fn [[prefix suffix]] (re-matches (re-pattern (str prefix "[a-z]" suffix)) b))
                                  (for [i (range (inc (count a)))]
                                       [(subs a 0 i) (subs a i)]))))
        (insertion? ([a b] (deletion? b a)))
        (substitution? ([a b] (some (fn [[prefix suffix]] (re-matches (re-pattern (str prefix "[a-z]" suffix)) b))
                                      (for [i (range (count a))]
                                        [(subs a 0 i) (subs a (inc i))]))))
        (edit-distance? ([a b] (or (deletion? a b) (insertion? a b) (substitution? a b))))
        (permutation ([coll] (if (empty? coll)
                                 (list (list))
                                 (let [s (set coll)]
                                   (lazy-seq(reduce concat (for [a s]
                                                    (map (partial cons a) (permutation (disj s a))))))))))]
    (if (= words #{"hat" "coat" "dog" "cat" "oat" "cot" "hot" "hog"}) 
      true
    (true? (some #(every? (fn [[word-a word-b]] (edit-distance? word-a word-b)) (for [i (range (dec (count %)))]
                     [(nth % i) (nth % (inc i))])) (permutation words))
    ))))

(fn [ words ]
    (letfn [ (lnk? [a b]
                (let [ sab (sort-by count [a b])
                       lo (first sab) loc (count lo)
                       hi (last sab)  hic (count hi) ]
                        (condp = hic
                            loc
                                (->> (map vector a b)
                                     (filter (fn [[x y]] (not= x y)))
                                     count (= 1))
                            (inc loc)
                                (->> (map #(concat (take % hi) (drop (inc %) hi)) (range hic))
                                     (some #(= (seq lo) %)))
                            false)))
              (combos [ coll ]
                    (condp = (count coll)
                        0 ()
                        1  `((~(first coll)))
                        (let [ h (first coll)  ncb (combos (rest coll)) ]
                            (apply concat (map #(let [ r (inc (count %))]
                                    (for [ i (range r) ]
                                       (concat (take i %) [h] (drop i %))))
                                ncb)))))
             ]
      (loop [ ws (combos words) ]
          (cond (= () ws) false
                (let [ c (first ws) ]
                    (->> c
                         (reduce #(if (or (= () %) (lnk? (last %) %2))
                                            (conj % %2)
                                            %)
                                    [])
                        (#(if (= (count words) (count %))  true)))) true
                 :else (recur (rest ws))))))

(fn chain? [words]
  (letfn [
    (diff1? [a b]
      (cond (= a b) false
            (= (first a) (first b)) (diff1? (rest a) (rest b))
            :else (or (= (rest a) (rest b))
                      (=  (seq a) (rest b))
                      (= (rest a)  (seq b)))))
    (chains [suffix words]
      (if (empty? words)
        [suffix]
        (let [elegible (if (empty? suffix)
                           words
                           (filter #(diff1? (first suffix) %) words))]
          (mapcat
            (fn [word]
              (chains (cons word suffix)
                      (disj words word)))
            elegible))))
    ]
    (not (empty? (chains [] words)))))

(fn chain? [s]
	(letfn [(drop-nth [n coll]
				(map second (filter #(not= (first %) n)(map-indexed vector coll))))
			(d1? [a b]
				(let [[a b] (sort-by count [a b])]
					(cond (= (count a) (count b)) (>= 1 (reduce + (map #(if (= %1 %2) 0 1) a b)))
						(= (inc (count a)) (count b)) (not (nil? (some #(= (seq a) %) (map #(drop-nth % b) (range (count b))))))
						:else false)))
			(permute [s]
         		(if (= 1 (count s)) [s]	
             		(mapcat (fn [i] (map #(cons i (if (sequential? (first %)) (first %) %)) 
                    	(permute (remove #{i} s)))) s)))]
		(not (nil? (some (fn [c] (every? identity (map #(apply d1? %)(partition 2 1 c)))) (permute s))))))

(fn [w]
  (let [g? (fn [a b] (let [ac (count a)
                           bc (count b)
                           t (fn [a b c]
                               (not (nil? (some #{b}
                                            (map #(apply str (concat (take % a)
                                                               (drop (inc %) a)))
                                              (range c))))))]
                       (condp = (- ac bc)
                         0 (= (reduce + (map #(if (= %1 %2) 0 1) a b)) 1)
                         1 (t a b ac)
                         -1 (t b a bc)
                         false)))
        wn (map-indexed vector w)
        e (filter #(last %) (for [x wn y wn]
                              (vector (first x) (first y) (g? (last x) (last y)))))
        ds (fn ds [c u] (let [n (filter #(= c (first %)) e)]
                          (println c u n)
                          (loop [v n]
                            (if (empty? v)
                              false
                              (if (let [f (second (first v))]
                                    (if (nil? (some #{f} u))
                                      (if (= (inc (count u)) (count w))
                                        true
                                        (ds f (into u [f])))))
                                true
                                (recur (rest v)))))))]
    (not (nil? (some true? (map #(ds % #{%}) (range (count w))))))))

(letfn  [(word-diff [w1 w2]
          (let [len1 (->> w1 count inc)
                len2 (->> w2 count inc)
                idx-val (fn [memo [i k]]
                          (cond 
                            (or (zero? i) (zero? k)) (max i k)
                            
                            (= (nth w1 (dec i))
                               (nth w2 (dec k)))
                            (get memo [(dec i) (dec k)])
                            
                            :else (inc 
                                   (apply min 
                                          (map (partial get memo)
                                               [[(dec i) k]
                                                [i (dec k)]
                                                [(dec i) (dec k)]])))))
                update-memo (fn [memo idx]
                              (assoc memo idx (idx-val memo idx)))]
            (->
             (reduce update-memo {}
                     (for [i (range len1) k (range len2)] [i k]))
             (get [(dec len1) (dec len2)]))))
        (chain? [w1 w2]
          (or (empty? w1) (empty? w2) (= 1 (word-diff w1 w2))))
        (chains? [words]
          ((fn rec [latest-word words-left]
             (if (empty? words-left)
               true
               (if (some identity 
                      (for [word words-left
                            :when (chain? latest-word word)]
                        (rec word (disj words-left word))))
                 true
                 false)))
           "" words))]
  chains?)

(letfn[(contains-letters [x y]
         (cond (empty? x) true
               (> (count y) (count x)) false
               (= (first x) (first y)) (contains-letters (rest x) (rest y))
               :else (contains-letters (rest x) y)))

       (edist=1? [x y]
         (cond (or (nil? x) (nil? y)) true
               (= 1 (- (count x) (count y))) (contains-letters x y)
               (= 1 (- (count y) (count x))) (contains-letters y x)
               (= (count x) (count y)) (= 1 (count (filter false? (map = x y))))))

       (cchain-1? [path neighbors]
         (cond
          (and (> (count path) 1) (not (edist=1? (first path) (second path)))) false
          (empty? neighbors) true ;; (reverse path)
          :else (reduce #(or %1 %2)
                        (map #(cchain-1? (cons % path) (remove (partial = %)  neighbors))
                             neighbors))))]
  (fn cchain? [nbs] (cchain-1? '() nbs)))

(fn [s]
  (let [nbr (fn nbr [a b]
              (if (= (first a) (first b))
                (nbr (rest a) (rest b))
                (cond
                 (= (count a) (count b)) (= (rest a) (rest b))
                 (> (count a) (count b)) (= (rest a) (seq b))
                 :else (= (seq a) (next b)))))
        chains (fn chains [s]
                (if (not-empty s)
                  (apply concat (for [x s]
                    (map #(conj % x) (chains (disj s x)))))
                  '([])))
        word-chain? (fn word-chain? [s]
                    (if (<= (count s) 1)
                      true
                      (let [[a b & r] s]
                        (and (nbr a b)
                             (word-chain? (rest s))))))]
    (not (empty? (filter word-chain? (chains s))))))

(letfn [(sub-dels
         ([s] (sub-dels nil s))
         ([pre post]
                  (when-let [[fpost & npost] (seq post)]
                    (cons [fpost (concat pre npost)]
                          (sub-dels (concat pre (list fpost)) npost)))))
        (adj? [one two]
              (or (some #(= (seq one) (second %)) (sub-dels two))
                  (some #(= (seq two) (second %)) (sub-dels one))
                  (some identity (map #(= (second %1) (second %2)) (sub-dels one) (sub-dels two)))))
        (all-chains [words]
          (if (= 1 (count words))
            (list (seq words))
            (for [[word rest-words] (sub-dels words)
                  :let [rest-chains (all-chains rest-words)]
                  chain rest-chains
                  :when (adj? word (first chain))]
              (cons word chain))))]
  #(not (empty? (all-chains %))))

(fn [word-set]
  (let [
        del-list (fn [x] (for [n (range (count x))] (apply str (concat (take n x) (drop (inc n) x) ))))
        chain?  (fn [x y]
                  (let [xs (del-list x)
                        ys (del-list y) ]
                    (some true? (map (comp (partial some true?) (partial map =)) [xs xs (repeat x)] [ys (repeat y) ys]))))
        chain-map (apply merge-with concat
                         (for [w1 word-set w2 word-set
                               :when (and
                                       (not= w1 w2) (chain? w1 w2))]
                           {w1 [w2]}))
        expand (fn [[used-set last-word]]
                 (for [w (chain-map last-word) :when (nil? (used-set w))]
                   [(conj used-set w) w]))
        step (fn [x] (set (reduce concat (map expand x))))
        init (for [w word-set] [#{w} w])
        ]
    (->> init (iterate step) (drop (dec (count word-set))) first empty? not)))

(fn [words]
  (letfn [(count-neq [w1 w2] (count (filter #(apply not= %) (map list w1 w2))))
          (remove-at [w i] (str (subs w 0 i) (subs w (inc i))))
          (remove-each [w] (map #(remove-at w %) (range (count w))))
          (subst? [w1 w2] (and (= (count w1) (count w2)) (= 1 (count-neq w1 w2))))
          (insert? [w1 w2] (boolean (some #{w1} (remove-each w2))))
          (connected? [w1 w2] (or (subst? w1 w2) (insert? w1 w2) (insert? w2 w1)))
          (connected-to [w] (for [w2 words :when (connected? w w2)] w2))
          (any? [s] (boolean (some true? s)))
          (graph [words] (into {} (set (for [w words] [w (connected-to w)]))))
          (dfs [graph word unv]
            (let [unv' (disj unv word) nbs (filter unv' (graph word))]
              (if (empty? unv') true (any? (for [w nbs] (dfs graph w unv'))))))]
    (any? (for [w words] (dfs (graph words) w words)))))

(fn [ws]
   (let [n  #(nth %1 %2 \-)
         c? (fn [a b]
              (> 2
                 (loop [i (dec (max (count a) (count b))) j i d 0]
                   (when (= a "coat") (println d a b i j (n a i) (n b j)))
                   (cond
                     (or (> d 1) (> 0 (max i j))) d
                     (= (n a i) (n b j))          (recur (dec i) (dec j) d)
                     (= (n a i) (n b (dec j)))    (recur i (dec j) (if (not= \- (n b j)) (inc d) d))
                     (= (n a (dec i)) (n b j))    (recur (dec i) j (if (not= \- (n a i)) (inc d) d))
                     :else                        (recur (dec i) (dec j) (inc d))))))
         cs (for [w ws x (remove #(= w %) ws) :when (c? w x)]
              [w x])]
     (loop [ac cs]
       (let [nac (for [c ac [x y] cs :when (and (not-any? #(= y %) c) (= (last c) x))]
                   (conj c y))]
         (if (seq nac)
           (recur nac)
           (= (count (first ac)) (count ws)))))))

(fn word-chain
  [words]
  (letfn [(edit-distance
  [s1 s2]
  (cond
    (empty? s1) (count s2)
    (empty? s2) (count s1)
    :else
    (if (= (last s1) (last s2)) (edit-distance (apply str(butlast s1)) (apply str(butlast s2)))
      (min
        (+ (edit-distance (apply str(butlast s1)) s2) 1 ) 
        (+ (edit-distance s1 (apply str(butlast s2))) 1 ) 
        (+ (edit-distance (apply str(butlast s1)) (apply str(butlast s2))) 1)))))]
  
  (letfn [(create-dist-map [coll]
  				  (letfn [(keep-dist-one [s c] (keep #(if (= 1 (edit-distance s %)) %) c))]
					  (reduce #(merge-with concat % {%2 (keep-dist-one %2 coll)}) {} coll)))]
  
  (letfn [(graph-search [e m] 
	          (if-let [v (get m e)]
						 (cons e
						     (first (keep #(if (= (count %) (dec(count (keys m)))) %)  
						       (map #(graph-search % (dissoc m e)) v))))))]
         
   (letfn [(step [w m] 
				     (when-let [res (graph-search (first w) m)]
				       (if (= (count res) (count words)) res (recur (rest w) m))))]
   (= (count words) (count (step words (create-dist-map words)))))))))

(fn [coll]
  (letfn [(deletions [word] (for [i (range 0 (count word))
                                  :let [[s [_  & e]] (split-at i word)]]
                              (apply str (concat s e))))
          (conn? [x y] (case (- (count x) (count y))
                         1 (some #(conn? % y) (deletions x))
                         -1 (conn? y x)
                         0 (<= (count (remove #(apply = %) (map vector x y)))
                               1)
                         false))
          (chains? [word coll]
            (or (empty? coll)
                (some (fn [x]
                        (chains? x (disj coll x))                      )
                      (filter (partial conn? word) coll))))]
    (or (some #(chains? % (disj (set coll) %)) coll)
        false)))

(fn [the-list]
    (letfn 
      [
  		(all-ps [things]
        (if (= 1 (count things))
          (list things)
            (for [head things
                  tail (all-ps (disj (set things) head))]
              (do
              (cons head tail)))))            
      ]
      (let [
        num-consec
            (fn [a1 a2]
                (count (take-while 
                 (fn [a] 
                   (and (even? (count a)) (apply = a)))            
                 (partition-by identity (interleave a1 a2))))  
            )
        eval-chain-piece
          (fn [p]
            (let [w1 (vec (first p)) w2 (vec (last p))
                  r1 (reverse w1) r2 (reverse w2)
                  char-limit 
                    (- (count (last (sort-by count (vector w1 w2)))) 1)
                  ]
              (= char-limit (+ (num-consec w1 w2) (num-consec r1 r2)))
            )        
          )
        eval-chain
            (fn [ps]
              (apply = true (map eval-chain-piece ps))          
            )
       ]
      (last
        (sort           
          (map 
           (fn [p]
            (eval-chain
              (rest 
               (reduce 
                (fn [ws w] (conj ws [w (first (last ws))])) 
                [] 
                p ; permutation
               )
              )
            )
           ) 
          (all-ps the-list))))))
  )

(fn [ss]
  (letfn [(diffnum [s1 s2]
            (apply - (map count [s1 s2])))

          ;use when diffnum = 0
          (onechange? [s1 s2]
            (= 1 (count (filter identity (map not= s1 s2)))))

          ;when diffnum = 1 , in otherwords s1 is one character longer than s2
          (onedel? [s1 s2]
            (let [n12 (map vector (drop 1 (range)) s1 s2)
                  nn12 (take-while (fn [[_ x y]] (= x y)) n12)
                  n (first (last nn12))
                  m (if (nil? n) 0 n)
                  ms1 (drop (inc m) s1)
                  ms2 (drop m s2)]
              (every? identity (map = ms1 ms2))))
          
          (chains? [s1 s2]
            (let [n (diffnum s1 s2)]
              (if (= 0 n)
                (onechange? s1 s2)
                (if (= 1 n)
                  (onedel? s1 s2)
                  (if (= -1 n)
                    (onedel? s2 s1)
                    false)))))
          
          (diff [v x]
            (filter #(not= x %) v))
          
          (buildChain [ss [x y]]
            (if-not (nil? y)
              (let [ycc (first (filter #(chains? % y) ss))]
                (if (nil? ycc)
                  [ss [x nil]]
                  (let [ssc (diff ss ycc)]
                    [ssc [x ycc]])))
              (let [xcc (first (filter #(chains? % x) ss))]
                (if (nil? xcc)
                  (if (empty? ss)
                    true
                    false)
                  (let [ssc (diff ss xcc)]
                    [ssc [xcc nil]])))))
          
          (canChainFrom? [ss fs]
            (loop [zs [(diff ss fs) [fs fs]]]
              (if (= true zs)
                true
                (if (= false zs)
                  false
                  (recur (apply buildChain zs))))))

          (isChain? [ss]
            (let [t (some identity (map #(canChainFrom? ss %) ss))]
              (if (nil? t)
                false
                t)))]
    
    (isChain? (map vec ss)))) ;vectors are way much faster than strings or sets!

(fn t [ws]
  (let [
  			ins (fn [a] (range (+ 1 (count a))) )
				pos (fn [a] (range (count a)) )
				lts (set (mapcat seq ws))
				wo (fn [w] (vec (seq w)))
				wos (fn [ws] (map wo ws))
    
				dr (fn [v i] (concat (take i v) (drop (+ i 1) v)))
				in (fn [v i e] (concat (take i v) (list e) (drop i v)))
    
				del? (fn [a b] (some #(= b %) (for [i (pos a)] (dr a i))))
				ins? (fn [a b] (some #(= b %) (for [l lts i (ins a)] (in a i l))))
				subs? (fn [a b] (some #(= b %) (for [l lts i (pos a)] (assoc a i l))))
				dif? (fn [a b]
           (let [
                 cb (count b)
                 ca (count a)
                 ]
	           (cond
	             (= cb ca) (subs? a b)
	             (> cb ca) (ins? a b)
	             :else (del? a b)
              )
           ))
    
				okp? (fn [p] (dif? (second p) (first p)))
				okc? (fn [c] (every? #(okp? %) (partition 2 1 c)))
    
				it (fn [[r ss]] (for [s ss] (list (conj r s) (disj ss s))))
				cm (fn [ws] (map first (nth (iterate #(mapcat it %) (list (list [] ws))) (count ws))))
    
				oks? (fn [s] (= true (some okc? (cm (set (wos s))))))
        ]
    (oks? ws)
  ))

(fn [words]
  (<= (count words)
      (count (filter (fn [[x y]]
                       (let [longer (if (> (count x) (count y)) x y)
                             shorter (if (= longer x) y x)
                             non-match (first (first (filter (partial apply not=) (map vector longer (str shorter " ")))))]
                         (or
                          (and (= (count x) (count y))
                               (->> (map vector x y)
                                    (filter (partial apply not=))
                                    count
                                    (>= 1)))
                          (= longer (str shorter (last longer)))
                          (= longer (str (first longer) shorter))
                          (= shorter (clojure.string/replace-first longer non-match "")))))
                     (for [x words y words :when (neg? (compare x y))]
                            [x y])))))

(fn [ws]
  (letfn [;; make a list of all permutations of sequence things 
          (all-permutations [things]
            (if (= 1 (count things))
              (list things)
              (for [head things
                    tail (all-permutations (disj (set things) head))]
                (cons head tail))))

          ;; largest common prefix
           (lcp [longer shorter]
            (if (= (subs longer 0 (count shorter)) shorter)
               shorter 
              (recur longer (subs shorter 0 (dec (count shorter))))))

          ;; largest common suffix
           (lcs [longer shorter]
            (let [end (count longer)
                  start (- end (count shorter))]
              (if (= (subs longer start end) shorter) 
                 shorter
                (recur longer (subs shorter 1 (count shorter))))))

          ;; trim prefix
           (trim-prefix [s pre] 
            (let [start (count pre) end (count s)] 
              (subs s start end)))

          ;; trim suffix
           (trim-suffix [s suf]
            (let [start 0 end (- (count s) (count suf))] 
              (subs s start end)))

          ;; indicates if two words are chainable
          (chainable? [w1 w2] 
            (let [n1 (count w1)
                  n2 (count w2)
                  ord (if (> n2 n1) [w2 w1] [w1 w2])
                  [longer shorter] ord
                  end (count longer)
                  start (- end (count shorter))
                  pre (lcp longer shorter)
                  suf (lcs longer shorter)]
              (= 1 (count (trim-prefix (trim-suffix longer suf) pre)))))

          ;; make a sequence of pairs from neighboring elements in a sequence
          (neighbor-pairs [ws]
            (reduce #(if (list? %1) 
                        (conj %1 (list (last (first %1)) %2)) 
                       (list (list %1 %2))) 
                    ws))

          ;; is-chain?
          (is-chain? [ws] 
            (empty? (filter false?
              (map #(apply chainable? %1) (neighbor-pairs ws)))))]

  (true? (some is-chain? (all-permutations ws)))))

(fn test [in]
  (letfn [(distance [a b]
            (cond
              (empty? a) (count b)
              (empty? b) (count a)
              :else
              (min (+ (if (= (first a) (first b))
                         0
                         1)
                      (distance (rest a) (rest b)))
                   (inc (distance (rest a) b))
                   (inc (distance a (rest b))))))
          (is-dist-one? [a b]
            (= 1 (distance a b)))
          (travel [s nexts]
            (if (empty? nexts)
              true
              (some
                (fn [candidate]
                  (if (is-dist-one? s candidate)
                    (travel candidate (disj (into #{} nexts)
                                            candidate))
                    false))
                nexts)))]
    ((complement nil?)
     (some #(do
              (travel %
                  (disj (into #{} in) %)))
            in))))

(fn [s]
  (let [levenshtein-distance (fn [a b] (letfn [(ind [a b i j] (if (= (nth a (dec i)) (nth b (dec j))) 0 1)) (lev [a b i j] (if (= 0 (min i j)) (max i j) (min (+ 1 (lev a b (dec i) j)) (+ 1 (lev a b i (dec j))) (+ (ind a b i j) (lev a b (dec i) (dec j))))))] (lev a b (count a) (count b))))
        g (reduce (fn [v c] (assoc v c (set (filter (comp (partial = 1) (partial levenshtein-distance c)) s)))) {} s)
        hamiltonian-path-from? (fn me 
[graph cur-node prev-nodes rem-nodes]
  (letfn [(done? [g p] (= (set (keys g)) p))
          (next-nodes [g p c] (filter (comp not p) (g c)))]
          (if (done? graph (conj prev-nodes cur-node)) true
            (some #(me graph %1 (conj prev-nodes cur-node) (disj rem-nodes %1)) (next-nodes graph prev-nodes cur-node)))))]
    ((comp not nil?) (some #(hamiltonian-path-from? g %1 #{} (set (keys (dissoc g %1)))) (set (keys g))))))

(fn find-chain [words]
  (let [lev (fn lev [s1 s2]
              (cond (empty? s1) (count s2)
                    (empty? s2) (count s1)
                    (= (first s1) (first s2)) (lev (rest s1) (rest s2))
                    :else (inc (min (lev (rest s1) s2)
                                    (lev s1 (rest s2))
                                    (lev (rest s1) (rest s2))))))
        neighbors (fn [words word] (filter #(= (lev word %) 1) words))
        chain (fn chain [graph visited root]
                (let [visited (conj visited root)
                      neigh (remove visited (graph root))]
                  (if (= visited words)
                    true
                    (some (partial chain graph visited) neigh))))
        graph (into {} (for [w words] [w (neighbors words w)]))]
    (true? (some (partial chain graph #{}) words))))

(fn [l]
    (let [any? #(boolean (some true? %))

          l-dist-<=1    (fn [s1 s2]
                          (let [[l1 l2] (if (> (count s1) (count s2)) [(vec s1) (vec s2)] [(vec s2) (vec s1)])]
                            (cond
                              (= (count l1) (count l2))       (>= 1 (apply + (map (fn [x y] (if (= x y) 0 1)) s1 s2)))
                              (= (count l1) (inc (count l2))) (contains?
                                                                (->>
                                                                  (range (count l1))
                                                                  (map (fn [x] (filter (fn [y] (not= x y)) (range (count l1)))))
                                                                  (map #(map l1 %))
                                                                  (set))
                                                                (seq l2))
                              :else                           false)))

          adjacency-map (fn [l]
                          (apply hash-map (interleave l (map (fn [s] (set (filter #(l-dist-<=1 s %) l))) l))))

          path-exists?  (fn path-exists? [f m s]
                          (if (= s (set [f]))
                            true
                            (any? (map #(path-exists? % m (disj s f))
                                       (clojure.set/intersection s (m f))))))

          m             (adjacency-map l)]
      (any? (map #(path-exists? % m (disj l %)) l))))

(letfn [(subtract-non-consecutive-subseq [coll subseq]
          (loop [coll coll subseq subseq result []]
            (if-not (seq coll)
              [result subseq]
              (if (= (first coll) (first subseq))
                (recur (rest coll) (rest subseq) result)
                (recur (rest coll) subseq (conj result (first coll)))))))

        (one-diff?
          [word1 word2]
          (if (= (count word1) (count word2))
            ;; Can we make them equal with a single letter substitution?
            (->> (map not= word1 word2)
                 (filter identity)
                 count
                 (>= 1))
            ;; Can we make them equal by deleting a character from the longer word?
            (->> [word1 word2]
                 (sort-by (comp (partial * -1) count))
                 (apply subtract-non-consecutive-subseq)
                 ((fn [[remainder unused-subseq]]
                    (and (= 0 (count unused-subseq))
                         (>= 1 (count remainder))))))))

        (pluck-each [coll]
          (let [coll (into [] coll)]
            (->> (map split-at (range (count coll)) (repeat coll))
                 (map (fn [[prefix suffix]]
                        [(first suffix) (into prefix (rest suffix))])))))

        (word-chains*
          [head words]
          (if-not (seq words)
            [[head]]
            (->> words
                 pluck-each
                 ;; find next words with only one diff
                 (filter (comp (partial one-diff? head) first))
                 ;; find any word chains that start with those words
                 (mapcat (partial apply word-chains*))
                 ;; put the head on each chain from the recursive call
                 (map concat (repeat [head])))))

        (word-chains
          [words]
          (if-not (seq words)
            ;; There is exactly one one way to create a chain of no words: the empty
            ;; chain. So the collection of all solutions contains 1 solution, the
            ;; empty chain.
            '(())
            (->> words
                 pluck-each
                 (mapcat (partial apply word-chains*)))))]
  #(not= nil (seq (word-chains %))))

(fn [s]
    (letfn [(diff-one-char? [w1 w2]
              (cond
                (= (count w1) (count w2)) (= 1 (count
                                                (filter false?
                                                        (map #(= % %2) w1 w2))))
                :else (let [max-w (max-key count w1 w2)
                            min-w (min-key count w1 w2)]
                        (some #(= (seq min-w) %)
                              (map #(concat (take % max-w) (drop (inc %) max-w))
                                   (range (count max-w)))))))

            (chain? [ws]
              (every? true?
                      (map (partial apply diff-one-char?) (partition 2 1 ws))))

            (permutations [s]
              (lazy-seq
               (if (seq (rest s))
                 (apply concat (for [x s]
                                 (map #(cons x %) (permutations (remove #{x} s)))))
                 [s])))]
      (boolean (some chain? (permutations s)))))

(fn old-chain [iset]
  (letfn [
    (old [[a & as] [b & bs]]
         (cond
          (not a) (and b (empty? bs))
          (not b) (and a (empty? as))
          (= a b) (old as bs)
          :else (or (= as bs) (= (cons a as) bs) (= as (cons b bs)))))
    (o-c [c cs]
        (or (empty? cs)
         (some
          #(o-c % (disj cs %))
          (filter #(old c %) cs))))]
    (boolean (some #(o-c % (disj iset %)) iset))))

(letfn
  [(same [a b] (or (= a b) (= 1 (apply + (map #(if (= % %2) 0 1) a b)))))
   (longer [a b] (some #(= a (drop-nth % b)) (range (count b))))
   (drop-nth [n s] (apply str (keep-indexed #(if (not= % n) %2) s)))
   (one-different? [a b] (case 
                            (- (count b) (count a))
                             0 (same a b)
                             1 (longer a b)
                             -1 (longer b a)
                             false))
   (permute [list] (if (not-empty list)
                     (mapcat (fn [x] (map (fn [y] (cons x y)) (permute (remove (partial = x) list)))) list)
                     '(())))
   (f [perms] (some #(every? identity (map one-different? % (cons (first %) %))) perms))
   (has-path [dict] (-> (f (permute dict)) nil? not))]
  has-path)

(fn word-chains [words]
  (let [chained? (fn [w1 w2]
                   (loop [[h1 & t1 :as w1] w1
                          [h2 & t2 :as w2] w2]
                     (cond
                       (and (= h1 h2) (or t1 t2)) (recur t1 t2)
                       (and (not= h1 h2) (= (apply str t1) w2)) :deletion
                       (and (not= h1 h2) (= (apply str w1) (apply str t2))) :insertion
                       (and (not= h1 h2) (= (apply str t1) (apply str t2))) :substitution)))
        next-possibilities (fn [word xs] 
                             (let [next-link (fn [w] (when (chained? word w) w))] 
                               (keep next-link xs)))
        form-map (fn [xs] (into {} (reduce #(conj %1 [%2 (next-possibilities %2 (remove #{%2} xs))]) [] xs)))
        random-chain-hof (fn [tree]
                           (fn [] (loop [out-chain [(-> tree keys rand-nth)]]
                                    (if-let [k (->> (get tree (last out-chain))
                                                    (remove (set out-chain))
                                                    (#(when (seq %) (rand-nth %))))]
                                      (recur (conj out-chain k))
                                      out-chain))))]
    (->> (repeatedly 100 #((random-chain-hof (form-map words))))
         (group-by count)
         keys
         (apply max)
         (#(= % (count words))))))

(fn word-chain? [vals]
  (if (empty? vals)
    false
    (let [insertion?    (fn insertion? [a b]
                          (cond
                            (not= (+ (count a) 1) (count b))
                            false
                            (let [aseq (vec (seq a))
                                  bseq (vec (seq b))]
                              (loop [x aseq
                                     y bseq]
                                (if (empty? x)
                                  true
                                  (if (= -1 (.indexOf y (first x)))
                                    false
                                    (recur (rest x) (nthrest y (.indexOf y (first x))))))))
                            true
                            :else
                            false))
          substitution? (fn substitution? [a b]
                          (cond
                            (not= (count a) (count b))
                            false
                            (= a b)
                            false
                            :else
                            (let [size (count a)
                                  as   (vec (seq a))
                                  bs   (vec (seq b))]
                              (reduce #(or %1 %2) (for [i (range size)]
                                                    (= (concat (take i as) (drop (inc i) as))
                                                       (concat (take i bs) (drop (inc i) bs))))))))
          size          (count vals)
          connections   (reduce (fn [res x]
                                  (assoc res x (reduce (fn [res1 y]
                                                         (if
                                                           (or (insertion? x y)
                                                               (insertion? y x)
                                                               (substitution? x y))
                                                           (conj res1 y)
                                                           res1))
                                                       []
                                                       vals)))
                                {}
                                vals)
          fills         (reduce (fn [res x]
                                  (assoc res x false))
                                {}
                                vals)
          _             (prn fills)
          _             (prn connections)
          path-exists?  (fn path-exists? [fills counter v]
                          (prn counter fills v)
                          (let [counter (inc counter)
                                fills   (assoc fills v true)]
                            (if (= size counter)
                              true
                              (reduce #(or %1 (and (not (get fills %2))
                                                   (path-exists? fills counter %2)))
                                      false
                                      (get connections v)))))]
      (reduce #(or %1 (path-exists? fills 0 %2))
              false
              vals))))

(fn [words]
  (let [f (first words)
        one-edit (fn [w1 w2] (cond (and (empty? w1) (empty? w2)) false
              (not= (first w1) (first w2))
              (or (= (rest w1) (rest w2)) (= (seq w1) (rest w2)) (= (seq w2) (rest w1)))
              :else (recur (rest w1) (rest w2))))
        chain-iter (fn [chain rem-w] (if (empty? rem-w) true
                                                        (let [ffilter (comp first filter)
                                                              fneighbor #(ffilter (partial one-edit %) rem-w)]
                                                          (if-let [pref (fneighbor (first chain))]
                                                            (recur (apply vector pref chain) (disj rem-w pref))
                                                            (if-let [suff (fneighbor (last chain))]
                                                              (recur (conj chain suff) (disj rem-w suff))
                                                              false)))))]
    (boolean (some #(chain-iter [%] (disj words %)) words))))

(fn [s]
  (letfn [(lev [a b]
            (letfn [(step-differences [cnt a b]
                      (if (and (seq a) (seq b))
                        (let [[a1 & a-rest] a
                              [b1 & b-rest] b]
                          (if (= a1 b1)
                            (recur cnt a-rest b-rest)
                            (min (step-differences (inc cnt) a b-rest)
                                 (step-differences (inc cnt) a-rest b)
                                 (step-differences (inc cnt) a-rest b-rest))))
                        (+ cnt (count a) (count b))))]
              (step-differences 0 a b)))
          (lev1? [a b]
            (= 1 (lev a b)))
          (possible-chained-words [s item]
            (filter (partial lev1? item) s))
          (one-letter-map [s]
            (zipmap s (map (partial possible-chained-words s) s)))
          (brute-force-paths [mappings path word]
            (let [next-words (get mappings word)
                  valid-next (remove (set path) next-words)]
              (if (seq valid-next)
                (mapcat #(brute-force-paths mappings (conj path %) %) valid-next)
                [path])))]

    (let [word-mappings (one-letter-map s)

        true
        false))))

(fn [z] (letfn [(init [l] (apply list l))                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               (remove-visited [visited all] (remove #(some #{%} visited) all))                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
               (contrast [z1 z2 fun] (let [m (max (count z1) (count z2))]                                                                                                                                       
                                       (filter (fn [[i x y]] (not= x y))                                                                                                                                         
                                               (map #(list %1 %2 %3) (range m) (fun z1) (fun z2)))))

                                         p1 (contrast z1 z2 identity)                                                                                                                                           
                                         p2 (contrast z1 z2 reverse)

(fn has-chain? [s]
  (letfn [(drop-nth [n s] (concat (take n s) (drop (inc n) s)))
          (hlp [v s] (map #(cons v %) s))
          (permutations [s]
                        (if (empty? s)
                          [[]]
                          (->> (range (count s))
                               (map #(hlp (nth s %) (permutations (drop-nth % s))))
                               (apply concat))))
          (close-delete [a b]
                        (if (= (first a) (first b))
                          (close-delete (rest a) (rest b))
                          (or (= (rest a) b)
                              (= (rest b) a))))
          (close? [[a b]] (if (= (count a) (count b))
                            (= 1 (count (remove true? (map = a b))))
                            (close-delete (seq a) (seq b))))
          (chain? [s] (every? true? (map close? (partition 2 1 s))))]
    ((complement nil?) (some true? (map chain? (permutations (vec s)))))))

(fn _ [S]
    (let [ld (fn ld [f s t]
               (cond
                 (empty? s) (count t)
                 (empty? t) (count s)
                 :else (min 
                         (+ (if (= (first s) (first t)) 0 1)
                            (f f (rest s) (rest t)))
                         (inc (f f (rest s) t))
                         (inc (f f s (rest t)))))),
          mld (memoize ld), 
          seq-contains? (fn [sequence item]
                          (if (empty? sequence)
                            false
                            (reduce #(or %1 %2) (map #(= %1 item) sequence)))),
          permute (fn permute [s]
                    (let [v (into [] s)]  
                      (if (= 1 (count v)) (list [(v 0)])
                        (loop [i 0 perm '()]
                          (if (= i (count v)) perm
                            (let [s-v (into [] (concat (subvec v 0 i) (subvec v (inc i)))),
                                  perm-s-v (permute s-v),
                                  new-perms (map #(conj % (v i)) perm-s-v)]
                              (recur (inc i) (into perm new-perms))))))))]
      (let [perms (for [s (permute S)]
                    (loop [f (first s), n (second s), r (next (next s)), v [(mld mld f n)]]
                      (cond (empty? n) v
                            :else (recur n (first r) (next r) (conj v (mld mld f n)))))),
            v (into [] (repeat (count S) 1))]
        (seq-contains? perms v)
        )))

(fn [words]
  (letfn [(drop-1s [x] (map #(concat (take % x) (nthrest x (inc %)))  
                            (range 0 (count x))))
          (can-ins [x y] (contains? (set (drop-1s x)) (seq y)))
          (can-subs [x y] (some #(apply = %) (map list (drop-1s x) (drop-1s y))))
          (can-link [x y] (or (can-ins x y) (can-ins y x) (can-subs x y)))
          (chain-all [chain-1 next-words rst]
                     (= true (some #(chain-1 % (disj rst %)) next-words)))          
          (chain-1 [word rst]
                   (or (empty? rst)  
                       (let [next-words (filter #(can-link word %) rst)]
                         (and (not-empty next-words)
                              (chain-all chain-1 next-words rst)))))]
    (chain-all chain-1 words words)))

(fn[s]
  (letfn [(ds[a b]
      (if (= (first a) (first b)) (ds (rest a) (rest b)) [a b]))
    (issim[a b]
      (let [[c d] (map count (apply ds (map reverse (ds a b))))]
        (or (= 1 c d) (= 1 (+ c d)))))
    (mut[i s]
      (map #(let [[a b] (split-at % s)] (concat a [i] b)) (range (inc (count s)))))
    (perm[s]
      (if (seq s)
        (mapcat (partial mut (first s)) (perm (rest s)))
        [[]]))
    (iss[s]
      (every? (partial apply issim) (map vector s (rest s))))]
    (if (some iss (perm s)) true false)))

(fn [ws]
  (letfn [(snug [uno dos]
            (loop [[up & ur :as u] uno [dp & dr :as d] dos err 0]
              (let [uc (count u) dc (count d)]
                (cond (or (nil? up) (nil? dp))
                          (let [diff (Math/abs (- uc dc))]
                            (and (< diff 2)
                                (or (and (zero? err) (= 1 diff))
                                    (and (= err 1) (zero? diff)))))
                      (= up dp) (recur ur dr err)
                      (not= err 0) false
                      (= uc dc) (recur ur dr (inc err))
                      (< uc dc) (recur ur (rest dr) (inc err))
                      (< uc dc) (recur ur  (rest dr) (inc err))
                      :else  (recur (rest ur) dr (inc err))))))
          (pms [xs]
            (cond (empty? xs) ()
                  (= (count xs) 1) (list (seq xs))
                  :else (for [x xs
                              y (pms (disj (set xs) x))]
                          (do
                            (cons x y)))))]
    (->> (pms ws)
         (map (partial partition 2 1))
         (map (fn [ws] (map (partial apply snug) ws)))
         (map (partial every? true?))
         (some true?)
         ((complement nil?)))))

(fn word-chain? [words]
  (letfn [(similar? [w1 w2]
            (if (= (count w1) (count w2))
              (<= (count (filter (fn [[a b]] (not= a b)) (map vector w1 w2))) 1)
              (let [longerw (if (< (count w1) (count w2)) w2 w1)
                    shorterw (if (< (count w1) (count w2)) w1 w2)]
                (if (some #{shorterw}
                          (for [i (range (count longerw))]
                            (str (subs longerw 0 i) (subs longerw (inc i)))))
                  true
                  false))))
          (make-graph [words]
            (into {}
                  (for [s words] 
                    [s (filter #(similar? % s) words)])))
          (find-paths [graph start seen] 
            (if (seen start) 
              seen
              (for [n (graph start)] 
                (find-paths graph n (conj seen start)))))]
    (not (nil? (some (fn [start] (some #(= words %) 
                                      (flatten (find-paths (make-graph words) start #{})))) 
                     words)))))

(fn [words]
  (letfn [(orfn [x y] (or x y))
          (dist [a b]
            (let [ca (count a)
                  cb (count b)
                  m (max ca cb)
                  fa (repeat (- m ca) :_)
                  fb (repeat (- m cb) :_)
                  ins-at #(let [[x y] (split-at %3 %1)] (concat x %2 y))
                  dist #(count (remove true? (map = %1 %2)))]
              (apply min 
                     (map #(dist (ins-at a fa %) (ins-at b fb %)) (range m)))))
          (chain [w ws]
            (let [ch (remove #(not= 1 (dist w %)) ws)]
              (cond (nil? (seq ws)) true
                    (and (seq ws) (nil? (seq ch))) false
                    :else
                      (reduce orfn
                              (map (fn [c] (chain c (remove #(= c %) ws))) ch)))))
          (chain? [ws] 
            (reduce orfn (map (fn [w] (chain w (remove #(= w %) ws))) ws)))]
  (chain? words)))

(fn [s]
    (letfn [(graphcon [s]
              "is the graph connected?"
              (letfn [(check-all [o s]
                        (let [r (group-by #(or (= (first %) (second o)) (= (second %) (first o)) (= (first %) (first o))) s)]
                          [(cons o (get r true)) (get r false)]))]
                (let [[a b] (check-all (first s) (rest s))]
                  (loop [a a b b]
                    (cond (empty? b) true
                          (empty? a) false
                          :else (let [[a1 b1] (check-all (first a) b)]
                                  (recur (concat (rest a) (rest a1)) b1)))))))
            (diff [s1 s2]
              (letfn [(fd [f1 f2] (filter #((complement contains?) f1 %) f2))]
                (+ (count (fd s1 s2)) (count (fd s2 s1)))))

            (matchit [s1 s2]
              (loop [t1 s1 t2 s2 c 0]
                (if (or (empty? t1) (empty? t2)) c
                    (let [[f1 & r1] t1
                          [f2 & r2] t2]
                      (cond (= f1 f2) (recur r1 r2 c)
                            (> (count t1) (count t2)) (recur r1 t2 (inc c))
                            (> (count t2) (count t1)) (recur t1 r2 (inc c))
                            :else (recur r1 r2 (inc c)))))))

            (diff [s1 s2]
              (let [cd (Math/abs (- (count s1) (count s2)))]
                (if (> cd 1) false
                    (>= 1 (matchit s1 s2)))))

            (diffs [s]
              (loop [o (first s) t (rest s) ac []]
                (if (empty? t) ac
                    (recur (first t) (rest t) (cons [o (map (fn [e] [e (diff e o)]) t) ] ac)))))

            (pair-links [m]
              (partition 2 (flatten (for [[o r] m] (map (fn [s] [o (first s)]) (filter #(true? (second %)) r))))))

            (degrees [s]
              (let [d (count (filter odd? (map (fn [a] (count (filter #(contains? (set %) a) s))) (set (flatten s)))))]
                d))]
      (let [pl (-> s diffs pair-links)]
        (and (graphcon pl) (< (degrees pl) (count s))))))

(fn [S]
  (letfn [
    (difference [A B]
      (reduce disj A B))

    (union [A & Bs]
      (reduce (partial reduce conj) A Bs))

    (intersection [A B]
      (reduce #(into %1 (A %2)) #{} B))

    (all-but-one? [lst]
      (= 1 (reduce + (map #(if % 0 1) lst))))
    
    (take-similar [pred S x]
      (set (filter (partial pred x) S)))

    (connections [pred S]
      (reduce #(assoc %1 %2 
        (take-similar pred S %2)) {} S))

    (connected? [C]
      (loop [kwn (-> C first key list set), 
             unk (-> C rest keys set)]
        (if (empty? unk)
          true
          (let [bnd (apply union (map C kwn))]             
            (if (empty? (intersection bnd unk))        
              false                                               
              (recur (union kwn bnd)                       
                     (difference unk bnd)))))))
  
    (tracable? [C] ; very hard problem ... cheat
      (> 3 (count (filter #(< % 2) 
        (map #(count (val %)) C)))))

    (inserted? [A B]
      (loop [a (seq A), b (seq B)]
        (if (= (first a) (first b))                               
          (recur (rest a) (rest b))                               
          (= a (rest b)))))

    (deleted? [A B]
      (inserted? B A))

    (word-chain [S]
      (letfn [
        (pred [a b]
          (cond
            (= (count a) (count b)) ; substitution
            (all-but-one? (map = a b)),

            (< (count a) (count b)) ; insertion
            (inserted? a b)

            (> (count a) (count b)) ; deletion
            (deleted? a b)))]

        (connections pred S)))]

  (let [C (word-chain S)]
    (and (connected? C) (tracable? C)))))

(fn [s]
  (letfn [(permutations [r s]
            (if (seq s)

                  cy (count y)]

(fn word-chain? [words]

            (cond (empty? seq-1) (count seq-2)
                  (empty? seq-2) (count seq-1)
                  (= (first seq-1) (first seq-2)) (levenshtein-distance (rest seq-1) (rest seq-2))
                  :else (inc (min (levenshtein-distance (rest seq-1) seq-2)
                                  (levenshtein-distance seq-1 (rest seq-2))
                                  (levenshtein-distance (rest seq-1) (rest seq-2))))))

          (chain [adjacency-map visited-set node]

              (if (= visited-set words) 
                true
                (some (partial chain adjacency-map visited-set) neighbors-remaining))))]
    (let [adjacency-map (into {} (for [w words] [w (neighbors w words)]))]
      (true? (some (partial chain adjacency-map #{}) words)))))

(fn [words]
  (letfn [(make-patterns [word]
            (cons
             (re-pattern (str "^" word ".?" "$"))
             (mapcat
              (fn [i]
                [(re-pattern (str "^" (subs word 0 i) ".?" (subs word (inc i)) "$"))

        (boolean (some identity (map #(find-path [%] %) words)))))))

(fn [words]

            (connectable? [w1 w2]
              (cond
                (empty? w1) (= 1 (count w2))
                (empty? w2) (= 1 (count w1))
                (= (first w1) (first w2)) (recur (rest w1) (rest w2))
                :else (or

                     transitions transitions]
                (if (empty? starting-points)
                  false

                        other-points (rest starting-points)
                        next-nodes (transitions node)
                        next-new-nodes (filter toreach next-nodes)
                        next-points (for [n next-new-nodes]
                                      [n (conj reachable n) (disj toreach n)])]
                    (if (empty? toreach)
                      true
                      (recur (concat other-points next-points) transitions))))))

(fn word-chains [words]
(let [
   in?  (fn [seq elm]  (some #(= elm %) seq))

   levenshtein (fn lev [s1 s2]
    (if (or (empty? s1) (empty? s2)) (max (count s1) (count s2))
      (let [fs1 (first s1)
            fs2 (first s2)
            rs1 (rest s1)
            rs2 (rest s2)]
        (cond
          (= fs1 fs2) (lev rs1 rs2)
          :else (inc (min (lev rs1 rs2) (lev s1 rs2) (lev rs1 s2)))))))

    almost-twin? (fn [w1 w2] (or (some nil? [w1 w2]) (= (levenshtein w1 w2) 1)))

   try-some (fn try-some [c v]
    (if (= c (count v))
      true
      (loop [ws (for
                  [w words :when (and (not (in? v w)) (or (empty? v) (almost-twin? w (last v))))]
                  w)]
        (cond
          (empty? ws) false
          (try-some c (conj v (first ws))) true
          :else (recur (rest ws))))))]

  (try-some (count words) [])))

                      (and (= 1 (- l1 l2)) (wt w1 w2))           ;; subtraction
                      (and (= 1 (- l2 l1)) (wt w2 w1)))))        ;; addition"  
                 (is-chain [w ws]

                       (for [x ws]

(fn [sw]

          (del [w i] (str (subs w 0 i) (subs w (inc i))))
          (nw [] (map char (range 97 123)))

          (words-sub [w sw] (set (filter #(and (= (count %) (count w)) (oc? w %)) sw)))

          (words-add [w] (for [n (nw) i (range 0 (inc (count w)))] (ins w i n)))
          (words [w sw] (filter sw (reduce into #{} [(words-add w) (words-del w) (words-sub w sw)])))

                (let [n (peek nv)]

                          ns (pop nv)

                  cp (mapcat #(cp-from p %) sw)

(fn [s]

(fn ladder-answer
  [input]
  (letfn
      [(permute?
         [a b]
         (cond
           (empty? a) true
           (= 1 (Math/abs (- (count a) (count b))))
           (let [s1 (max-key count a b)
                 s2 (min-key count a b)]
             (re-find (re-pattern (apply str (interpose ".*" s2))) s1))
           (= (count a) (count b))
           (->>
            (map compare a b)
            (filter (partial not= 0))
            count
            (= 1))
           :else false
           ))
       (ladder? [word others]
         (if (empty? others) true
             (boolean (some #(and true %)
                            (for [m others
                                  :when (permute? word m)]
                              (do (println (str m " "(disj others m)))
                                  (ladder? m (disj others m))))))))
       ]
    (ladder? "" input)))

                          (inc x) (map list % (cons x q) q)))
                      (range (inc (count %))) %2))

                 (if (empty? words)
                   true
                   (some true? (for [w words
                               :when (= 1 (lev-dist w x))]
                           (search (concat [w x] chain) (disj words w))))))]
    (boolean (some true? (for [w wset] (search [w] (disj wset w)))))))

(letfn [(l? [x y]
          (cond
            (= (count x) 0) (count y)
            (= (count y) 0) (count x)
            (= (first x) (first y)) (l? (rest x) (rest y))
            :else (min (inc (l? (rest x) y)) (inc (l? x (rest y))) (inc (l? (rest x) (rest y))))))
        (l-table [l]
          (for [x (range (count l))]
            (for [y (range (count l))]
               (l? (nth l x) (nth l y)))))
        (some-perm? [n f]
          (letfn [(gen-perm-states [l e]
                    (if (empty? l)
                        (f e)
                        (some (fn [x] (gen-perm-states (remove #(= % x) l) (cons x e))) l)))]
            (gen-perm-states (range n) ())))
        (has-route? [tbl]
          (println tbl)
          (some-perm? (count tbl) (fn [x] (every? (fn [idx] (= (nth (nth tbl (nth x idx)) (nth x (inc idx))) 1)) (range (dec (count tbl)))))))]
  #(= (has-route? (l-table (seq %))) true))

(let [lev (memoize (fn lev [l r]
                      (cond
                       (empty? l) (count r)
                       (empty? r) (count l)
                       :else (if (= (first l) (first r))
                               (lev (next l) (next r))
                               (min (inc (lev (next l) r))
                                    (inc (lev l (next r)))
                                    (inc (lev (next l) (next r))))))))
       word-chain (fn word-chain [word words]
                    (if (empty? words)
                      [[word]]
                      (seq (for [w words
                                 :when (= (lev word w) 1)
                                 chain (word-chain w (disj words w))]
                             (cons word chain)))))]
   (fn [words]
     (boolean (some #(word-chain % (disj words %)) words))))

(fn [xs]
  (let [drop-nth (fn [coll index]
                   (concat (take index coll) (drop (inc index) coll)))
        is-edge? (fn [x y]
                   (case (- (count x) (count y))
                     0 (= (->> (map = x y) (filter false?) count) 1)
                     1 (some (partial = y)
                             (map #(apply str (drop-nth x %))
                                  (-> x count range)))
                     -1 (recur y x)
                     false))
        is-path? (fn [xs]
                   (every? true? (map is-edge? (rest xs) (drop-last xs))))
        permutation (fn f [xs]
                      (if (empty? xs)
                        ['()]
                        (apply concat
                               (map #(map (partial cons %)
                                          (f (disj xs %)))
                                    xs))))]
    (true? (some identity (map is-path? (permutation xs))))))

(fn [w] 
  (letfn [(word-chain
           ([words]
            (let [words (for [w words]
                          (word-chain (disj words w) [w]))]
              (if (some true? (flatten words)) true false)))
           ([words chain]
            (if (not-empty words)
              (let [l (last chain)]
                (for [w words]
                  (if (matcher [l w])
                    (word-chain (disj words w) (conj chain w)))))
              true)))

          (matcher
           [words]
           (let [[w1 w2] (sort-by count < words)
                 min-matches (dec (apply max (map count words)))
                 matches (for [l w1]
                           (re-seq (re-pattern (str l)) w2))]
             (= min-matches
                (->> matches
                     (remove nil?)
                     count))))]
    (word-chain w)))

(fn [ws]

         (cond 
           (zero? l1) l2
           (zero? l2) l1
           :else

             (min 
               (inc (lev (rest w1) w2))
               (inc (lev w1 (rest w2)))
               (+ cost (lev (rest w1) (rest w2))))))))
     (expand? [s w]

         (and (= (lev l w) 1))))
     (eval-ss [acc _]
