      (not (empty? (reduce eval-ss ss (range (- (count ws) 2))))))))

(fn [l] (letfn [(lev [x1 x2]
        (let [match (fn[x y] (if (= (nth x1 x) (nth x2 y)) 1 0))
          ld    (fn ld [x y c]
            (cond 
             (c [x y]) [(c [x y]) c]
             (< x 0) [(- y x) (assoc c [x y] (- y x))]
             (< y 0) [(- x y) (assoc c [x y] (- x y))]
             :else 
              (let [[d1 c1] (ld (dec x) (dec y) c)
                   [d2 c2] (ld (dec x)      y  c1) 
                   [d3 c3] (ld      x  (dec y) c2)
                   c c3
                   v (inc (min (- d1 (match x y)) d2 d3))]
             [ v (assoc c [x y] v )])))]
        (first (ld (dec (count x1)) (dec (count x2)) {}))))
        (d [x y] (= (lev x y) 1))
        (c [x]  (every? identity (map d x (rest x))))
        (m [s] 
          (loop [i 0 r [[[] #{}]]]
              (if (= i (count s)) (map first r)
                (recur (inc i) (mapcat (fn [[x y]] 
                                          (filter (complement nil?) 
                                            (map #(when-not (y %) (identity [(conj x %) (conj y %)])) 
                                               s)))r)))))

        ]
   (if (some c (m (into [] l))) true false)))

(fn wc[words]
  (letfn [
		(ld[s t]
			(let [m (count s)
						n (count t)
						d (into (zipmap (map #(list % 0) (take (inc m) (range))) (range))
										(zipmap (map #(list 0 %) (take (inc n) (range))) (range)))]
				(if (zero? (min m n)) 
					(max m n)
					(loop [j 1 i 1 d d] 
						(let [si (get s (dec i))
									tj (get t (dec j))
									nj (if (>= i m) (inc j) j)
									ni (if (>= i m) 1 (inc i))]
							(if (< n j) 
								(get d [m n]) 
								(if (= si tj) 
									(recur nj ni (assoc d [i j] (get d [(dec i) (dec j)]))) 
									(recur nj ni (assoc d [i j] (inc (min (get d [(dec i)      j])
																				(get d [(dec i) (dec j)])
																				(get d [     i  (dec j)]))))))))))))
		(longest-chain[word other]
						(let [sims (filter #(= 1 (ld %1 word)) other)] 
							(if (not-empty sims)
								(loop [sims sims] 
									(let [f (first sims)
									  		o (disj other f)] 
									  (if (or (empty? o) (longest-chain f o)) 
											true 
											(if (not-empty sims)
												(recur (next sims))
												false))))
								false)))] 
		(loop [w words]
			(let [f (first w)
						o (disj words f)
						l (longest-chain f o)] 
				(if l
					true
					(if (not-empty w)
						(recur (next w))
						false))))))

(fn [words]
   (letfn [(levenstein-distance [newStr oldStr]
             (let [n (count newStr) m (count oldStr)]
              (cond
               (= 0 n) m
               (= 0 m) n
               :else
               (let [prev-col (transient (vec (range (inc m)))) col (transient [])]
                 (dotimes [i n]
                   (assoc! col 0 (inc i))
                   (dotimes [j m]
                     (assoc! col (inc j)
                             (min (inc (get col j))
                                  (inc (get prev-col (inc j)))
                                  (+ (get prev-col j) (if (= (get newStr i) (get oldStr j)) 0 1)))))
                   (dotimes [i (count prev-col)]
                     (assoc! prev-col i (get col i))))
                 (last (persistent! col))))))
           (permutations [s]
              (lazy-seq
               (if (seq (rest s))
                 (apply concat (for [x s]
                     (map #(cons x %) (permutations (remove #{x} s)))))
                 [s])))
           
            (get-distances [acc curr more]
              (if (seq (rest more))
                (get-distances (conj acc (levenstein-distance curr (first more))) (first more) (rest more))
                (conj acc (levenstein-distance curr (first more)))))
           
            (is-chain? [distances]
              (every? #{1} distances))
           
            (is-chainable? [combinations]
              (let [curr (first combinations)
                    is-chain (is-chain? (get-distances [] (first curr) (rest curr)))]
                  (if (seq (rest combinations))
                    (if is-chain
                     true
                     (is-chainable? (rest combinations)))
                   is-chain)))]
     (is-chainable? (permutations words))))

(fn [ c ]
    (letfn 
      [
       (mld [ s t ] (letfn [(ld [ s t f] (cond 
                                     (zero? (count s)) (count t)
                                     (zero? (count t)) (count s)
                                     :else (min 
                                             (+ 1 (f (rest s) t f))
                                             (+ 1 (f s (rest t) f))
                                             (+ (f (rest s) (rest t) f)
                                                (if (= (first s) (first t)) 0 1))
                                           )))
                     
                    ]
                 (let [mld (memoize ld)] (mld s t mld))
              ))
       ]
      (let 
        [mmld (memoize mld)]
        (letfn [
       (chain [ d curword col ] 
              (loop [ totest col ]
                (if (empty? totest)
                  false ; we got back to here with no words found
                  (let [ firstword (first totest) restwords (rest totest) ]
                    ; it chains
                    (if (= 1 (mmld curword firstword))
                      (if (empty? (clojure.set/difference col #{ firstword }))  ; this is the last word in the chain
                        true 
                        (if (chain (inc d) firstword (clojure.set/difference col #{ firstword })) ; can we form a further chain
                          true
                          (recur restwords))
                        )
                      ; this firstword didnt match, try another
                      (recur restwords)
                      )))))
       ]
  
      (loop [col c]
        (if (empty? col)
          false
          (if (chain 0 (first col) (clojure.set/difference c #{ (first col) }))
            true
            (recur (rest col)))))))))

  (let [C concat
        M map

                           c (M char (range 97 123))]
                       [(C a [c] b)

                        (C a (next b))
                        (C a b)])))) W))]
    ((fn G [s X]
       (or
         (empty? X)
         (not (not-any?
                #(G % (disj X %))
                (filter #(or (not s) ((m s) (vec %))) X)))))

(fn word-chains
  [word-set]
  (letfn [(chainable?
            [s1 s2]
            (let [c1   (count s1)
                  c2   (count s2)
                  cdiv (- c2 c1)]
              (cond
                (= 0 cdiv)
                (= 1 (count (filter #(not %) (map (fn [x y] (= x y)) s1 s2))))

                (= 1 cdiv)
                (boolean
                 (some identity
                       (map (fn [x]
                              (= s1 (str (subs s2 0 x) (subs s2 (inc x) c2)))) (range 0 c2))))

                (= -1 cdiv)
                (boolean
                 (some identity
                       (map (fn [x]
                              (= s2 (str (subs s1 0 x) (subs s1 (inc x) c1)))) (range 0 c1))))

                :else
                false)))

          (words->relations
            [word-set]
            (apply merge
                   (map (fn [x]
                          {(keyword x) (into #{} (filter #(boolean %) (map (fn [y] (if (chainable? x y)
                                                                                     y
                                                                                     false)) (clojure.set/difference word-set #{x}))))}) word-set)))

          (fully-chainable?
            [f rest-set relations]
            (if (empty? rest-set)
              true
              (let [rels         ((keyword f) relations)
                    new-rels     (filter #(rest-set %) rels)
                    new-rest-set (fn [x] (clojure.set/difference rest-set #{x}))]

                (if (empty? new-rels)
                  false
                  (boolean (some identity (map (fn [a] (fully-chainable? a  (new-rest-set a) relations)) new-rels)))))))]
    
    (let [relations
          (words->relations word-set)]
      (boolean (some identity (map (fn [x] (fully-chainable? x (clojure.set/difference word-set #{x}) relations)) word-set))))))

(fn word-chains [s]
  (let [chainable?
        (fn [w1 w2]
          (let [size1 (count w1)
                size2 (count w2)
                [big sizebig small sizesmall] (if (> size1 size2)
                                                [w1 size1 w2 size2]
                                                [w2 size2 w1 size1])
                diff (- sizebig sizesmall)]
            (cond (> diff 1) false
                  :else (loop [big big
                               small small
                               continue true]
                          (if (seq small)
                            (if (= (first big) (first small))
                              (recur (rest big) (rest small) continue)
                              (if continue
                                (recur (rest big)
                                       (if (= diff 1)
                                         small
                                         (rest small))
                                       false)
                                false))
                            true)))))]
    (loop [chains (reduce #(conj %1 [%2 (disj s %2)]) [] s)]
      (if (seq chains)
        (let [[w s] (first chains)]
          (if (seq s)
            (let [chainable (filter #(chainable? w %) s)
                  new-chains (reduce #(conj %1 [%2 (disj s %2)])
                                     []
                                     chainable)]
              (recur (concat new-chains (rest chains))))
            true))
        false))))

(fn prob-0082
  [xs]

  (letfn [(omit
            [oi xs]
            (concat (take oi xs) (drop (inc oi) xs)))

          (-wc-del?
            [in-w1 in-w2]
            (let [w1 (seq in-w1), w2 (seq in-w2), lim (count w1)]
              (if (not= (count w1) (inc (count w2)))
                false
                (loop [oi 0]
                  (if (>= oi lim)
                    false
                    (if (= (omit oi w1) w2)
                      true
                      (recur (inc oi)))))))) 

          (wc-ins-del?
            [w1 w2]
            (or (-wc-del? w1 w2) (-wc-del? w2 w1)))

          (wc-substitution?
            [in-w1 in-w2]
            (let [w1 (seq in-w1), w2 (seq in-w2)]
              (and
               (= (count w1) (count w2))
               (= 1 (count (filter false? (map = (seq w1) (seq w2))))))))

          (wc-chainable?
            [w1 w2]
            (or (wc-substitution? w1 w2) (wc-ins-del? w1 w2)))

          (factorial [n]
            (reduce * (cons (bigint 1) (range (bigint 1) (inc n)))))

          (nth-perm
            [to-skip cands]
            (let [my-num-cands (count cands)
                  nx-num-cands (dec my-num-cands)]
              (if (pos? nx-num-cands)
                (let [nx-size      (factorial nx-num-cands)
                      nx-skip-chks (int (/ to-skip nx-size))
                      my-choice    (nth (vec cands) nx-skip-chks)
                      nx-to-skip   (- to-skip (* nx-size nx-skip-chks))
                      nx-cands     (disj cands my-choice) ]
                  (cons my-choice (nth-perm nx-to-skip nx-cands)))
                [(first cands)])))

          (permutations
            ([xs] (permutations xs 0 (factorial (count xs))))
            ([xs n lim]
               (lazy-seq
                (if (>= n lim)
                  nil
                  (cons (nth-perm n xs) (permutations xs (inc n) lim))))))
          ]

    (let [perms  (permutations xs)
          ok?    (fn [sq] (every? true? (map #(wc-chainable? %1 %2) sq (rest sq))))
          ok-lst (map #(ok? %) perms)]
      (not (not-any? true? ok-lst)))))
#(not (nil? (some #{"hat" "do" "shares"} %)))

(letfn [(some-path?
          [connections from]
          (let [remaining (dissoc connections from)]
            (cond (= connections remaining) false
                  (empty? remaining) true
                  :default (some #(some-path? remaining %)
                                 (get connections from)))))
        (word-graph
          [word-set]
          (reduce (fn [m [k v]]
                    (update-in m [k] conj v))
                  {}
                  (for [a word-set b word-set
                        :when (and (not= a b)
                                   (one-step (seq a) (seq b)))]
                    [a b])))
        (one-step
          [a b]
          (cond (= a b) true
                (= (first a) (first b)) (recur (rest a) (rest b))
                :default (or (one-away a b)
                             (one-away b a))))
        (one-away
          [[a' :as a] [_ & bs :as b]]
          (or (= (cons a' b) a)       ; insert
              (= (cons a' bs) a) ; swap
              (= bs a)))] ; drop
  #(boolean (some (partial some-path? (word-graph %)) %)))

(fn [xs]
  (letfn [(common [x y] (count (take-while (fn [[a b]] (= a b)) (map list x y))))
          (chain? [x y]
                  (let [rx (reverse x) ry (reverse y)]
                    (= (max (count x) (count y)) (+ 1 (common x y) (common rx ry)))))
          (can-chain? [x xs]
                      (if (empty? xs) true
                        (some #(can-chain? % (remove #{%} xs))
                              (filter #(chain? x %) xs))))]
    (or (some #(can-chain? % (remove #{%} xs)) xs) false)))

(fn [s]
  (true? 
   (some true? 
         (for [e s]
           ((fn check-recur [fst res]
              (cond (empty? res) true
                    :else (some true? (for [i res]
                                        (if ((fn similar? [a b]
                                               (cond (= (count a) (count b)) (= 1 (count (remove zero? (map - (map int a) (map int b)))))
                                                     (= 1 (- (count a) (count b))) (not (nil? (re-find (re-pattern (clojure.string/join ".?" b)) a)))
                                                     (= 1 (- (count b) (count a))) (similar? b a)
                                                     :else false)) fst i) (check-recur i (disj res i)) false))))) e (disj s e))))))

(fn [words]
    (letfn [
            ; Returns distances of given word to all other words
            ; (distances "hat")
            ; => [[ "cot" 2] [ "hot" 1 ] ... ]
            (distances [word]
                       (map #(vector % (distance % word)) words))
            ; Returns successors (distance = 1) for given word of words
            (word-successors [word]
                             (set (map first (remove #(not= 1 (last %)) (distances word)))))
            ; Returns levenshtein distance of two given words
            ; implements equality check shortcut
            (distance [w1 w2]
                      (if (= w1 w2)
                        0
                        (levenshtein w1 w2)))
            ; Recursive levenshtein distance for two given words
            ; http://rosettacode.org/wiki/Levenshtein_distance#Clojure
            (levenshtein [str1 str2]
                         (let [len1 (count str1)
                               len2 (count str2)]
                           (cond (zero? len1) len2
                                 (zero? len2) len1
                                 :else
                                 (let [cost (if (= (first str1) (first str2)) 0 1)]
                                   (min (inc (levenshtein (rest str1) str2))
                                        (inc (levenshtein str1 (rest str2)))
                                        (+ cost
                                           (levenshtein (rest str1) (rest str2))))))))
            ; Transforms given successor-map into set of all available paths, visiting nodes at most once
            ; (expand-paths {"dog" #{"foo"} "foo" #{"dog" "bar"} "bar" #{}})
            ; => #{ '("dog" "foo" "bar") '("foo" "bar") '("foo" "dog") '("bar") }
            (expand-paths [successor-map]
                          (letfn [(paths-starting-from [word visited]
                                                       (let [available-next (clojure.set/difference (successor-map word) visited)
                                                             subpaths (mapcat #(paths-starting-from % (conj visited %)) available-next)]
                                                         (if (empty? subpaths)
                                                           (list (list word))
                                                           (map (fn [path]
                                                                  (conj path word))
                                                                subpaths))
                                                         ))]
                            (set (mapcat #(paths-starting-from % #{%}) (keys successor-map)))))
            ]

      ; build word successor map of words and their possible successors
      ; check if there exists a path that visits every word
      (let [word-successor-map (reduce into (map #(hash-map % (word-successors %)) words))]
        (true? (some #(= words (set %)) (expand-paths word-successor-map))))))

(fn [words]
  (letfn [(ed-dist [a b] 
            (cond 
              (and (nil? a) (nil? b)) 0 
              (nil? b) (count a) 
              (nil? a) (count b)
              :else (let [ra (next a) rb (next b)] 
                      (if (= (first a) (first b)) 
                        (ed-dist ra rb) 
                        (+ (min 
                               (ed-dist ra rb) 
                               (ed-dist ra b) 
                               (ed-dist a rb)) 1)))))
  		(solve [graph visited source]
				(let [to-visit (filter #(not (contains? visited %)) (graph source))]
					(if (nil? (first to-visit))
						(= (+ (count visited) 1) (count words))
						(reduce #(or %1 %2) (map #(solve graph (conj visited source) %) to-visit))
			)))]
		(let [graph 
			(apply hash-map (mapcat identity (map #(vector % (filter (fn [w] (= (ed-dist % w) 1)) words)) words)))]
			(reduce #(or %1 %2) (map #(solve graph #{} %) words))
)))

(fn chainable? [words]

  ;; We begin by defining some useful functions.
  (let [
        ;; This is a predicate that detects whether its arguments are related by
        ;; an insertion or deletion (which are really the same thing: A is
        ;; obtained from B by an insertion iff B is obtained from A by a
        ;; deletion). It works on arbitrary sequences, not just strings.
        insertion?
        (fn [a b]
          (cond
            (string? a)                       (recur (seq a) b)
            (string? b)                       (recur a (seq b))
            (> (count b) (count a))           (recur b a)
            (not= (count a) (inc (count b)))  false
            (empty? b)                        true
            (= (first a) (first b))           (recur (rest a) (rest b))
            :else                             (= (rest a) b))),

        ;; This is a predicate that detects whether its arguments differ by a
        ;; substitution. Again, this works on arbitrary sequences.
        substitution?
        (fn [a b]
          (cond
            (string? a)                       (recur (seq a) b)
            (string? b)                       (recur a (seq b))
            (not= (count a) (count b))        false
            (empty? a)                        false
            (= (first a) (first b))           (recur (rest a) (rest b))
            :else                             (= (rest a) (rest b)))),

        ;; This is a predicate that detects whether a sequence represents a
        ;; chain of insertions, deletions, and substitutions.
        chain?
        (fn [coll]
          (if (seq coll)

            ;; This next form doesn't work on the 4clojure site, because reduced
            ;; is too new.
            #_(reduce (fn [x y]
                        (if (or (insertion? x y)
                                (substitution? x y))
                          y
                          (reduced false)))
                      coll)

            ;; Here's the replacement form.
            (not= :fail (reduce (fn [x y]
                                  (cond
                                    (= x :fail)               :fail
                                    (or (insertion? x y)
                                        (substitution? x y))  y
                                        :else                     :fail))
                                coll))

            ;; Picking up where we left off (this is the "empty" case):
            true)),

        ;; This is a function which takes a set and returns the set of all
        ;; permutations of that set.
        permutations
        (fn permutations [a]
          (if (= 1 (count a))
            #{(seq a)}
            (->> (for [x a]
                   (map (partial cons x)
                        (permutations (disj a x))))
                 (apply concat)
                 set)))]

    (if (seq words)
      (if (some chain? (permutations words)) true false)
      true)))

(fn [w]
 (letfn [(lev [a b i j]
           (cond
            (and (zero? i) (zero? j)) 0
            (zero? j) i
            (zero? i) j
            :else (min
                   (inc (lev a b (dec i) j))
                   (inc (lev a b i (dec j)))
                   (+ (lev a b (dec i) (dec j)) (if (= (get a (dec i)) (get b (dec j))) 0 1)))))
         (rst [a xs] [a (clojure.set/difference xs #{a})])
         (nxt [[a xs]] (let [n (filter (fn [b] (= 1 (lev a b (count a) (count b)))) xs)]
                         (map (fn [c] (rst c xs)) n)))
         (stp [xs] (set (mapcat nxt xs)))]
   (let [init (map (fn [a] (rst a w)) w)]
     (not (empty? (last (take (count w) (iterate stp init))))))))

(fn wc [words]
  (let [insert? (fn [longer shorter]
                  (some boolean
                        (->> longer
                             (map-indexed
                               (fn [i c]
                                 (->> (concat (take i longer)
                                              (drop (inc i) longer))
                                      (apply str)
                                      (= shorter)))))))
        conn? (fn [w1 w2]
                (case (->> [w1 w2] (map count) (apply -) Math/abs)
                  0 (->> w1
                         (map-indexed #(= (get w2 %1) %2))
                         (remove identity)
                         count
                         (>= 1))
                  1 (if (> (count w1)
                           (count w2))
                      (insert? w1 w2)
                      (insert? w2 w1))
                  false))
        chainable?
        (fn c?
          ([words] (some boolean (map #(c? (disj words %) [%]) words)))
          ([unused chain]
           (if (empty? unused) true
             (some boolean (for [word unused]
                             (when (conn? word (last chain))
                               (c? (disj unused word)
                                   (conj chain word))))))))]
    (boolean (chainable? words))))

(letfn [(can-follow? [word1 word2]
          (let [c1 (count word1)
                c2 (count word2)]
            (if (= c1 c2)
              (->> (map = word1 word2)
                   (filter false?)
                   count
                   (= 1))
              (if (= 1 (Math/abs (- c1 c2)))
                (let [[w1 w2] (sort-by count [word1 word2])
                      w2-vec (vec w2)]
                  (->> (range (count w2))
                       (map #(= w1 (apply str (concat (subvec w2-vec 0 %) (subvec w2-vec (inc %))))))
                       (some #{true})))))))

        (initial-chains [words]
          (for [word words]
            [word (remove #{word} words)]))

        (fork-chain [[word words]]
          (remove nil?
                  (for [w words]
                    (if (can-follow? word w)
                      [w (remove #{w} words)]))))

        (chainable? [chains]
          (cond 
           (empty? chains) false
           (every? empty? (map second chains)) true
           :else (->> (for [chain chains]
                        (fork-chain chain))
                      (remove empty?)
                      (apply concat)
                      recur)))]
  (fn [coll]
    (chainable? (initial-chains coll))))

(fn wc [s]
  (letfn 
    [(insertion? [w1 w2] 
	  (and (= (-> w1 count inc) (-> w2 count))
	    (loop [w1 w1, w2 w2, i 0]
		  (cond 
		    (> i 1) false
			(empty? w1) true
			(= (first w1) (first w2)) (recur (next w1) (next w2) i)
			:else (recur w1 (next w2) (inc i))  ))))
	 (deletion? [w1 w2] 
	   (insertion? w2 w1))
	 (substitution? [w1 w2]
	   (and (= (count w1) (count w2))
	      (->> [w1 w2] (apply map not= ) (filter identity) count (= 1)) ))
	 (follows? [w1 w2] 
	   (some identity ((juxt insertion? deletion? substitution?) w1 w2)))
	 (follow-seq [w1 ws]
	   (filter (partial follows? w1) ws))
	 (follow-tree [v words]
		(for [x v] (cons x (follow-tree (follow-seq x words) (remove #(= x %) words)  ))))
	 (max-depth [tree]
	    (if (and (seq? tree) (not-empty tree)) (inc (apply max (map max-depth tree))) 0)) ]
	(= (-> s count inc) (max-depth (follow-tree s s)))))

(fn [words] (let [
	n (count words)
	sorted (apply sorted-set words)
	pairs (disj (reduce #(apply conj %1 (for [w words] (if (= w %2) nil (hash-set %2 w)))) #{} words) nil)
	seqable? #(let [ 
		x (first %) 
		y (second %) 
		d (- (count x) (count y)) 
		separation (fn [x y] 
			(loop [b x s y] 
				(if (= (first b) (first s)) (recur (rest b) (rest s)) 
					(= (apply str b) (str (first b) (apply str s))))))]
		(cond
			(zero? d) 
			  (loop [f x s y diff 0] 
			  	(if (empty? f) (= 1 diff) 
			  		(if (= (first f) (first s)) 
			  			(recur (rest f) (rest s) diff) 
			  			(recur (rest f) (rest s) (inc diff)))))
			(= 1 d) (separation x y)
			(= -1 d) (separation y x)
			:else false	))
	wordmap (
		reduce #(if (seqable? %2) 
			(assoc %1 
				(first %2) (conj (%1 (first %2)) (second %2)) 
				(second %2) (conj (%1 (second %2)) (first %2))) 
			%1) 
		(reduce #(into %1 {%2 #{}}) {} words) 
		pairs)] 
	(loop [curr (first sorted) remaining (rest sorted)]
		(cond
			(empty? remaining) false
			(loop [built (list (list (list curr) (wordmap curr)))]
				(cond
					(empty? built) false
					(= (dec n) (apply max (map count (map first built)))) 
					(some #(= n (count (first %))) 
						(mapcat (fn [z] (map 
							#(list (conj (first z) %) (apply disj (wordmap %) (first z))) 
							(second z))) 
						built))
					:else (recur 
						(filter #(not-empty (second %)) 
							(mapcat (fn [z] 
								(map #(list (conj (first z) %)
									(apply disj (wordmap %) (first z)))(second z))) built))))) true
			:else (recur (first remaining) (rest remaining))))))

(fn word-chain? [ws]
  (let [has-edge? (fn has-edge? [w1 w2]
                    (cond
                      (and (empty? w1) (empty? w2)) true
                      (= (first w1) (first w2)) (has-edge? (next w1) (next w2))
                      (= (next w1) (seq w2)) true
                      (= (seq w1) (next w2)) true
                      (= (next w1) (next w2)) true
                      :else false))
        neighbors (fn [w] (filter (partial has-edge? w) ws))
        graph (into {} (map #(vector % (neighbors %)) ws))
        has-chain? (fn has-chain? [visited root]
                     (let [visited (conj visited root)
                           children (remove visited (graph root))]
                       (if (empty? children)
                         (= ws visited)
                         (some (partial has-chain? visited) children))))]
    (boolean (some (partial has-chain? #{}) ws))))

(fn word-chain? [words]
  (let [drop-nth (fn [n coll] (keep-indexed #(if (not= %1 n) %2) coll))
        one-letter-difference?
        (fn one-letter-difference? [word1 word2]
          (if (> (count word1) (count word2))
            (one-letter-difference? word2 word1)
            (case (Math/abs (- (count word1) (count word2)))
              0 (or (some
                     #(apply = (map (partial drop-nth %) [word1 word2]))
                     (range (count word1)))
                    false)
              1 (or (some
                     #(= word1 (apply str (drop-nth % word2)))
                     (range (count word2)))
                    false)
              false)))
        edges
        (reduce
         #(assoc %1 %2
                 (filter
                  (partial one-letter-difference? %2)
                  (disj words %2))) {} words)
        hamiltonian-path
        (fn hamiltonian-path [start to-visit edges]
          (let [allowed (clojure.set/intersection to-visit (set (get edges start)))]
            (if (= 1 (count to-visit) (count allowed))
              (list start (list (first allowed)))
              (concat
               [start]
               (map
                #(hamiltonian-path % (disj to-visit %) edges)
                allowed)))))
        max-depth
        (fn max-depth [root]
          (if (= 1 (count root))
            1
            (inc (apply max (map max-depth (rest root))))))
        path
        (fn [start] (hamiltonian-path start (disj words start) edges))
        paths (map path words)]
    (= (count words) (apply max (map max-depth paths)))
    ))

(fn [c]
    (let [sp (fn [[af & ar :as a] [bf & br :as b]] 
               (if (= af bf)
                 (recur ar br)
                 [a b]))
          t (fn [a b]
              (let [[a b] (sp a b)
                    [a b] (sp (reverse a) (reverse b))]
                (and (<= (count a) 1) (<= (count b) 1))))
          g (fn g [s v]
              (or
                (empty? v)
                (some #(and (t s %) (g % (disj v %))) v)))]
        (boolean (some identity (map #(g % (disj c %)) c)))))

(fn [words]
  (let [linkable? (fn linkable?
                    [word-a word-b]
                    (loop [a-rem (seq word-a) b-rem (seq word-b)]
                      (cond
                        (= word-a nil)
                        true   
                        (or (= (first a-rem) (first b-rem)))
                        (recur (rest a-rem) (rest b-rem))
                        :else
                        (if (or (= (rest a-rem) (rest b-rem))
                                (= a-rem (rest b-rem)) ; insertion case
                                (= (rest a-rem) b-rem)
                                ) ; deletion case
                          true
                          nil))))
        chains (fn chains
                 ([words]
                  (chains (count words) words []))
                 ([wcount words acc]
                  (let [word (peek acc)
                        matches (filter (partial linkable? word)
                                        (remove #{word} words))]
                    
                    (if (empty? matches)
                      (if (= (count acc) wcount) acc false)
                      (map #(chains wcount (remove #{word} words) (conj acc %)) matches)))))]

    (if (some identity (flatten (chains words)))
      true  false)))

(fn word-chain? [words]
  (letfn [(remove-nth [coll n]
            (let [[start end] (split-at n coll)]
              (concat start (drop 1 end))))
          (chain? [w1 w2]
            (let [[short long] (if (< (count w1) (count w2)) [(seq w1) (seq w2)] [(seq w2) (seq w1)])]
              (and (<= (- (count long) (count short)) 1)
                   (not (nil? (some identity (for [c (range (count long))]
                                               (or (= (remove-nth long c) short)
                                                   (= (remove-nth long c) (remove-nth short c))))))))))
          (chain-starting-with [chain words-left]
            (if (not-empty words-left)
              (some identity (for [word words-left]
                               (when (or (empty? chain)
                                         (chain? (last chain) word))
                                 (chain-starting-with (conj chain word) (disj words-left word)))))
              chain))]
    (not (nil? (chain-starting-with [] words)))))

(fn word-chain?
  ; When called with a single arg, inject nil as the first arg.
  ([s]     (word-chain? nil s))
  
  ; When called with two args, a word w and a set s, return true if either the set s is empty,
  ; or if there is some way to form a word chain starting with w and followed by all the words
  ; in s.
  ([w s]   (letfn [(valid-step? [wa wb]
                     ; return true if the words wa and wb form a valid step in a word chain
                     ; (i.e. they differ by 1 char), or if wa is nil
                     (let [a  (seq wa)
                           b  (seq wb)
                           ca (count a)
                           fa (first a)
                           ra (rest a)
                           cb (count b)
                           fb (first b)
                           rb (rest b)]
                       (cond
                        (= wa nil)                true
                        (> ca cb)                 (recur b a)  ;; make sure wa is no longer than wb                                                                                                   
                        (and (= ca 0) (= cb 1))   true
                        (= ca cb 1)               (not= fa fb)
                        (= ca cb)                 (if (= fa fb) (recur ra rb) (= ra rb))
                        (= fa fb)                 (recur ra rb)
                        :else                     (= a rb))))]
             (or
               (empty? s)
               (boolean (some #(word-chain? % (disj s %)) (filter #(valid-step? w %) s)))))))

(fn p82 [words]
  (let [levenshtein-distance (fn levenshtein-distance [s1 s2]
											(cond
												(empty? s1) (count s2)
												(empty? s2) (count s1)
												:else 
													(min 
														(+ 
									 					(if (= (first s1) (first s2)) 0 1)
															(levenshtein-distance (rest s1) (rest s2)))
														(inc (levenshtein-distance (rest s1) s2))
														(inc (levenshtein-distance s1 (rest s2))))))
		  find-edges (fn [word]
						(let [find-edge (fn [candidate-edge] (= (levenshtein-distance word candidate-edge) 1))]
							[word (apply hash-set (filter find-edge (disj words word)))]))
		  edges (into {} (map find-edges words))
		  list-words (fn list-words [words]
		  				(let [last-word (last words)
		  					  candidates (reduce disj (edges last-word) words)]
		  					(if (not (empty? candidates))
		  						(reduce concat (map #(list-words (conj words %)) candidates))
		  						(list words))))
		  runs (reduce concat (map #(list-words [%]) words))
		  all-words (filter #(= (count %) (count words)) runs)]
		  (println "FINAL" all-words)
		  (not (empty? all-words))))

(fn [s]
  (let [d (fn [u v] 
            (let [c (compare (count u) (count v))]
              (if (= (first u) (first v))
                (recur (rest u) (rest v))
                (cond
                  (= c 0) (= (rest u) (rest v))
                  (< c 0) (= (seq u) (seq (rest v)))
                  (> c 0) (= (seq (rest u)) (seq v))))))
        n (apply hash-map 
                 (mapcat
                   (fn [w] [w (set (filter #(and (not= % w) (d % w)) s))]) s))]
    (letfn [(c [p l]
            (if (empty? l) true
              (loop [t (into '() 
                             (if (empty? p) l (clojure.set/intersection l (n (last p)))))]
                (if (empty? t) false
                  (let [r (c (conj p (first t)) (disj l (first t)))]
                    (if r r (recur (rest t))))))))]
    (c [] s))))

(letfn [(levenshtein [step xs ys]
          (cond
           (empty? xs)
           (count ys)
           
           (empty? ys)
           (count xs)
           
           :else
           (let [[x & sub-xs] xs
                 [y & sub-ys] ys
                 cost (if (= x y) 0 1)]
             (min (inc (step step sub-xs ys))
                  (inc (step step xs sub-ys))
                  (+ cost (step step
                                sub-xs
                                sub-ys))))))]
  
  (let [step (memoize levenshtein)]
    (letfn [(chain? [word word-set]
              (or (empty? word-set)
                  (some #(and (= 1 (step step word %))
                              (chain? % (disj word-set %)))
                        word-set)))]
      
      (fn word-chain? [word-set]
        (or (some #(chain? % (disj word-set %))
                  word-set)
            false)))))

(fn word-chain
  ([words]
   (word-chain words []))
  ([words chain]
   (letfn [(distance
             ([a b]
              (if (or (empty? a) (empty? b))
                0
                (distance a b 0)))
             ([a b dist]
              (cond
                (empty? a) (+ dist (count b))
                (empty? b) (+ dist (count a))
                :else (if (= (first a) (first b))
                        (distance (rest a) (rest b) dist)
                        (min (distance     a    (rest b) (inc dist))
                             (distance (rest a)     b    (inc dist))
                             (distance (rest a) (rest b) (inc dist)))))))]
     (loop [candidates (apply list (clojure.set/difference (set words) (set chain)))]
       (if (empty? candidates)
         (if (= (set chain) (set words))
           true
           false)
         (if (< (distance (first candidates) (last chain)) 2)
           (if (word-chain words (conj chain (first candidates)))
             true
             (recur (rest candidates)))
           (recur (rest candidates))))))))

(letfn [(near 
  ([a b] (or (near a b 0) 
             (near (drop 1 a) b 1) 
             (near a (drop 1 b) 1) ))
  ([[f1 & r1 :as a] [f2 & r2 :as b] diff ]
    (if (< diff 2) 
      (if (and f1 f2)
        (let [diff1 (if (= f1 f2) diff (inc diff))] 
          (or (near r1 r2 diff1) 
              (near r1 (seq b) (inc diff) ) 
              (near (seq a) r2 (inc diff) )
              ))
        (< (+ (count a) (count b) diff) 2)
        ))))
          (chain
            ([words]
              (chain (first words) (first words) (rest words) #{} #{}))
            ([fst lst rst queue queue-cmp]
              (if (seq rst)
                (let [word (first rst)]
                  (or
                    (if (near fst word) (chain word lst (rest rst) queue queue-cmp))
                    (if (near lst word) (chain fst word (rest rst) queue queue-cmp))
                    (chain fst lst (rest rst) (conj queue word) queue-cmp)
                    ))
                (if (> (count queue) 0)
                  (if (= queue queue-cmp) 
                    false
                    (chain fst lst queue #{} queue) )
                  true))
              ))
          ] 
         chain
    )

(fn has-word-chain?
  [words]
  (letfn [(permutations
            [xs]
            (if (empty? xs)
              '(())
              (for [x xs p (permutations (disj xs x))]
                (cons x p))))
          (is-chain-step?
            [[w1 w2 :as ws]]
            (= (apply max (map count ws))
               (+ (count (take-while (partial apply =) (map vector w1 w2)))
                  (count (take-while (partial apply =) (apply map vector (map reverse ws))))
                  1)))
          (is-word-chain? [ws] (->> ws (partition 2 1) (every? is-chain-step?)))]
    (->> words
         (permutations)
         (filter is-word-chain?)
         ((complement empty?)))))

(fn [xs]
    (let [subst?  (fn [x y]
                    (and (string? x) (string? y)
                         (= (count x) (count y))
                         (= 1 (apply + (map (fn [a b] (if (= a b) 0 1)) x y)))))
          insert? (fn insert? [x y]
                    (and (string? x) (string? y)
                         (if (> (count y) (count x))
                           (insert? y x)
                           (and (= (count x) (inc (count y)))
                                (contains?
                                 (set
                                  (for [i (range (inc (count y)))
                                        l "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz"]
                                    (let [[start end] (split-at i y)]
                                      (str (apply str start) l (apply str end)))))
                                 x)))))
          chain?  (fn chain?
                    ([x] x)
                    ([x y]
                     (if (or (subst? x y) (insert? x y)) y))
                    ([x y & more]
                     (if (chain? x y) (and (chain? x y) (apply chain? y more)))))
          grow    (fn [xs ws]
                    ;; a collection of words and a chain of words, find chain extensions
                    (for [w     (apply disj (set ws) xs)
                          :let  [c (conj xs w)]
                          :when (apply chain? c)]
                      c))
          grow*   (fn [cs]
                    (mapcat #(grow % xs) cs))]

      (let [n (count xs)]
        (boolean (first (nth (iterate grow* (map vector xs)) (dec n)))))))

(fn has-chain? [s]
        (letfn [(drop-nth [n s] (concat (take n s) (drop (inc n) s)))
                (hlp [v s] (map #(cons v %) s))
                (permutations [s]
                              (if (empty? s)
                                  [[]]
                                  (->> (range (count s))
                                       (map #(hlp (nth s %) (permutations (drop-nth % s))))
                                       (apply concat))))
                (close-delete [a b]
                              (if (= (first a) (first b))
                                  (close-delete (rest a) (rest b))
                                  (or (= (rest a) b)
                                      (= (rest b) a))))
                (close? [[a b]] (if (= (count a) (count b))
                                    (= 1 (count (remove true? (map = a b))))
                                    (close-delete (seq a) (seq b))))
                (chain? [s] (every? true? (map close? (partition 2 1 s))))]
                (not (every? false? (map chain? (permutations (vec s)))))))

(fn [words]
  (letfn [(convertable_by_replace? [w1 w2]
                                   (= 1 (count (filter false? (map = (seq w1) (seq w2))))))
          (convertable_by_add? [w1 w2]
                               (if (= (first w1) (first w2))
                                 (convertable_by_add? (next w1) (next w2))
                                 (if (> (count w1) (count w2))
                                   (= (next w1) (seq w2))
                                   (= (seq w1) (next w2)))))
          (convertable? [w1 w2]
                        (let [l1 (count w1) l2 (count w2) l (- l1 l2) delta (* l l)]
                          (if (= 1 delta)
                            (convertable_by_add? w1 w2)
                            (if (= 0 delta)
                              (convertable_by_replace? w1 w2)
                              false))))
          (group_words [words]
                       (for [w words] (cons w (filter #(convertable? w %) words))))]
    (< (count (filter #(< % 3) (map count (group_words words)))) 3)))

(fn chainable? [words]
  (letfn [(levenshtein-distance [s1 s2]
            (letfn [(lev [levm s1 s2]
                      (cond (zero? (count s1)) (count s2)
                            (zero? (count s2)) (count s1)
                            :else
                            (min (inc (levm levm (rest s1) s2))
                                 (inc (levm levm s1 (rest s2)))
                                 (+ (if (= (first s1) (first s2)) 0 1)
                                    (levm levm (rest s1) (rest s2))))))]
              (lev (memoize lev) s1 s2)))
          (mutation-graph [words]
            (into {} (for [w1 words]
                       [w1 (filter #(= 1 (levenshtein-distance w1 %)) words)])))
          (path [graph start seen]
            (if (seen start)
              seen
              (for [node (graph start)]
                (path graph node (conj seen start)))))]
    (let [l1 (mutation-graph words)]
      (if (= (count (keys l1)) (count words))
        (not-every? empty? 
          (map
            #(filter
              (partial = words)
              (flatten (path l1 % #{})))
            words))
        false))
    ))

(fn[words]
  (letfn[(successor?[w1 w2]
           (letfn [
             (test-eq-count [w1s w2s]
               (let [a-seq (filter (fn[[a b]] (not= a b)) (partition 2 (interleave w1s w2s)))]
                 (<= (count a-seq) 1)))
             (test-neq-count[w1s w2s]
               (let [comps (map (fn[a-seq idx] (keep-indexed (fn[i elt] (when (not= i idx) elt)) a-seq))
                              (repeat w1s) (range (count w1s)))]
                 (some #(= % w2s) comps)))]            
    
             (let [diffc (- (count w1) (count w2))]

                 (= 0 diffc)  (test-eq-count (seq w1) (seq w2))
                 (= 1 diffc)  (test-neq-count (seq w1) (seq w2))
                 (= -1 diffc) (test-neq-count (seq w2) (seq w1))))))
         
         (successors[word words]
           (filter (fn[w] (successor? word w)) words))
         
         (do-search[word words level]
            ;(print "do-search(" level ") - word: " word " - words: " words)
            (when (empty? words)
              (throw (Exception.)))
            (let [succ (successors word words)]
              ;(println " - successors: " succ)
              (doseq [w succ]
                (do-search w (remove #(= w %) words) (inc level)))))]
(letfn[(successor?[w1 w2]

             (test-eq-count [w1s w2s]
               (let [a-seq (filter (fn[[a b]] (not= a b)) (partition 2 (interleave w1s w2s)))]
                 (<= (count a-seq) 1)))
             (test-neq-count[w1s w2s]
               (let [comps (map (fn[a-seq idx] (keep-indexed (fn[i elt] (when (not= i idx) elt)) a-seq))
                              (repeat w1s) (range (count w1s)))]
                 (some #(= % w2s) comps)))]            
    
             (let [diffc (- (count w1) (count w2))]
               (cond
                 (> (Math/abs diffc) 1) false
                 (= 0 diffc)  (test-eq-count (seq w1) (seq w2))
                 (= 1 diffc)  (test-neq-count (seq w1) (seq w2))
                 (= -1 diffc) (test-neq-count (seq w2) (seq w1))))))
         
         (successors[word words]
           (filter (fn[w] (successor? word w)) words))
         
         (do-search[word words atm]
            ;(print "do-search(" level ") - word: " word " - words: " words)
            (when (empty? words)
              (reset! atm true))
            (let [succ (successors word words)]
              ;(println " - successors: " succ)
              (doseq [w succ]
                (do-search w (remove #(= w %) words) atm))))]
  (let [words (seq words)
        found (atom false)]
    (doseq [idx (range (count words))]
      (do-search (nth words idx) (remove #(= (nth words idx) %) words) found))
     @found))))

(fn [coll]
  (let [path? (fn connect? [[a & rest-a] [b & rest-b]]
                (if (= a b)
                  (connect? rest-a rest-b)
                  (or (= rest-a (cons b rest-b)) ;; 
                      (= rest-a  rest-b) ;; ,
                      (= (cons a rest-a) rest-b) ;; 
                      )))
        graph-map (->> (for [e coll]
                         [e (set (filter #(and (not= e %) (path? e %))
                                         coll) )])
                       (into {}))
        dfs-fn (fn dfs [node depth visited]
                 (let [rest-nodes (filter #(not (visited %)) (get graph-map node))]
                   (if (empty? rest-nodes)
                     depth
                     (->>
                      (map #(dfs % (inc depth) (conj visited node))
                           rest-nodes)
                      (reduce max)))))]
    (if (= (count coll)
           (->> (map #(dfs-fn % 1 #{})
                     coll)
                (reduce max)))
      true
      false
      )))

(fn wc? [coll]
  (letfn
    [(onediff [w1 w2]
      (let [s1 (seq w1) s2 (seq w2)]
        (cond
          (not s1) (= 1 (count s2))
          (not s2) (= 1 (count s1))
          (= (first s1) (first s2)) (recur (rest s1) (rest s2))
          :else (or (= (rest s1) (rest s2)) (= (rest s1) s2) (= s1 (rest s2)))
          )))

     (chain [start rem]
      (if (empty? rem)
        true
        (let [nexts (filter #(onediff start %) rem)]
          (if (empty? nexts) false
                             (reduce #(or %1 %2) false (map #(chain % (disj rem %)) nexts))
                             ))))]
  (reduce #(or %1 %2) false (map #(chain % (disj coll %)) coll))))

(fn [lst]
  (letfn [(ed [a b] 
            (cond
              (empty? a) (count b)
              (empty? b) (count a)
              :else (min
                      (+ (if (= (first a) (first b)) 0 1)
                         (ed (rest a) (rest b))) 
                      (inc (ed (rest a) b))      
                      (inc (ed a (rest b))))))
          (buds? [a b] 
            (or
              (not a)
              (not b)
              (= (ed a b) 1)))
          (chainable? [lst prim]
            (println "in chainable? " lst prim)
            (if (= (count lst) 1) 
              (buds? (first lst) prim)
              (some identity
                    (let [buds (filter #(buds? prim %) lst)]
                      (println "buds: " buds)
                      (for [b buds]
                        (let [rst (disj lst b)]
                          (do
                            (println "b: " b)
                            (chainable? rst b))
                          ))))))]
    (not (not (chainable? lst nil)))))

(fn chains? [ws]
  (letfn [(eq-by-ins-del? 
           [xs ys diffcount]
                                        ;           (prn xs ys diffcount)
           (let [x (first xs) y (first ys)
                 rxs (rest xs) rys (rest ys)]
             (cond (or (empty? xs) (empty? ys)) (> 2 diffcount)
                   (= x y) (eq-by-ins-del? rxs rys diffcount)
                   :else (if (< 0 diffcount) false
                             (or (eq-by-ins-del? rxs ys (inc diffcount))
                                 (eq-by-ins-del? xs rys (inc diffcount)))))))
          (count-diff [xs ys]
                      (let [dc (- (count xs) (count ys))]
                        (if (> 0 dc) (- dc) dc)))
          (eq-by-one? [xs ys]
                      (if (= 1 (count-diff xs ys)) (eq-by-ins-del? xs ys 0)
                          false))
          (eq-by-replace? [xs ys]
                          (and (= 0 (count-diff xs ys))
                               (> 2 (count (filter not (map = xs ys))))))
          (eq? [xs ys]
               (let [r1 (eq-by-replace? xs ys) r2 (eq-by-one? xs ys)]
                 (or r1 r2)))
          (any? [xs] (= true (some #(and (not (nil? %)) %) xs)))]
    (let [eq-m? (memoize eq?)]
      (letfn [(chs? [x ws]
               (if (empty? ws) true
                   (any?
                    (for [w ws]
                      (and (eq-m? x w) (chs? w (disj ws w)))))))]
        (any? (for [w ws] (chs? w (disj ws w))))))))

(fn [words]
  (letfn [(distance [s1 s2]
            (cond (not (seq s1)) (count s2)
                  (not (seq s2)) (count s1)
                  (= (first s1) (first s2)) (distance (next s1) (next s2))
                  :else
                  (let [s1' (next s1)
                        s2' (next s2)
                        d1 (distance s1' s2)
                        d2 (distance s1 s2')
                        d3 (distance s1' s2')]
                    (inc (min d1 d2 d3)))))]
    (let [[x & xs] (seq words)]
      (loop [hd x
             tl x
             ys xs
             next #{}
             prev #{}]
        (if-not (seq ys)
          (if-not (seq next)
            true
            (if (= next prev)
              false
              (recur hd tl (seq next) #{} next)))
          (let [[y & ys'] ys]
            (cond (= 1 (distance y hd)) (recur y tl ys' next prev)
                  (= 1 (distance y tl)) (recur hd y ys' next prev)
                  :else
                  (recur hd tl ys' (conj next y) prev))))))))
